story:
I am a prophetic artist and mother of four, I was born in Derbyshire but grew up in the Cayman Islands, and I now live in Bristol.

 I’m all about the great journey of life as we don’t know it, I work from my faith and am guided through every piece of creation that is produced through it, I have written many manuscripts but only pushed my illustration side forward until now, I am also a visual artist and a portrait artist, but this time it was put on my heart to write and illustrate a picture book for children, that really touched their hearts and made them think in their language, but that was educational at the same time.

The only hurdle is the Christian related factor.

‘Zalia the Lost Koala’ is not a book for Christians – it is a book for everyone and anyone and is based on the values and teachings of Jesus - not religion, it is simply based on love.

Personally, I believe that true children’s book critics are the children themselves,

So as well as various places and people, I decided to also test drive a proof copy with my children’s local school. They loved it and said I should consider having it published. The teacher said Zalia calmed the children down and there was a great sense of peace in the classroom for the entire day, which is pretty amazing considering they were 4-5 year olds!

This was a green light for me to take it to the next level.

Of course, there are risks with being a debut author trying to release a book that is aiming for something different. The risk is fear, fear of failure, but the guarantee of success is your belief and faith in the message and this is certainly highlighted in Zalia's moral origin.

Love is limitless, and holds no impossibilities to ransom, with faith filled hearts in ourselves we find our supernatural identity where nothing is impossible, and everything is an open door, an opportunity, a season.

story:
Soy escritora en Panamá, donde ser artista o autor implica costearse sus obras por cuenta propia y sobra dinero para ocio, pero no para cultura y deporte. En este país, muchas personas desconoce cuánto cuesta publicar un libro, grabar una producción discográfica o montar una obra de teatro. La voluntad de las personas que valoran la literatura y el arte es más fuerte que los intereses banales que sí reciben apoyo. 

 A pesar de la educación es mi cuarto libro, sin embargo es el que más significa para mí. Me dedico a la docencia a tiempo completo y durante casi 10 años he trabajado como profesora en el ambiente universitario. En esta obra, comparto lo aprendido en la interacción con los estudiantes y cómo se puede lograr una diferencia desde las aulas y los intercambios con los futuros profesionales (y actuales personas, que de forma equivocada dicen que quieren "ser alguien" cuando ya lo son) con el potencial de un impacto en los males de la sociedad.

Costear un libro es difícil. Una buena impresión y diagramación resulta costosa para cualquier escritor que desee sacar una obra de calidad que dure muchos años en manos de los lectores.

En caso de no lograr la meta total, tendré un buen comienzo para costearme el resto. Siempre les digo a mis alumnos que el dinero no sea un obstáculo hacia sus metas, y vivo ese ejemplo en mis propios proyectos. 

Puedes colaborar compartiendo esta información con personas que pienses estén interesadas. A la larga, toda cooperación con la educación es una cooperación a un mejor presente y futuro.

story:
Hi, my name is Rob, the goal is to publish a children's illustrated book titled "A for Airplane".  The story begins with Scotty being too scared to fly one day, Scotty visited the Airport to fly with Grandpa in his bright yellow airplane. 

The flying adventure turned into an action-packed flight and along the way, with lots to see and learn.  Flying high and low, Scotty spots lots of things and wildlife beginning with the letter A.

A for airplane is not just an amusing bedtime story; with vibrant illustrations, wrapped in an engaging story-line, the book provides basic words related to the letter A and knowledge building of all things to do with an airplane.

 

This is not just an entertaining, exciting bedtime story, the concept is a fun learning experience with images and a quiz to enhance the children’s alphabet learning and vocabulary,  Plus a practical choice for pretravel reading and free downloadable learning activities via Scotty.Club.

 

The alphabet “Scotty Adventure Learning” transport series was literally inspired when Scotty was born too then thinking back when my parents told me that until the age of five, I could not talk leading to be diagnosed with dyslexia so I was worried with Scotty’s development.

As Scotty was growing up, all Scotty wanted was playing with wheels that whizz by, toys with wings flying high or toys splashing in his bath tub.  

With this in mind, grabbed a pen and paper and started on an alphabet journey from A to Z to encourage and aid Scotty to learn basic sounds and letters, thankfully Scotty’s speech and learning development are fine.

To fully bring the story-lines and sketches to life, a professional illustrator was sought, this is where I hit the funding wall, stopping the dream for Scotty to enjoy and learn all about the different transport types and basic words within an adventure book.

Came across, Indiegogo.com, what a brilliant idea! An amazing concept for people around the world to support and make dreams happen.

A for Airplane will not only bring amazing joy to Scotty but with all the families passion gone into each story-line, we are positive that children around the world will enjoy to listen and learn with Scotty learning adventure series, starting with "A for Airplane" book.

 

Your support will help us cover promotional, production, and fulfillment costs, including:

  • The story Illustrations and book design.
  • Editing and proof reading.
  • Purchase ISBN numbers and copyright.
  • First print run of 1500 copies in two hard cover formats:
  • A for Airplane - American English version.
  • A for Aeroplane - British English version.
  • Reformatting Illustrations for soft book and eBook formats.
  • Audio version of "A for Airplane".
  • Add learning digital material/formats, i.e. "The ABC Transport" song and animation for extended learning.

Please join Scotty and the family on an exciting adventure, together with your pledges we will bring “A for Airplane” to be published for children to read, learn and enjoy.  Thank-you so much, we really appreciate your support.

EVERY backer, will receive the following as a special thank-you

 

Below are the options, together with your pledges, Scotty “A for Airplane” will take flight!

If Shipping cost are less then stated, we will refund difference.  

Because you can only order one perk or add-on at a time, we will refund the extra shipping charges on multiple orders when your perk packages are shipped.

 

 

T-Shirt add-on: Choose from many t-shirt designs & sizes. see video below for details.

 

The Scotty Pack add-on package: See video below for more details.

 

Your Family Portrait: Provide a family photo of up to 5 People + 2 Pets

We will transform your photo to a full color cartoon caricature family portrait, capturing your special moment.  You can use the 300 dpi illustration for printing on:

  • Poster, postcards etc
  • T-shirts, hoodies etc
  • Mugs, water bottles.
  • Or any printable format, and use the image on your social network.

 

 

Scotty adventure series are not just a bedtime story, each letter of the alphabet will introduce children to an amusing story-line with a specific transport type.

With an engaging story, vibrant illustrations, and with Scotty’s influence added glossy photographs, a memory quiz and fun activities to bring alphabet learning and basic vocabulary to life with the lovable character named Scotty.

 

 

Every A to Z story-line and sketches are ready for the professional touch for illustrating towards publishing.  The dream is for the Scotty Learning Adventure series to become an icon of positivity, courage and a learning base for every child in the world, to be translated in as many languages as possible.

First, with your help, we can make "A for Airplane" book happen and share this fantastic airplane story so that many kids will enjoy reading and learning.

With your continued help, let's unlock together the exciting stretch goals: 

 

We are fully committed to seeing "A for Airplane" book to completion and staying on track with the timeline.

We've worked hard to keep risks to a minimum. The book is almost complete on the illustrations and currently in talks with printers for the best quality and costs.   We will provide regular updates on the progress of the book to our backers and hopefully add more perks on the way!

The only risk would be ensuring the overseas printing company delivery the hardback version on time and the quality is of a high standard.  

Not being based in the US, unfortunately shipping will be extra for physical products, not including any tax and/or duty fees in certain countries, which are out of our control. 

We will be transparent as we continue the journey to develop and deliver the Scotty Learning Adventure A to Z books. We are passionate about providing learning for children across the planet, we promise to our backers to bring "A for Airplane" book to life no matter what obstacles appear.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

 

We are committed to help children learning across the planet. Therefore, when Scotty's "A for Airplane" book is published, we will be donating a percentage of book sales to non-profit organizations that focuses on children education and development.

If you have any non-profit organizations you have in mind, please contact us or leave a comment, thank-you.

 

Please share the links below to spread the word. Posting the links and images on your social media will help Scotty Adventure Learning to reach our goal.

   

   

We really appreciate your time and support, thank-you.

 

Please join Scotty and the family on an exciting adventure, together with your pledges we can archive to bring “A for Airplane” to take flight! and to be published for children to read, learn and enjoy across the world.

story:
Short Summary

My adventure with Sloan the Sloth is continuing. I started my children's book author career with The Secret Life of Sloan the Sloth in March of 2018. With the help of Mascot Books, I am introducing a 2nd edition of that book and proud to announce that in early 2021, the second book in the series: The Legend of the Mask!

By contributing to this campaign, you are ensuring yourself a copy of either or both and providing me with the backbone of launch costs. So, thank you!

What We Need & What You Get

Ultimately, we need $2000 to finish paying for the printing of the books and shipping to me and the warehouse. Since I only have details on the re-release of the first book at this time, I have set it for $500. Once we get a release date, etc. for the 2nd book, we will adjust. 

I have some interesting perks in store including, a copy of each book (separate or together), packages including the books with various stuffed sloths and the first printed copy of both books! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please don't worry if you're not able to help out with money. There are other ways you can help out:

  • You can spread the word about my website, aaronfoxwrites.com and you can like and invite other people to like my facebook page at facebook.com/aaronfoxwrites.
  • You can also share this campaign with anyone you know who may be starting a young family or who has a baby shower or child's birthday coming up early next year! Check the share settings here on Indiegogo.

story:
Kisllar is a Guardian Druyhen Zorihan who lives in the world of Haster. She receives a hard and dangerous mission from her leader, and in order to accomplish it, she will face great dangers on Nogrit, the black world, inhabited by treacherous, powerful and cruel beings. The destinies of human beings and of her own species depend on the success of her mission. Will she be able to overcome all obstacles and win this great battle?






“…The author takes us into an enchanting world with such a wealth of detail that often makes us believe we are really there.  There are so many colours with different shades, bright and glittering; so many birds, flowers, waterfalls… The scenary is gorgeous and we feel like moving to this fantasy world..."

Mônica Bastos

Oxford Teacher's Academy - University of Oxford


“... The author of this fascinating work manages to create a storyline that can bring her readers to reflect upon ethical values of the utmost importance nowadays, not only to the improvement of life of men in society but also to the life of other beings, the life of the planet itself..."

Carla Cristina Perozzo

Master in Ancient Philoshophy - UFRJ



The Zorihans is a children's and youth series of three fantasy novels that brings a unique story about the creation of planet Earth, the origin of evil, who we were, where we came from, what we are and where we are going. This work gives us a new version for some historical and scientific facts, generally little known. The story mixes fiction with reality creatively, making us rethink what we know about our origins. Using mystery, suspense, action, magic, enchantment, creatures from other dimensions and new worlds, among other things. The book was written in a simple, clear and well detailed, which enables us to an enjoyable read.



 My name is Shirly F. Costa, I am writer and plastic artist. I have as a hobby the study of articles and documents that show us many theories about the creation of the world, the apocalypse, the afterlife, paranormal phenomena, UFOs, archaeological discoveries, witches, vampires, among others. 

Write "Trilogy-Zórihans" gives me great pleasure, because its foundations throughout its history the vast knowledge I acquired with solid and fascinating research on issues that stir our imagination and emotion. In this work I became interested in creating a fantastic story of the eternal struggle between good and evil. Believing this to be the most attractive subject in recent years, as currently much is said about the impending destruction of the planet Earth and its inhabitants.



In 2011, I was fortunate able to -with great effort and with the help of an independent Publisher que acreditou em mim- launch a small drawing, the first volume of the trilogy "Zórihans - The Ones Born From The Drems", written by me. Without funding, there was no opportunity to advertise my work. To my surprise, despite the circulation is very small and not having the required disclosure that the work deserved, it made great success among those who could read it. 

Since the launch of the project in 2011 so far in 2015, I have received several e-mails from children, teenagers and even some adults from Brazil and other countries like the US, as also did online distribution, who read the first volume and crave the two remaining volumes of the trilogy Zórihans be edited. I confess that I was overwhelmed with the positive reviews I received on my literary work. Found by chance on the Internet, a group of young people who were trying to recreate the characters of Zórihans book with animated dolls. I read thrilled the account of one of the young girls said that after reading my book, she began to dream of being a writer and write like me.

 Unfortunately the small, independent publisher that helped me to start this project, can not afford to continue the work of my book because they are going through financial difficulties. They continue to help me, but can not afford the production of my book despite believe that the continuation of the trilogy really deserves to be published, so they advised me to try to raise funds because they think it's worth. The major publishers in Brazil usually not bet on writers not renowned. Although I know and have had evidence that my story is really very good, I do not have the financial resources necessary to be able to continue my literary project.



You will be helping to produce a paperback and e-book edition of Zorihans trilogy:

  • Zorihans: The Ones Born From The Dreams (Vol. 1)
  • Zorihans: The Humanax Mission (Vol. 2)
  • Zorihans: The Black Heart (Vol. 3)


Our goal is to cover the costs of:

  •   The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 1
  •   The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 1
  •   The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 2
  •   The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 2
  •   The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 3
  •   The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 3
  •   Translation from Portuguese into English (Volume 2 and 3)
  •   Review and Correction (Volume 2 and 3 - Portuguese and English)
  •   Cover design and editing services
  •   E-book edition of Volume 2 and 3


Dimensions and materials of the book in paperback:

14x21 cm, matte lamination, polychrome relief, hood with supreme high whiteness paper 250g  and core paper Pollen Bold 70.


If the value of our target is exceeded, the extra will be used to publicity of Zórihans trilogy.


*** Tax and fees are applied by paypal and IndieGoGo to the amount of funds raised




You will gain an e-book before I reach my goal

This campaign is fixed  but who get the Perk containing  e-book edition of "Zórihans: The Ones Born From The Drems" (Vol. 1), will receive this  e-book before I reach my goal. This will be my gift in appreciation for you who are helping me in this campaign!

When will you receive the signed paperback book or e-book that you have chosen? 

After the campaign is over and I have reached my goal, funds will be sent to my PayPal account within 15 business days of the campaign's deadline. After this I will start the entire book production process in paperback and digital edition, this will take about 8-12 weeks. I will keep you updated in every step finalized until the Perk chosen by you arrive in your hand. Because we live thousand miles away, shipping may take a while to arrive. My expectation is that e-books will be delivered until February 2016 and the paperback until March 2016


-All Perks are self-explanatory, if you have any doubts you can contact me.
-The Perks including paperback edition are already embedded shipping costs worldwide.

*** With a fixed funding campaign, I only keep the funds I raise if I meet my funding goal. If your campaign does not meet its goal by its deadline, all contributions will be refunded back to the contributors by Indiegogo within 3-5 business days.


For the Zórihans, these enlightened beings of haster world come to life and spread your love and light, for our planet, bringing hope and rekindling within each of us, the dream of a better world. They need as well as in the book, a little bit of love, each one of you. You will be the source of love on earth, where the Zórihans will extract the raw good material used by them, always put on evil. The Zórihas and I need your support. Thanks.



Other Ways You Can Help


If you do not have money to contribute now, you can help too making some noise and sharing my campaign worldwide. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

help of an independent Publisher que acreditou em mim- launch a small drawing,
the first volume of the trilogy "Zórihans - The Ones Born From The
Drems", written by me. Without funding, there was no opportunity to
advertise my work. To my surprise, despite the circulation is very small and
not having the required disclosure that the work deserved, it made great
success among those who could read it. 
Since the launch of
the project in 2011 so far in 2015, I have received several e-mails from
children, teenagers and even some adults from Brazil and other countries like
the US, as also did online distribution, who read the first volume and crave
the two remaining volumes of the trilogy Zórihans be edited. I confess that I
was overwhelmed with the positive reviews I received on my literary work. Found
by chance on the Internet, a group of young people who were trying to recreate
the characters of Zórihans book with animated dolls. I read thrilled the
account of one of the young girls said that after reading my book, she began to
dream of being a writer and write like me.

 Unfortunately
the small, independent publisher that helped me to start this project, can not
afford to continue the work of my book because they are going through financial
difficulties. They continue to help me, but can not afford the production of my
book despite believe that the continuation of the trilogy really deserves to be
published, so they advised me to try to raise funds because they think it's worth.
The major publishers in Brazil usually not bet on writers not renowned.
Although I know and have had evidence that my story is really very good, I do
not have the financial resources necessary to be able to continue my literary
project.





You will be helping to produce a paperback and e-book edition of Zorihans trilogy:




Zorihans: The Ones Born From The Dreams (Vol. 1)


Zorihans: The Humanax Mission (Vol. 2)


Zorihans: The Black Heart (Vol. 3)





Our goal is to cover the costs of:




  The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 1


  The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 1


  The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 2


  The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 2


  The print run of 1,000 books in Portuguese of Volume 3


  The print run of 500 books in English of Volume 3


  Translation from Portuguese into English (Volume 2 and 3)


  Review and Correction (Volume 2 and 3 - Portuguese and English)


  Cover design and editing services


  E-book edition of Volume 2 and 3





Dimensions and materials of the book in paperback:
14x21 cm, matte lamination, polychrome relief, hood with supreme high whiteness paper 250g  and core paper Pollen Bold 70.

If the value of our target is exceeded, the extra will be used to publicity of Zórihans trilogy.

*** Tax and fees are applied by paypal and IndieGoGo to the amount of funds raised






You will gain an e-book before I reach my goal
This campaign is fixed  but who get the Perk containing  e-book edition of "Zórihans: The Ones Born From The Drems" (Vol. 1), will receive this  e-book before I reach my goal. This will be my gift in appreciation for you who are helping me in this campaign!



When will you receive the signed paperback book or e-book that you have chosen? 
After the campaign is over and I have reached my goal, funds will be sent to my PayPal account within 15 business days of the campaign's deadline. After this I will start the entire book production process in paperback and digital edition, this will take about 8-12 weeks. I will keep you updated in every step finalized until the Perk chosen by you arrive in your hand. Because we live thousand miles away, shipping may take a while to arrive. My expectation is that e-books will be delivered until February 2016 and the paperback until March 2016
-All Perks are self-explanatory, if you have any doubts you can contact me.

-The Perks including paperback edition are already embedded shipping costs worldwide.


*** With a fixed funding campaign, I only keep the funds I raise if I meet my funding goal. If your campaign does not meet its goal by its deadline, all contributions will be refunded back to the contributors by Indiegogo within 3-5 business days.

They need as well as in the book, a little bit of love, each one of you. You will be the source of love on earth, where the Zórihans will extract the raw good material used by them, always put on evil. The Zórihas and I need your support. Thanks.

story:
Nebel zieht auf über Dartmoor!
Das schaurige Heulen eines Hundes!
Der Schrei eines Mannes in höchster Todesangst!

„Der Hund der Baskervilles“ sucht ein neues Opfer! Einer alten Familienlegende entsprungen, bedroht er das Leben von Sir Henry Baskerville. Sherlock Holmes und John Watson nehmen sich des Falls an...
 

Hallo zusammen,
mein Name ist Thorsten. Ich bin Projektleiter einer neuen Sherlock-Holmes-Collection. Zusammen mit Autor und Schauspieler Oliver Bokern, den viele von euch aus der Sat.1-Serie „Verliebt in Berlin“ oder aus dem WDR-Tatort Münster kennen, möchte ich euch unser erstes ungewöhnliche Sherlock-Holmes-Hörbuch präsentieren.

Klar, es gibt schon zahllose Hörbücher und -spiele, basierend auf den spannenden Fällen des Sherlock Holmes und seinem Partner John Watson. Aber keines wie dieses!

»Der Hund der Baskervilles« oder
Wie sich der Fall wirklich zutrug.

Nach dem vor einigen Jahren im Depot des British Museum eine Truhe aus dem Privatbesitz des John Watson wiederentdeckt und näher untersucht wurde, fand man in einem Geheimfach versteckte, bisher unbekannte Aufzeichnungen. Nach genauer Studie der offenbar eilig verfassten Schriften, stellte man fest, dass einige der von Watson seinerzeit beschriebenen Fälle sich ganz anders zutrugen, als bisher bekannt. Unter ihnen fand man einen der bekanntesten Fälle: »Der Hund der Baskervilles«.

Die Aufzeichnungen geben verborgenen Seiten Watsons preis, von denen wir alle nichts ahnten. Die Texte des John H. Watson erzählen von intimen Details, heimlichen Wünschen und der perfiden Grausamkeit des Täters, in einer Art, wie man sie dem viktorianischen Leser wohl nicht zuzumuten wagte. Doch jetzt, im Jahre 2018, ist die Zeit gekommen.

Wir finden, die Welt soll erfahren, wie es wirklich war!

Rätselhafte Ereignisse, Erotik und das höllische Jaulen eines Teufelshundes machen diese Geschichte zu einem mitreißenden Abenteuer. Woher kommt die Bestie, warum tötet sie Sir Charles, was hat es mir dem Fluch der Baskervilles auf sich? Wer kann das mörderische Monstertier stoppen? Welche Gräuel verbergen sich im düsteren Moor? Was gibt es frei und was wird es für immer in seinem tiefen Schlund gefangen halten? Zärtlichkeit und Zerstörung sind Geschwister. Watsons scheuer Herzschlag beim Blick in Henrys schönen Augen wäre beinahe sein letzter gewesen, denn die Bestie nähert sich aus Dartmoors nebeligen Tiefen… Nur der unbestechliche, klare Verstand Sherlock Holmes wird all diese Rätsel lösen. Nur er kann Watson aus der Gefahr retten, in die ihn der Meisterdetektiv selbst gebracht hat.

Der Autor Oliver Bokern konnte Einsicht in die geheimen Aufzeichnungen des John H. Watson nehmen und aus den sehr persönlich gehaltenen Zeilen ein spannendes Hörbuch verfassen. Bitte helft uns, es erklingen zu lassen.



Wir haben uns bewusst für diese Aktion bei Indiegogo entschieden, da wir hier die Freiheit haben, euch unser Projekt ohne Abstriche präsentieren zu können. Der genannte Betrag wird ausschließlich für die Produktionskosten (Sprecher, Studio, Print und Druck) benötigt.

Unser Vorhaben ist es, das Hörbuch als digitalen Download (z.B. Amazon, iTunes) anzubieten. Aber es geht noch weiter ...

Als besonderes Dankeschön für alle, die sich an unserer Aktion beteiligen, möchten wir eine CD & Collector‘s Edition anbieten, die es nur hier bei Indiegogo zu erwerben gibt.

Im Stil alten Horror- und Gespenster-Titelcover, die in den 80er-Jahren im Bastei-Verlag erschienen sind, hat unser Hörbuch folgende Extras:

  • von Sprecher & Autor unserer Geschichte Oliver Bokern handsigniert
  • das Hörbuch erscheint in einem hochwertigen DVD-Jewelcase, dem ein exklusives Booklet mit dem kompletten Hörbuchtext beiliegend
  • unser Titelcover und fünf Artprints, die Szenen der Geschichte wiedergeben, in DIN-A5-Format

Wir würden uns sehr über eure Unterstützung freuen und bedanken uns an dieser Stelle für euer Interesse an unserem ersten Sherlock-Holmes-Hörbuch. Bei weiteren Fragen zögert nicht uns zu kontaktieren. Wir beantworten gerne eure Fragen.

In diesem Sinne: „The game is afoot, Watson!“

Viele Grüße

Thorsten & Oliver

story:
The publication’s main mission is to provide a platform for Black, Indigenous, and People of Colour (BIPoC) from across (Colonially Known As) “Canada” to speak about the social impact of mental health through the lens of racialized experiences.

The project originally comes from a need to highlight more BIPoC artists and writers in the predominantly-white “Canadian” spoken word scene (especially wimmin, femmes, and folks outside the binary), as well as the social and psychological impact of mental health narratives long dominated by white supremacy.

Although explicitly titled and focused for BIPoC, this project also recognizes the need for welcomed inclusion LGBTQQIP2SAA, queer, genderqueer, trans, non-binary, bigender and agender representation, visibility for disabled individuals, and across intersections of all social marginalization.

There will be no consideration for any material embodying or representing the same hateful, discriminatory, and oppressive systems which currently exist as the object of our resistance.  This includes (but is not limited to): anti-blackness, homophobia, ableism, Islamophobia, misogyny, misogynoir, cis-sexism, transphobia, anti-Semitism, serophobia, classism, etc. Kyriarchy is a Rubik’s cube of various systems we can unlock and break down with time, patience, energy, care (for self and community), and most importantly, love as radical justice.

 

For more information, please contact: 

Samuel “Bassam” Halévy

Curator, editor-in-chief

BIPOC.pills@gmail.com

story:
Oriana is a young woman who can remember only one thing: waking up alone in a cold, damp and dark room full of nightmares. Once out she has no recollection of how she escaped, where she had been or why she had even been there in the first place.

Ciel is a demon with many secrets and her only hope. Now that she has exhausted all avenues in the human realm she must turn to another, more sinister locale, for the solutions to her problems.

Oriana follows a butterfly which leads her to his establishment and his ability to discern the answers she seeks. He is also the only one who will give her a 'fair' contract and might not take her soul. Together they embark on a journey about finding the truth hidden within her very mind. Eventually returning to the strange room and revealing its secrets once and for all.

 

Wishmaster is a fictional tale which blends the genres of mystery, fantasy, and romance to create a developed and intriguing read. I have blended my own creations within a world of myth and fables to create a living, breathing universe. It has a word count of 55,025 and at the bottom of my campaign, I have placed a sample of my writing from the prologue.

I began writing my novel about two years ago. I have been an avid writter throughout my life, but this is my first serious project. My story took shape from  a dream, paired with my imagination, and thus it evolved into its current state of existence. Now it is a fully edited manuscript, currently edited by me. This is my dream and I love this project. I lack the funds to do this on my own and is why I created this campaign and ask for your support. With your help, my dream can become a reality, and a book for you!

Should my campaign receive the funding required, I will use it to utilize a publishing company that specializes in self-publishing. Giving me the closest experience to traditional publishing possible. This publisher will provide me with the benefits of their experience, marketing, and formatting skills for my novel. As soon as I meet my goal and receive the funds from my campaign, I will open serious negotiations with the publisher and printers. I cannot say how long it will take for the book to go from manuscript to print but I promise to keep my backers updated every step of the way!

 

As of right now this is what my budget looks like:

$10,000  for the cost of hiring the publishers and their expertise. Here is a list of benefits I will receive:

Includes:

  • Interior layout, proper formatting for print-on-demand and ebooks*
  • Content Edit (for what this is, see page above sample)
  • Distribution of your book in paperback format
  • Book sales on Amazon.com, Chapters.Indigo.ca and other online retailers
  • Availability via Ingram** to 38,000 booksellers including Chapters and independent bookstores
  • Automatic printing and fulfillment of all book orders
  • 2 ISBNs (1 for paperback, 1 for ebooks)
  • 100% net royalties and no mark-up on printing***
  • Ebook Distribution
    • Kindle ebook sales
    • Kobo ebook sales
    • Nook eBook (Barnes and Noble)
    • Apple iBooks distribution
    • Baker and Taylor ebook distribution
    • OverDrive ebook distribution to libraries
    • Oyster ebook distribution
    • Select additional ebook channels
  • Back cover book description – we’ll write enticing marketing copy
  • Comprehensive Marketing Support
    • Book Publicity consultation and strategy
    • Press Release
    • Targeted media list
    • Author Website
    • Media Outreach: Help with initial publicity for launch of book

* While design is included for most books, design-intensive books (e.g. more than 25 images, charts, complexities) will require a quote. ** After the first year, authors are responsible for a small annual distribution fee, currently about $15 per year

 

$3616 for printing costs to get the book out to backers who have backed enough to get a copy. As the self-publishing world is largely Print-on-Demand (they print a copy of the book when one is sold so that there is no overall cost to me) the cost for printing books for backer rewards falls to me. 

$1106.27 for print costs of perk images (should EVERY perk with an image be taken)

$11000 for shipping and handling (should every shipping perk be taken)

$2160 for crowdfunding fees

= $28000

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to read about my project, and even more so if you’ve decided to become a backer to my dream! If you cannot contribute but are still willing to help, please share my campaign where you can! The more people it reaches, the more chance of success!

Every perk now gets a bookmark image for printing off. This bookmark will be customed designed to go with the story, done by the artist who did the cover art, A. Taylor. It is only written on the Thank You! level but it is included with ALL perks.

Everyone who donates but does not take a perk will get a non-special thank you note for contributing. The $15 and above thank you is on a special image done by the same artist, designed to go with the story and make your note unique. These notes will also be longer than the non-perk thank you.

Why fixed funding for such a large amount?

That's easy to answer. I don't have the money to put in should the campaign fail. I would have no way to fulfill my obligations to my backers.

What are the types of editing? Well here are the definitions from the publisher!

Copy Edit (2 cents per word): Copy editing catches the grammar and spelling mistakes and ensures your manuscript meets Canadian Press style requirements, the Chicago Manual of Style, or whichever authority is most relevant. Copy editing also cleans up awkward or sloppy sentences. A copy editor sees the errors that you as the author cannot see because you are too immersed in your project

 

Content Edit (3.5 cents per word): Content editing goes through your manuscript for the intangibles that make a manuscript a great manuscript. Your editor will look for things such as plot progression, character development, hanging plot-lines, redundancies and tone. The goal of the content editor is to make sure that your manuscript is in the best possible shape for the market. This service also includes a full copy edit in the price.

Why is this a concept if the book is finished?

This is labelled as concept as I do not have a physical paperback book to show you. All you can hold is my manuscript and the original artworks. To me a prototype would be having it already edited, designed and one printed.

Sample:

“She awoke to pain. It was pain unlike any she had ever been in before and was a fire in her limbs. At first there was no space for thought of where she was or why she was there, only the pain could be focused on. Only the pain could be given any attention at all. She wasn't sure how long it took and she wasn't sure how she managed to do it but eventually she was able to look past the pain slightly. Her breathing was ragged but passable for normal with a few deep breaths. The haze began to lift from her mind and she understood that her eyes were closed. Deciding against opening them for now she let the waves of pain be dealt with by her body as she tried to understand something of her body's condition. It was impossible. With how much she hurt there was nothing left to understand. So there she stayed, not even knowing if she was sitting or lying down, until the convulsions came. When they hit they hit hard. Every muscle in her body seemed to be dancing to its own personal tune and caused her body to ricochet around. It could have only been minutes or it could have been hours and it would have made no difference to her. Her body was out of her control. It made it hard to breathe, hard to do anything but let her limbs do what they wanted as her chest muscles contracted. When everything was finally over there was a great absence in her. At first she was relieved by the nothingness but as it continued she began to grow worried.

What if I died?

Slowly she began to try and move her fingers. It took some effort but she was able to move them and eventually feeling returned to her hands. There was dirt under her, it was moist but not so much so that she could no longer feel the individual grains of the earth and tell that there seemed to be some sand mixed in. She was also feeling the dirt on her palm and when she clutched her fingers she got some under her nails, when she flattened them again she could feel little divets in the ground where her nails had scratched lines. Where was the moisture coming from though? She began to try and twitch various muscles throughout her body so that she could return feeling to the rest of her. Slowly she began with her lower arms, and once those muscles moved she work on her upper arms. In this manner she worked her way through her entire body. She wasn’t very successful and grew somewhat despondent. What if she was broken somehow? She thought back to her hands and wondered if she could have felt what she had felt if something was seriously wrong with her. In a way she had gained good information from her hands, information she would not have thought possible to get just from your palms. She must be in a somewhat sitting and upright position if she could feel the dirt in the manner that she had felt it.

Her back came alive suddenly. Damping down her excitement she focused on what she could gleam from the information her nerves were sending her way. It was cold, hard, rough and damp. It seemed to be somewhat slimy as well since whatever she was (or was not) wearing left her back bare. Her brain seemed to take this in and it took some time to figure out what it could possibly be that she was up against.

Rocks of some sort?

Where on earth was she? Normally she did not pay this much attention to her surroundings but the odd situation had made her focus extremely hard. Truth be told, this extreme focus was available only due to the adrenaline that must be rushing through her from her fear. She should have felt herself growing mentally tired from the effort but something allowed he to keep going. She decided that it was time to open her eyes and see the place that her muscles and nerves were describing. At first they were stuck together, as if she had had them closed for a long time and the 'sleepy dust' had built up, but she was able to pry them apart with some effort. It wasn't very useful. Wherever she was it was dark. There was no light here except for a faint crack of light directly in front of her at ground level, which she had to blink a few times to be able to see properly. It was some distance away but that was all she could tell. If she was going to get to it, which is what she figured that she would need to do, she would have to be able to stand up. Unfortunately she had a feeling that if she did the pain would return. And she really did not want that. The pain and convulsions had been quite enough for her, thank you very much. Why oh why hadn't opening her eyes been more useful? It was then, as she was bemoaning her situation that she heard it. It was soft at first but once she froze and focused on the sound she could hear it clearly. A moan.

I'm not alone in here.”

As the self-publishing world is largely Print-on-Demand (they print a copy of the book when one is sold so that there is no overall cost to me) the cost for printing books for backer rewards falls to me. $1106.27 for print costs of perk images (should EVERY perk with an image be taken)$11000 for shipping and handling (should every shipping perk be taken)$2160 for crowdfunding fees= $28000 Thank you so much for taking the time to read about my project, and even more so if you’ve decided to become a backer to my dream! If you cannot contribute but are still willing to help, please share my campaign where you can! The more people it reaches, the more chance of success!Every perk now gets a bookmark image for printing off. This bookmark will be customed designed to go with the story, done by the artist who did the cover art, A. Taylor. It is only written on the Thank You! level but it is included with ALL perks.Everyone who donates but does not take a perk will get a non-special thank you note for contributing. The $15 and above thank you is on a special image done by the same artist, designed to go with the story and make your note unique. These notes will also be longer than the non-perk thank you.Why fixed funding for such a large amount?That's easy to answer. I don't have the money to put in should the campaign fail. I would have no way to fulfill my obligations to my backers.What are the types of editing? Well here are the definitions from the publisher!Copy Edit (2 cents per word): Copy editing catches the grammar and spelling mistakes and ensures your manuscript meets Canadian Press style requirements, the Chicago Manual of Style, or whichever authority is most relevant. Copy editing also cleans up awkward or sloppy sentences. A copy editor sees the errors that you as the author cannot see because you are too immersed in your project Content Edit (3.5 cents per word): Content editing goes through your manuscript for the intangibles that make a manuscript a great manuscript. Your editor will look for things such as plot progression, character development, hanging plot-lines, redundancies and tone. The goal of the content editor is to make sure that your manuscript is in the best possible shape for the market. This service also includes a full copy edit in the price.Why is this a concept if the book is finished?This is labelled as concept as I do not have a physical paperback book to show you. All you can hold is my manuscript and the original artworks. To me a prototype would be having it already edited, designed and one printed.Sample:“She awoke to pain. It was pain unlike any she had ever been in before and was a fire in her limbs. At first there was no space for thought of where she was or why she was there, only the pain could be focused on. Only the pain could be given any attention at all. She wasn't sure how long it took and she wasn't sure how she managed to do it but eventually she was able to look past the pain slightly. Her breathing was ragged but passable for normal with a few deep breaths. The haze began to lift from her mind and she understood that her eyes were closed. Deciding against opening them for now she let the waves of pain be dealt with by her body as she tried to understand something of her body's condition. It was impossible. With how much she hurt there was nothing left to understand. So there she stayed, not even knowing if she was sitting or lying down, until the convulsions came. When they hit they hit hard. Every muscle in her body seemed to be dancing to its own personal tune and caused her body to ricochet around. It could have only been minutes or it could have been hours and it would have made no difference to her. Her body was out of her control. It made it hard to breathe, hard to do anything but let her limbs do what they wanted as her chest muscles contracted. When everything was finally over there was a great absence in her. At first she was relieved by the nothingness but as it continued she began to grow worried.What if I died?Slowly she began to try and move her fingers. It took some effort but she was able to move them and eventually feeling returned to her hands. There was dirt under her, it was moist but not so much so that she could no longer feel the individual grains of the earth and tell that there seemed to be some sand mixed in. She was also feeling the dirt on her palm and when she clutched her fingers she got some under her nails, when she flattened them again she could feel little divets in the ground where her nails had scratched lines. Where was the moisture coming from though? She began to try and twitch various muscles throughout her body so that she could return feeling to the rest of her. Slowly she began with her lower arms, and once those muscles moved she work on her upper arms. In this manner she worked her way through her entire body. She wasn’t very successful and grew somewhat despondent. What if she was broken somehow? She thought back to her hands and wondered if she could have felt what she had felt if something was seriously wrong with her. In a way she had gained good information from her hands, information she would not have thought possible to get just from your palms. She must be in a somewhat sitting and upright position if she could feel the dirt in the manner that she had felt it.Her back came alive suddenly. Damping down her excitement she focused on what she could gleam from the information her nerves were sending her way. It was cold, hard, rough and damp. It seemed to be somewhat slimy as well since whatever she was (or was not) wearing left her back bare. Her brain seemed to take this in and it took some time to figure out what it could possibly be that she was up against.Rocks of some sort?Where on earth was she? Normally she did not pay this much attention to her surroundings but the odd situation had made her focus extremely hard. Truth be told, this extreme focus was available only due to the adrenaline that must be rushing through her from her fear. She should have felt herself growing mentally tired from the effort but something allowed he to keep going. She decided that it was time to open her eyes and see the place that her muscles and nerves were describing. At first they were stuck together, as if she had had them closed for a long time and the 'sleepy dust' had built up, but she was able to pry them apart with some effort. It wasn't very useful. Wherever she was it was dark. There was no light here except for a faint crack of light directly in front of her at ground level, which she had to blink a few times to be able to see properly. It was some distance away but that was all she could tell. If she was going to get to it, which is what she figured that she would need to do, she would have to be able to stand up. Unfortunately she had a feeling that if she did the pain would return. And she really did not want that. The pain and convulsions had been quite enough for her, thank you very much. Why oh why hadn't opening her eyes been more useful? It was then, as she was bemoaning her situation that she heard it. It was soft at first but once she froze and focused on the sound she could hear it clearly. A moan.I'm not alone in here.”

LA HISTORIA

Hola!

Somos un grupo de estudiantes emprendedores, que sintió la necesidad de desarrollar esta idea  a raíz de un proyecto del curso de Innovación. 

En una de las tantas reuniones que tuvimos para hacer trabajos, se nos cruzó por la cabeza pedir algo de comer y uno de nuestros amigos que es intolerante al gluten, mostró su malestar y dificultad que siempre tiene al pedir comida por delivery ya que por su condición, necesita elegir productos específicos.

Así es como, nace la idea de llevar a la realidad LIGLU, un servicio de comida delivery con opciones Libres de gluten enfocadas a satisfacer las necesidades de personas celíacas.

Sabemos que el segmento de mercado al que nos dirigimos está en crecimiento, este segmento lo conforma no sólo personas intolerantes al gluten, sino también personas que les gusta alimentarse de manera saludable y que son miembros de una comunidad BIO que se viene desarrollando con fuerza en la capital y en el mundo. Existe un gran grupo de personas que aún no saben que tiene esta condición de intolerancia al gluten.

Nuestra principal motivación es hacer realidad este proyecto como una manera de apoyar a las personas que padecen esta enfermedad y que muchos de nosotros podemos padecerla sin saber. Necesitamos de su colaboración para poder iniciar este proyecto que nos va permitir concretar la propuesta de comida saludable libre de gluten que tenemos para uds.

¿QUÉ ES LO QUE NECESITAMOS?

Necesitamos recaudar $ 5000 que nos servirá para poner en marcha Liglu. Nuestra visión en Liglu es llegar a tantas personas como sea posible. Cada contribución para nosotros es muy valiosa, por lo que hemos incluido unos incentivos para ustedes. 

Sus contribuciones son invaluables y queremos agradecerles por ello!!

EL IMPACTO

Nosotros esperamos que a través de LIGLU se logre ver la importancia de llevar una dieta sin gluten y los beneficios que trae para su salud, ya que el acceso a este tipo de alimentos es costoso y no es muy comercial.

Queremos ser parte del movimiento vive sin gluten y contar con el apoyo de la Asociación de Celíacos del Perú para la difusión de nuestro proyecto.

RIESGOS Y DESAFÍOS 

Riesgos:

  • Personas que son celíacas y que no tienen conocimiento de la enfermedad. 
  • Aperturas de restaurantes que preparen comidas sin gluten en la zona de San Isidro.
  • No llegar a nuestra rentabilidad deseada.
  • Ingreso al mercado de productos libre de gluten.

Desafíos:

  • Lograr la satisfacción de nuestros clientes del servicio que brindamos.
  • Ofrecer variedad de menús a base de ingredientes libre de gluten. 
  • Expandir nuestro servicio a los diferentes distritos de la capital.

Nuestro plan para solucionar estos desafíos.

  • Contar con un personal calificado en la preparación de las comidas sin gluten.
  • Realizar campañas de diagnóstico de la enfermedad.
  • Atención personalizada a nuestros clientes.
  • Publicaciones de boletines informativos a nuestro público objetivo.
  • Contar con un área post venta del servicio que ofrecemos.

RECOMPENSAS

  • $ 5.00 Gracias!! tu acabas de apoyarnos por lo que mereces recibir unas deliciosas galletas de agradecimiento por parte de todo nuestro equipo!
  • $ 15.00 Recibe 3 menú de lanzamiento! te haremos llegar 3 menús Liglu directamente a tu casa u oficina.
  • $ 30.00  obtendrás 6 deliciosos menús!  y un vale de descuento del 10% en tu siguiente compra.
  • $ 60.00  recibirás por dos semanas (de Lunes a Viernes) nuestros menús! y nuestra cuponera de descuentos.

OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDA

Corre la voz!!  ¡ Dile a tus amigos sobre nuestra campaña! 

Síguenos en Facebook e Instagram!

También puedes compartir esta campaña utilizando las herramientas de compartir de Indiegogo.

story:
A Cause Close to my Heart:

In 2002, I began my journey to fight against cancer by running for the Leukemia & Lymphoma’s Society Team in Training (TNT) Program (teamintraining.org). After losing my grandfather to Lymphoma in 2012, this cause became even more important to me. The passing of my grandfather drove me to write the story that had been in my heart for years.  

Through personal fundraising efforts, I have raised over $10,000 for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (L&L). Last year, I successfully funded a campaign to bring Susie Tries to life and this book has inspired children across America to set high goals and accomplish them just like Susie! 

Here are some of the many supporters of Susie Tries enjoying their book: 

My Goals:

Now that Susie Tries is in print, I have even bigger goals for this book. First and foremost, I want to donate copies of Susie Tries to TNT chapters and participants for them to sell. All of the proceeds made from Susie Tries will then be given to the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. I will also sell copies at USA triathlon events, children’s triathlons, and other events that support the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society to raise additional funds for the L&L Society. 

I need $10,000 ($10 per book) in order to purchase 1,000 copies of Susie Tries to raise funds for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. 

What you get for your Contribution:

There are several unique rewards offered as a thank you for your generous contribution: 

-Susie Tries Bookmarks ($3)

-Susie Tries Wristbands ($5)

-Triathlon Training Manual E-Book ($10)

-Susie Tries T-shirts in yellow and Carolina blue ($12)

-Limited edition Susie Tries T-shirt in purple! ($20)

-A copy of Susie Tries ($10/book)

-An autographed copy of Susie Tries ($15)

-An autographed copy of Susie Tries with a personal, inspirational message ($20)

-A limited edition copy of Susie Tries with a special message from the real Susie! ($30) (Only FIVE available!) 

-AND you can donate one, five, or even ten copies of Susie Tries to a TNT chapter! ($10/book)

Give the gift of life by donating copies of this book to help raise funds for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society! 

Please send an email to susietries@gmail.com if you want a specific TNT Chapter to receive this donated copy.

Anyone who makes a purchase over $30 will be entered to win 1 of 3 special gift baskets featuring Susie Tries flip flops, swim cap, wrist band, and T-shirt!

Here are some illustrations from Susie Tries: 

How Susie TriesBegan:

Susie Tries was inspired by my triathlon coach for the TNT program in Lexington, KY, Susan Bradley Cox (http://www.triforsight.com/about-susan/). Susan was not only a coach but also a mentor and an inspiration to hundreds of athletes, many of whom were battling cancer. Her perseverance and determination greatly inspired me because she encouraged all those she met to never give up—a technique she faithfully practiced. 

I carried these traits into Susie Tries to teach children the valuable lesson that winning does not mean coming in first; it means setting and achieving your goals! In this book, Susie races in her very first triathlon to help raise awareness about cancer. 

Triathlons may seem like an adult sport, but they are gaining popularity among young people because they focus on three activities children understand and also love to do: swimming, riding a bike, and running. Because triathlons are an excellent example of a sport where winning is about an accomplishment, not a score, I chose this activity to teach children valuable assets such as: self-confidence, motivation, a healthy lifestyle, and compassion for others. To me, triathlons symbolize this strong will to live and the inner strength children need to succeed in life.

Though Susie may not win the race, she wins more than a trophy. At just eight years old, she wins by raising awareness for cancer and finishing the race! 

Susan and her triathletes: 

The Impact: 

Every day, thousands of people are battling cancer and striving to make it to the finish line. 

Please join Susie and I in our race to fight cancer. Your contribution will inspire children to set and achieve goals while simultaneously helping raise funds in hopes of curing a cancer that has taken the lives of many.  As eight-year-old Susie would say, all you have to do is try, try, try and you can achieve your goals! 

Risks and Challenges:

Susie Tries has already been written, illustrated, and published. The additional copies purchased through this site will need to be sent to the publisher and printed, which can take 1-2 months. Once that is complete, Susie Tries will be shipped to you and donated to organizations that will raise funds and awareness for Leukemia and Lymphoma. 

Susie Tries book reading: 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Please share our campaign and help get the word out so that we can reach our goal!

If you would like to purchase or donate Susie Tries, please email susietries@gmail.com to register. Please indicate how many copies of Susie Tries you wish to purchase or donate. If the book(s) is to be donated, please indicate the TNT chapter you want to receive the book(s).

If additional funds are raised through this campaign, they will be donated to charity. 

Follow us on social media and visit our website for more information: 

susietries.com

https://www.facebook.com/susietries/

story:
'The Stories We Write'  - community shortstory writing

Hello, my name is Sjaak, I live near Rotterdam (Netherlands). As publisher me and my wife have published magazines about leadership. Now we want to publish books with short stories, both fiction and non fiction, in the series ‘The Stories We Write’. 

The first book will be a non fiction one, .... titled ‘I am different, hope you don’t mind’.

In my own contribution to this book I want to take you along on a major change in my role as a father. In 1987 I became the proud father of a son. Now, 30 years later, that son is my daughter. My child is different now, although that didn’t happen overnight. She will write about this in the first edition as one of the stories in 'The Stories We Write'.

Are you different, or do you feel different ?

We would like to receive more stories about people being or feeling different. Are you different from other people or have you ever felt different in any way and have you ever felt like writing that down and sharing that with others?

This might be an opportunity as we want to compile stories as yours. Take courage. You don’t have to be the best writer. Write from the heart and exercise your skills in the meantime. We want to publish your story.

It would be such a collective performance to share wonderful stories with family, friends and if possible sharing them in a wider circle. We would be most greatful if we can pursuade you to back us. 

How can you contribute and how will we thank you 

  • Write your short story on 10 pages maximum, send it in, find 10 sponsors amongst family and friends for who you purchase one book each (so 10 together).
  • We will campaign, compile the stories, print publish and ship the books to you and other backers.
  • Or back us up by purchasing one book and receive the first edition of The Stories We Write.

Stretched goals

  • The Stories We Write wants to form a community of writers experienced and inexperienced to publish a title every month. The first edition is printed as a paperback. Our ambition is publishing hard cover books and color in future editions. Therefor we need fundings to reach these goals. If we reach 120% for this first pledge we will publish this in hard cover without raising the price or shipping costs.

Risks & Challenges

As we go for fixed crowdfunding there are no risks when we do not reach our pledge. Backers will get their money back, so there will be no losses.

When shipping the books we will choose to use tracking and tracing, so we will always find the goods for our backers. We will folow your order.

If we print and publish the books in the Netherlands, we are able to see the results and can judge  customer satisfaction.

To keep shipping costs as low as feasable we consider to print in both USA for local (and Canada and Australia) and Netherlands for Europe. In the perks we offer and add shipping costs. If we print in the USA the shipping costs can be lower than we offered now. We will compensate the lower costs.

In our proposal we have calculated and showed the costs for one book. When ordering multiple books, shipping costs are drastically cheaper. That advantage is of course entirely for the benefit of the backer. If this might go wrong on the indigogo website, we will defenitly refund this asap.

As we have experience with publishing magazines, sending the books will not cause any problems.

Helping without having money to spend. 

If you have sympathy for our initiative but you cannot spend money, help us by spreading this initiative. Provide us e-mail addresses of friends and ralations (with permission) that we can send our e-mail up-date.

We would like to receive more stories about people being or feeling different. Are you different from other people or have you ever felt different in any way and have you ever felt like writing that down and sharing that with others?
This might be an opportunity as we want to compile stories as yours. Take courage. You don’t have to be the best writer. Write from the heart and exercise your skills in the meantime. We want to publish your story.
It would be such a collective performance to share wonderful stories with family, friends and if possible sharing them in a wider circle. We would be most greatful if we can pursuade you to back us. 
How can you contribute and how will we thank you 


Write your short story on 10 pages maximum, send it in, find 10 sponsors amongst family and friends for who you purchase one book each (so 10 together).
We will campaign, compile the stories, print publish and ship the books to you and other backers.
Or back us up by purchasing one book and receive the first edition of The Stories We Write.

Stretched goals
The Stories We Write wants to form a community of writers experienced and inexperienced to publish a title every month. The first edition is printed as a paperback. Our ambition is publishing hard cover books and color in future editions. Therefor we need fundings to reach these goals. If we reach 120% for this first pledge we will publish this in hard cover without raising the price or shipping costs.
Risks & Challenges
As we go for fixed crowdfunding there are no risks when we do not reach our pledge. Backers will get their money back, so there will be no losses.
When shipping the books we will choose to use tracking and tracing, so we will always find the goods for our backers. We will folow your order.
If we print and publish the books in the Netherlands, we are able to see the results and can judge  customer satisfaction.
To keep shipping costs as low as feasable we consider to print in both USA for local (and Canada and Australia) and Netherlands for Europe. In the perks we offer and add shipping costs. If we print in the USA the shipping costs can be lower than we offered now. We will compensate the lower costs.
In our proposal we have calculated and showed the costs for one book. When ordering multiple books, shipping costs are drastically cheaper. That advantage is of course entirely for the benefit of the backer. If this might go wrong on the indigogo website, we will defenitly refund this asap.
As we have experience with publishing magazines, sending the books will not cause any problems.

Helping without having money to spend. 
If you have sympathy for our initiative but you cannot spend money, help us by spreading this initiative. Provide us e-mail addresses of friends and ralations (with permission) that we can send our e-mail up-date.

story:
Short Summary

Of Fire and Ice (OFAI as we lovingly call it) is the novel that has been swimming in our heads for about 13 years. It has gone through so many incarnations we can hardly count them, and finally it is at a stage where we're happy with where it is and where it is going. We're ready to finish this thing!

OFAI centers around twin girls named Yami and Ardon, whose lives are upended when they are kidnapped by a terrifying man who calls himself Ryute. Within the space of a day, everything they knew is skewed -- magic is real and they have it. They will find friends and collaborators along the way, but who can they really trust except each other? After all, blood is thicker...Right?

So that's our story, but who are we?

I'm Chelsea Howard, the first spark of this story was a short little tale I wrote about getting kidnapped. I've been obsessed with this idea ever since. Through the stages of my youth and the start of my adult life, this story has been a staple of who I am as a writer and artist. Yami, my half of the twins, is probably my most drawn and doodled character.

My co-author is Shannon McCosh. She's currently dealing with college and a job, so I'm going to take the liberty of introducing her. Most of OFAI's best twists and turns have come from her genius. She wrote the first half of the book, of course with lots of input and advice from me, but now that she's in college and working simultaneously, it's up to me to pull the rest of the book out of our minds and onto paper.

The funds from this campaign will go toward two things primarily: Chelsea's living expenses while she finishes the book, and printing costs to get the book out to you guys! With your help, the alternate reality that has lived in our heads for 13 years will finally get to live in other's minds too. With your help, our life long dreams of being published authors, of doing justice to the characters that so graciously gave us their stories...can all come true.

What We Need & What You Get

We've got a funding goal of $15,000. This will go to several places:

  • $6000: printing expenses for 300 paperbacks  and 100 hardcovers if we don't pick up a publisher! If we do get a publisher this expense should go down significantly.
  • $4000: My living expenses for four months, our estimate of how long it will take me to finish the book while writing full time.
  • $3000: Taxes! Assuming we get fully funded, we're planning on 20% in taxes.
  • $1000: Shannon needs a new computer as her laptop is about 7 years old and has gotten to the point of malfunction where it cannot run DropBox, which we use to keep our copies of the story available to each other.
  • $600: IndieGoGo Fees

And what do you, our wonderful backers, get in return for your assistance? Well, a wide range of things, depending on your level of amazing.

  • All levels of funding will get a copy of the book, either digital, paperback or hardback, and most levels get them autographed! (except the digital, of course. That would just be silly.)
  • Did I mention we're artists, too? Most levels get a small art print created by the authors.
  • Ever wanted your name in a book? The higher levels get their names mentioned on a thank you page in the book, and a personal thank you note from the authors.
  • Do you want to know what could have happened? The highest levels get an extra book of the two alternate endings to the story.
  • Want an even more personal touch? At the very highest level of funding you actually get a 30 minute Skype call with both authors. We'll answer your questions about our inspiration, our favorite books, and our plans for the future. 


The Impact

With this campaign, you're funding more than a book. You are helping two budding authors realize their lifelong dream. You're helping an extraordinary tale of struggle and heroism step out into the world to be seen and experienced as it was meant to be. You are making our fantasy a reality.

As Howard Thurman once said: "Don't ask yourself what the world needs. Ask yourself what makes you come alive and then go do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive."

This is what makes us come alive. This story is a piece of each of our souls, and this piece needs desperately to be seen in order to live.

 

Risks & Challenges

One of the challenges we will face is finding a publisher. We have planned this campaign such that if we are unable to find someone to publish our novel we can still self-publish. At the moment we have  potential publisher in mind and are gathering information on how best to contact them.

Another key challenge is being able to write the book in a timely fashion. Recently, I ran a writing test day to see how much I can feasibly write in one day. I wrote nearly double what I had anticipated being able to write! With that base number solidified, I am confident I can finish a full draft of the novel in four months, writing full time. This timeline includes a reasonable buffer to make room for unpredictable issues such as illnesses. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. Get excited! Print out the previews we create and share them with your friends. Like and share our Facebook page. If you like our writing, tell people! That is the best thing you can give us if you are unable to financially support this project: PUBLICITY.

story:
About 

I started designing and selling stationery while completing a B.S. in Graphic Design. I've worked as a graphic designer for a government contractor, a creative strategist for a B2B publisher and a director of marketing for a data company. I am inspired by female entrepreneurship, hope to be able to employ designers and bring sophisticated design and planning/branding to those planning their special milestone events. 

I have sold products to over 3,500 customers domestically and internationally utilizing various ecommerce platforms. Aster Grace is looking to break free of being dependent on other channels so we can concentrate on selling specific lines exclusively available on the Aster Grace website. 

 

How Backing Aster Grace Helps

I am determined to pursue the vision I had for this business and bring it to fruition. By supporting this campaign you will provide Aster Grace with the ability to:

  • Complete its website design
  • Advertise on various/appropriate networks
  • Design & Print affordable stationery for clientele and campaign backers. 
  • Contracting 2-3 designers for the Aster Grace team 
  • Attend the 2018 National Stationery Show as a vendor

In the event that the full goal is not met, the funds raised will be allocated to completing the website, contracting 1-2 designers to bring more products and stationery designs to our customers, and fulfilling the campaign perks for backers that chose that option.


Spread the word!

Share this campaign with your family, friends and colleagues you know enjoy investing in new ventures and supporting local businesses.

story:
Story so far...

Hello my name is Sarah Josefsberg and a couple of years ago I was diagnosed with cancer. It's ok! I made it through. What helped me most during that time was Rosie the rabbit's story which I created one night while in the middle of having chemo. I found that telling this little story to myself and sharing it with others opened up conversations and helped me connect when I was feeling completely alone.

Rosie's first book, Rosie The Rabbit: The Thing About Cancer opened up conversations with people I had never met and helped us get talking about cancer with families and friends and open us up to all the emotions we face. Her second book is all about coping with anxiety and stress. 

As someone who has personally suffered from anxiety I have created this second book to help as many families and friends as possible who may know someone who is suffering. Maybe it is due to illness or maybe it's a symptom of the life we live in? Whatever the reason I have created Rosie to help connect and have those tough conversations and most important of all help chidlren feel better!

Somewhere out there someone needs Rosie! They don't have the words and are feeling scared and alone in life. When you support this campaign you are giving a child, parent or friend the words and help them have these important conversations. 

Rosie The Rabbit and I have been through a lot together over this past 2 years. She hopped into my life when I was in the middle of my cancer treatment. Her first story helped me get through a really tough time and so we decided to share it with others who were touched by cancer.

After our first book's success Rosie decided that she would like to share more of her stories with people. Rosie wrote her stories because she knew that they would really help people to talk about their feelings when going through tough experiences in life.

We know this second book will make a difference, just like the first one, and really help children, parents and friends dealing with anxiety and stress.

Risks & Challenges

Ok, on a personal level, it is scary putting Rosie and her campaign out into the world! I am actually asking you for money in exchange for my dream. There are 3 billion other people are on this thing selling magic juicers, e-bikes and movies. Everybody has a dream and all dreams are valid, so why in the hell are you going to give your money to me?  

These are the risks you take when you follow your dream... We would rather take the risk of putting this out there. We would rather rise to the challenges in life than quit, so I am asking you for your help. 

When you donate to this campaign you sacrifice a cup of coffee, a meal or possibly a nice pair of shoes. Perhaps you are even sacrificing money for your kid's college fund, the rent or a new Bugatti? Whatever the amount, it is a sacrifice and so it needs to be worth it.

This is what I can guarantee you...

The more you give, the more good I promise to do with your money. That is the bang for your buck. Reaching this target means that we make an amazing book together and ensure its success. 

The more copies I can print and distribute the cheaper the cost to the public and we can make more available to hospitals and other places and people that need them.

So, if you believe in our dream please give as much as you can with all of your heart and help us succeed!

The Impact

  • People need Rosie to help make it easier to talk about the tough things in life. Your support ensures she can be there for everyone who needs her most.
  • Rosie's first book, The Thing About Cancer has been incredibly successful and received amazing feedback from those who have offered support. 
  • We have had the privilege of doing something good for others by sharing Rosie's experience.

What We Need & What You Get

This is how the funding works...

  • I need to pay an artist and editor fee because Rosie and I are self publishing queens (£2000)  
  • I then need to pay my lovely book printer to print a minimum of 100 copies which will be hard back and beautifully done (£1000)
  • I also need to pay my incredibly talented team who believe in me and help me with making videos and doing PR (£1000)
  • This leaves me a budget which I need in order to print extra copies and do promotion and marketing for the first and second books of around (£2000). This part is actually way more important and expensive than it looks. It will be so important in helping Rosie get her books out into the world.
