story:
" MESSI & THE GOLDEN DEFEAT " ... Football's Mysteries Seen Through THE WAIBI METHOD

(Texto en Español al final)

 

Actually this is a Bookgame. No! It’s not an editing mistake. It says a "Bookgame".

To understand it faster: it's like a videogame that you play reading it. In it, two characters with sometimes different and sometimes similar points of view, try to answer the big question: Who is the Best Football Player in History? The funny thing is that it’s the reader who "plays" Johnny Bigot and Ducky “Lucky" Goldcoins, (a Football fan and a professional bettor). Each one of them has its own life story. So, the conclusions they will reach, will allow them to understand some hidden “secrets” of this sport from very particular points of view.

Although sometimes it looks like a novel or just pure science fiction, this is a book of Analysis. The “adventure” recreates many situations (sports or not) that give us other considerations to clarify our ideas about what we see, and what we "don’t see" in the pitch. Also it’s about how to count it.

The thing is that Football (as society and human civilizations) has always been submerged in that mysterious fog that interweaves mysticism with reality, desire with justice, fanaticism with sanity, and happiness with violence. Being the most popular sport in the world, maybe this is precisely the "inexplicable" reason to also be the one that more slowly evolves. The statistics are in that still "primitive" part.

While Waibi Football system is a revolutionary vision of this sport through the numbers, it’s at the same time a step forward in its analysis, understanding and enjoyment. Among many questions, the system brings light into those invisible areas not recorded by the conventional analysis. Thus, it evidences a part of that Football Universe so far not ignored, but "intangible", or at least, "unfocused".

Justly, the misunderstanding of Football game is one of the causes of most kind of violence that tarnish it. Especially the one that's aimed at the own team players, referees, rival fans or media stars. I’m not talking about social vandalism (gangs, mafias, illegal bets, match-fixing, xenophobia...). I mean, that kind of violence that is a distortion of sportsmanship; even though sometimes both become the same.

Eroding that violence as much as possible is the supreme aim of this Bookgame. The other goals include to introduce a new perspective to the Football Stats and Analysis, and to give a practical sample of how the Waibi Method works.

You will be surprised by certain "secrets" hidden in the performance data of some of the greatest players in History such as Pelé, Maradona, Cristiano Ronaldo and logically, Messi... But you may also start to live life differently. Although also maybe not!

In any case, this Bookgame will just give you new tools to answer the big question by yourself. But the same ones will be useful to analyze any specific situation (sports or not), going through as many points of view as possible, and then filtering full data to reach more accurate conclusions. It doesn’t matter if it’s to create a mathematical algorithm, to bet, or even to “understand” politics.

So, are you ready to expand your way of enjoying Football?

 

OK, BUT… WHAT IS THE WAIBI METHOD?

The Waibi Method is an analysis/learning ideal system for self-educated people. Although it’s based on The Scientific Method, it focuses not only on what is recognized as Science, but on anything you master, however insignificant it might seem.

Somehow, most of the things you know, have some point of connection. From playing Football (Soccer) or preparing a good roast, until speaking a language, farming or simply driving a car. It's because all of them are powerfully governed by the same primordial factor: Logic! Everything we learn and experience is assimilated with the same Logic. Isn’t it? So, by Identifying, Organizing, Processing and Interpreting (DOPI) those common links you will achieve not only to accelerate your learning time, but it will increase overwhelmingly your efficacy also when you apply your knowledge.

The Waibi Method also includes other learning procedures and techniques similar to The Link Method and Feynman’s Method, but it has some advantages over those:

·         It occupies less space in your memory, regarding the amount of new things you can learn.

·         In many cases, you don’t need necessarily an academic knowledge to understand/explain certain complex situations.

·         It’s easy to remember what you’ve learned if you've "forgotten" it, or you’ve not used it for a while.

·         Although the result is the same (to learn something you want), each person creates their own model. That means that a peasant and an intellectual could learn the same thing, using what they already know. It will depend more on their individual capacity of abstraction.

·         It allows you learning very different subjects (Music and Languages, for example) using the same reference.

·         By mastering Waibi Method you will not only learn faster, but that learning speed will increase exponentially while you add more "Parallel Known Universes" (PKU) to your system.

So, actually, The Waibi Method is a Method of Integration of Information. Philosophically, "Information" refers to "Everything that exists". In practice, it refers to "everything you know".  

 

SO… WHY IS IMPORTANT YOUR HELP?

As you’ve already noticed this is an indie book. Each publishing house has a budget that allows to produce their materials. Authors, consultants, editors, designers, illustrators, proofreaders, translators, printers, publishers and divulgers, are linked in a chain that ensures that the book message hit the reader. For that reason, an Indie author can’t ignore any of this phases. The quality must be the same!

This book will be published first in English and Spanish. This complicates everything, because my aim is to launch it before the next World Cup in Russia 2018.

Obviously, it would be really useful to promote the book once concluded. My idea is also to try to get access to some of the European Universities and Book Fairs, to give a good first step.

As you already have noticed, by the standards of production, the amount I’m asking for it's insufficient for this really big work, if we think about the time remaining for the World Cup. However, as I assume many of the functions (editing, design, co - translation, illustration, and others) I just need to invest in those areas that are beyond my possibilities, due to logistic or economic issues.

Translation is a neuralgic point, especially because it needs time. I also need some language advisory. Why? Because one thing is speaking and writing in formal annoying language, and quite another one is to write a book in a style as colloquial as a conversation between friends about… statistics!!! So, I need a "mother tongue" advisory to review the whole “little” details.

There’re also some images, protected by copyright, so I need to cover the corresponding amount to the authors, in order to comply with the law.

Besides, this book have three versions per language:

1.    eBook Edition (digital)

2.    Standard Edition (paper)

3.    Special Edition (paper)

That means a harder design work. Definitely I will need to contract some people, because of the time remaining until the World Cup.

Different versions means to pay different ISBN too. 

An unexpected problem is that Amazon, the platform I chose to sell the book, it changed its publishing policy at the end of 2017. So, there's not free publications anymore. Just this "detail" it will cost us about the 20% of the amount!

Also the book is accompanied by the song you heard on the spot. That’s the demo of my  song "Hurricane Messi". There’re certain parts of the song that I’ve to record in a studio. Especially those with acoustic instruments.  

Anyhow, the book is really quite advanced, including translation. But as you can see, it’s a great challenge, therefore I need your help! So, let’s do it?

 

“MESSI Y EL ORO DE LA DERROTA”... Los Misterios del Futbol a través del MÉTODO WAIBI

En realidad esto es un Librojuego. ¡No! No es un error de edición. Dice “Librojuego”.

Para entenderlo rápido: es como un videojuego que se juega leyéndolo. En él, dos personajes con puntos de vista a veces distintos, a veces similares, intentan responder la gran pregunta: ¿Quién es el Mejor Futbolista de la Historia? Lo divertido, es que es el propio lector quien “interpreta” a Johnny Bigot y Ducky “Lucky” Goldcoins, un hincha de futbol y un apostador profesional. Cada uno de ellos tiene su propia historia de vida, por lo que las conclusiones a las que irán llegando, les permitirán comprender ciertos escondrijos de este deporte desde puntos de vista muy particulares.

Aunque por momentos parece una novela o pura ciencia ficción, en realidad este es un libro de Análisis. La “aventura” recrea un sin número de situaciones, deportivas o no, que nos aportan otras miradas para aclarar nuestras ideas sobre lo que vemos, y lo que “no vemos” en un campo de Futbol. También sobre cómo contarlo.

Y es que el Futbol (como la sociedad y las civilizaciones humanas) ha estado sumido siempre en esa niebla que entrelaza la mística con la realidad, el deseo con la justicia, el fanatismo con la cordura y la felicidad con la violencia. Siendo el deporte más masivo del mundo, quizá sea precisamente esa la razón “inexplicable”, para también ser el que más lento evoluciona. Las estadísticas están en esa parte aún “primitiva”.

Si bien el sistema Waibi Football es una revolucionaria visión de este deporte desde los números, en realidad es un paso adelante en su análisis, comprensión y disfrute. Entre muchas interrogantes, el sistema arroja luz sobre aquellas zonas invisibles desde el análisis estadístico convencional. Así, evidencia una parte de ese Universo Futbol hasta ahora no ignorada, pero sí “intangible”, o al menos “desenfocada”.

Justamente la incomprensión de este deporte como fenómeno, es una de las causas de los distintos tipos de violencia que lo empañan. Sobre todo aquella que va dirigida a los jugadores del propio equipo, árbitros, fans rivales o estrellas mediáticas. No hablo del vandalismo social (pandillas, mafias, apuestas ilegales, arreglos de partidos, xenofobia...). Me refiero a la violencia como distorsión de la deportividad; aunque en ocasiones llegan a mezclarse tanto que se convierten en la misma.

Erosionar esa violencia tanto como sea posible, es el objetivo supremo de este libro. Las otras metas son: introducir un nuevo punto de vista a las estadísticas y el análisis del futbol; y dar una muestra práctica de cómo funciona el Método Waibi.

Te sorprenderán ciertos “secretos” ocultos en los datos de rendimiento de algunos de los jugadores más grandes de la Historia como Pelé, Maradona, Cristiano Ronaldo y lógicamente, Messi… Pero puede que también comiences a vivir la vida de otro modo. ¡Aunque también puede que no!

En cualquier caso, el libro solo te dará nuevas herramientas para que puedas responder la gran pregunta por ti mismo. Pero esas mismas te serán útiles para analizar cualquier situación específica (deportiva o no) desde tantos puntos de vista como sea posible, y filtrar los datos para llegar a conclusiones más certeras. Da igual si es para crear un algoritmo matemático, para apostar, o hasta para comprender la política.

Entonces ¿Estás listo para ampliar tu manera de disfrutar el futbol?

 

OK, PERO… ¿QUÉ ES EL MÉTODO WAIBI?

El Método Waibi es un sistema de análisis/aprendizaje ideal para personas autodidactas. Aunque está basado en el Método Científico, no se centra solo en lo que se reconoce como Ciencia, sino en cualquier cosa que domines, por muy insignificante que parezca.

De alguna manera, la mayoría de las cosas que sabes, tienen algún punto de conexión. Desde jugar al Béisbol o preparar un buen asado, hasta hablar un idioma, cultivar la tierra o simplemente, manejar un automóvil. Es porque están todos igualmente regidos por un poderosísimo factor: ¡la Lógica! Todo lo que aprendemos y experimentamos, lo hacemos desde la misma lógica ¿o no? Detectar, Organizar, Procesar e Interpretar (DOPI) esos enlaces comunes, te permitirá no solo acelerar tu tiempo de aprendizaje, sino que aumentará tu rendimiento a la hora de aplicarlo.

El Método Waibi incluye también otros procedimientos y técnicas de aprendizaje similares al Link Method y el Feynman Method, pero tiene algunas ventajas sobre estos:

·         Ocupa menos espacio de tu memoria, respecto a la cantidad de cosas nuevas que puedes aprender.

·         En muchas ocasiones, no necesitarás conocimientos académicos específicos para comprender/explicar ciertas situaciones complejas.

·         Es fácil volver a recordar lo aprendido en caso de que lo “olvides”, o no lo utilices por algún tiempo.

·         Aunque el resultado es el mismo (aprender algo que deseas), cada persona crea su propio modelo. Es decir, un campesino y un intelectual pueden llegar a aprender la misma cosa, utilizando aquello que ya saben. Dependerá más de la capacidad de abstracción que tengan.

·         Permite comprender materias muy distintas, (Música y Física, por ejemplo) utilizando el mismo referente.

·         El dominio del Método no solo hará que aprendas más rápido, sino que esa rapidez aumentará exponencialmente, en la medida que añadas más “Universos Paralelos” a tu sistema.

En realidad, el Método Waibi, es un Método de Integración de la Información, y en este caso, “Información” se refiere filosóficamente a “Todo lo que existe”. En la práctica, “todo lo que conoces”.

 

¿POR QUÉ ES TAN IMPORTANTE TU COLABORACIÓN?

Ya sabes que este es un libro independiente. Cada casa editora cuenta con un presupuesto que le permite producir sus materiales. Autores, asesores, editores, diseñadores, ilustradores, correctores, traductores, impresores, publicistas y divulgadores, son eslabones de una cadena que garantiza que el mensaje en un libro llegue a su destino: el lector. Por esa razón un autor independiente, no puede obviar ninguna de estas aristas. ¡El rigor sobre la calidad debe ser el mismo!

Además, el libro será publicado inicialmente en inglés y español. Se complica todo porque el objetivo es que esté en tus manos antes del próximo Mundial de Rusia 2018.

Obviamente también será útil promover el libro una vez terminado. Una idea es intentar acceder a algunas de las ferias del libro y universidades europeas, para dar un buen primer paso de su presentación fuera de la red digital.

Como notarás, según los estándares de producción, la cifra que he trazado como meta, es insuficiente para este trabajo. Sin embargo, como asumo varias de las funciones, (edición, diseño, co-traducción, ilustración...) el libro tendrá para mí un coste más módico, por lo que solo necesitaré invertir en aquellas áreas, que por cuestiones estructurales, logísticas o económicas escapan de mis posibilidades.

El tema de la traducción es delicado, porque necesita sobre todo tiempo. Pero también necesito asesorías. Una cosa es hablar y escribir en otra lengua, y otra muy diferente es que el lenguaje del libro sea tan coloquial como una conversación entre amigos, aunque hablemos de ¡estadísticas! Por eso, se necesita asesoría de personas “madrelingua”, que ayuden a facilitar la comprensión del contenido.

También hay algunas imágenes, protegidas por el Derecho de Autor, por lo que deberá abonarse el correspondiente monto, a fin de cumplir con la legalidad.

Habrá además tres versiones del libro por idioma:

1.    Versión Digital

2.    Versión Estándar (papel)

3.    Versión Especial (papel)

Esto significa también contar con diferentes diseños, por lo que me será imposible asumirlos todos de acuerdo al tiempo que queda para la Copa del Mundo. Deberé contratar personal.

Cada versión significa también un ISBN diferente, que deberá ser abonado.

Un problema inesperado es que Amazon, la plataforma que elegí para vender el libro, cambió su politica de publicación a fines de 2017. Entonces, no habrá más publicaciones gratis. Solo este detalle nos costará cerca del 20% de la cifra.

También el libro viene acompañado de la canción que escuchas en el spot. Lo compuse para la ocasión, pero es solo un demo. Hay ciertas partes de la canción que debo grabar en estudio. Especialmente aquellas con instrumentos acústicos.

En cualquier caso, el libro está en su fase final, incluyendo la primera traducción. Pero como ves, ¡es un gran desafío!, por eso agradeceré tu ayuda. ¿Lo hacemos?

" MESSI & THE GOLDEN DEFEAT " ... Football's Mysteries Seen Through THE WAIBI METHOD
(Texto en Español al final)
 
Actually this is a Bookgame. No! It’s not an editing mistake. It says a "Bookgame".
To understand it faster: it's like a videogame that you play reading it. In it, two characters with sometimes different and sometimes similar points of view, try to answer the big question: Who is the Best Football Player in History? The funny thing is that it’s the reader who "plays" Johnny Bigot and Ducky “Lucky" Goldcoins, (a Football fan and a professional bettor). Each one of them has its own life story. So, the conclusions they will reach, will allow them to understand some hidden “secrets” of this sport from very particular points of view.
Although sometimes it looks like a novel or just pure science fiction, this is a book of Analysis. The “adventure” recreates many situations (sports or not) that give us other considerations to clarify our ideas about what we see, and what we "don’t see" in the pitch. Also it’s about how to count it.
The thing is that Football (as society and human civilizations) has always been submerged in that mysterious fog that interweaves mysticism with reality, desire with justice, fanaticism with sanity, and happiness with violence. Being the most popular sport in the world, maybe this is precisely the "inexplicable" reason to also be the one that more slowly evolves. The statistics are in that still "primitive" part.
While Waibi Football system is a revolutionary vision of this sport through the numbers, it’s at the same time a step forward in its analysis, understanding and enjoyment. Among many questions, the system brings light into those invisible areas not recorded by the conventional analysis. Thus, it evidences a part of that Football Universe so far not ignored, but "intangible", or at least, "unfocused".

Justly, the misunderstanding of Football game is one of the causes of most kind of violence that tarnish it. Especially the one that's aimed at the own team players, referees, rival fans or media stars. I’m not talking about social vandalism (gangs, mafias, illegal bets, match-fixing, xenophobia...). I mean, that kind of violence that is a distortion of sportsmanship; even though sometimes both become the same.
Eroding that violence as much as possible is the supreme aim of this Bookgame. The other goals include to introduce a new perspective to the Football Stats and Analysis, and to give a practical sample of how the Waibi Method works.
You will be surprised by certain "secrets" hidden in the performance data of some of the greatest players in History such as Pelé, Maradona, Cristiano Ronaldo and logically, Messi... But you may also start to live life differently. Although also maybe not!

In any case, this Bookgame will just give you new tools to answer the big question by yourself. But the same ones will be useful to analyze any specific situation (sports or not), going through as many points of view as possible, and then filtering full data to reach more accurate conclusions. It doesn’t matter if it’s to create a mathematical algorithm, to bet, or even to “understand” politics.
So, are you ready to expand your way of enjoying Football?
 
OK, BUT… WHAT IS THE WAIBI METHOD?
The Waibi Method is an analysis/learning ideal system for self-educated people. Although it’s based on The Scientific Method, it focuses not only on what is recognized as Science, but on anything you master, however insignificant it might seem.
Somehow, most of the things you know, have some point of connection. From playing Football (Soccer) or preparing a good roast, until speaking a language, farming or simply driving a car. It's because all of them are powerfully governed by the same primordial factor: Logic! Everything we learn and experience is assimilated with the same Logic. Isn’t it? So, by Identifying, Organizing, Processing and Interpreting (DOPI) those common links you will achieve not only to accelerate your learning time, but it will increase overwhelmingly your efficacy also when you apply your knowledge.

The Waibi Method also includes other learning procedures and techniques similar to The Link Method and Feynman’s Method, but it has some advantages over those:
·         It occupies less space in your memory, regarding the amount of new things you can learn.
·         In many cases, you don’t need necessarily an academic knowledge to understand/explain certain complex situations.
·         It’s easy to remember what you’ve learned if you've "forgotten" it, or you’ve not used it for a while.
·         Although the result is the same (to learn something you want), each person creates their own model. That means that a peasant and an intellectual could learn the same thing, using what they already know. It will depend more on their individual capacity of abstraction.
·         It allows you learning very different subjects (Music and Languages, for example) using the same reference.
·         By mastering Waibi Method you will not only learn faster, but that learning speed will increase exponentially while you add more "Parallel Known Universes" (PKU) to your system.
So, actually, The Waibi Method is a Method of Integration of Information. Philosophically, "Information" refers to "Everything that exists". In practice, it refers to "everything you know".  

 
SO… WHY IS IMPORTANT YOUR HELP?
As you’ve already noticed this is an indie book. Each publishing house has a budget that allows to produce their materials. Authors, consultants, editors, designers, illustrators, proofreaders, translators, printers, publishers and divulgers, are linked in a chain that ensures that the book message hit the reader. For that reason, an Indie author can’t ignore any of this phases. The quality must be the same!
This book will be published first in English and Spanish. This complicates everything, because my aim is to launch it before the next World Cup in Russia 2018.
Obviously, it would be really useful to promote the book once concluded. My idea is also to try to get access to some of the European Universities and Book Fairs, to give a good first step.
As you already have noticed, by the standards of production, the amount I’m asking for it's insufficient for this really big work, if we think about the time remaining for the World Cup. However, as I assume many of the functions (editing, design, co - translation, illustration, and others) I just need to invest in those areas that are beyond my possibilities, due to logistic or economic issues.
Translation is a neuralgic point, especially because it needs time. I also need some language advisory. Why? Because one thing is speaking and writing in formal annoying language, and quite another one is to write a book in a style as colloquial as a conversation between friends about… statistics!!! So, I need a "mother tongue" advisory to review the whole “little” details.
There’re also some images, protected by copyright, so I need to cover the corresponding amount to the authors, in order to comply with the law.
Besides, this book have three versions per language:
1.    eBook Edition (digital)
2.    Standard Edition (paper)
3.    Special Edition (paper)
That means a harder design work. Definitely I will need to contract some people, because of the time remaining until the World Cup.
Different versions means to pay different ISBN too. 
An unexpected problem is that Amazon, the platform I chose to sell the book, it changed its publishing policy at the end of 2017. So, there's not free publications anymore. Just this "detail" it will cost us about the 20% of the amount!
Also the book is accompanied by the song you heard on the spot. That’s the demo of my  song "Hurricane Messi". There’re certain parts of the song that I’ve to record in a studio. Especially those with acoustic instruments.  
Anyhow, the book is really quite advanced, including translation. But as you can see, it’s a great challenge, therefore I need your help! So, let’s do it?

story:
The North Korean regime is ever present in even a citizen's most trivial activities.

"To be honest, in North Korea, there isn't a word such as stress. In retrospect, however, I think all their illnesses were due to stress."  - Ok Ju (Nurse, Neurosurgery Department)

"Once a week, we instruct students to criticize one another This is because there is no one without flaws. By doing this, we helped them correct each other's flaws." Soo Young, Kim (Math teacher)

The purpose of the #FaceMore campaign is to present the new version of our published book The Faceless Ones. 

What is it about?

The Faceless Ones is a book that comprises of details from everyday lives of several North Korean defectors who lived in different parts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK). Through their testimonies, despite coming from various walks of life, we can see how they all experienced the iron grip of the North Korean regime in different ways.

By highlighting these accounts, we hope to have more people acknowledge the prevalent human rights violations in North Korea. This would increase the global awareness and create a platform for people to learn and engage in discussions on these issues, while simultaneously encouraging North Koreans defectors that each of their stories and experiences have significance.

Who are we?

PSCORE stands for People for Successful COrean REunification. We are a non-profit NGO based in Seoul, South Korea, that addresses potential barriers to reunification and assists North Korean refugees in adapting to life in South Korea. PSCORE was founded in 2006 by Kim Young-Il, a former North Korean soldier, who managed to escape the country with his family and successfully defect to the South.

Today, PSCORE is working towards its goal of a successful reunification through public exposure and various enrichment programs, such as our Mentoring and Education Program and our Human Rights and Democracy Program. We also provide emergency aid to North Korean refugees in China through a discreet and secure series of networks, and all of our programs are designed to garner support and raise awareness of human rights violations in North Korea.

Through our education program, we make use of an extensive network of volunteer tutors in Seoul and match them with North Korean students. The students get support from our program as they develop their skills in a range of subjects such as English, Math, Essay writing and more. Furthermore, they also use this opportunity to interact with people from around the world and gain knowledge about cultural norms and practices. Our program helps defectors adjust to the South Korean education system and enhances their abilities to communicate and convey their ideas in a range of situations, both interpersonal and in the workplace.

PSCORE was founded in 2006 by Kim Young-Il, a former North Korean soldier, who managed to escape the country with his family and successfully defect to the South.
Today, PSCORE is working towards its goal of a successful reunification through public exposure and various enrichment programs, such as our Mentoring and Education Program and our Human Rights and Democracy Program. We also provide emergency aid to North Korean refugees in China through a discreet and secure series of networks, and all of our programs are designed to garner support and raise awareness of human rights violations in North Korea.
Through our education program, we make use of an extensive network of volunteer tutors in Seoul and match them with North Korean students. The students get support from our program as they develop their skills in a range of subjects such as English, Math, Essay writing and more. Furthermore, they also use this opportunity to interact with people from around the world and gain knowledge about cultural norms and practices. Our program helps defectors adjust to the South Korean education system and enhances their abilities to communicate and convey their ideas in a range of situations, both interpersonal and in the workplace.

story:
Short Summary

 

I was born in Bulgaria at the end of 1970.The country was under the communism dictatorship and everything coming from Western countries was censored, and forbidden. There was nothing to buy in the shops.People came up with their own homemade remedies for beauty and health.Those remedies turned out to be very effective and lasting.In this book,the main character will reveal some of those remedies,involving the reader in an interacting situation.All the remedies are real and with proven beneficial effects,but behind, there is an interesting and curious story.A story that will teach you never to give up on your dream,because miracles happen only if you believe!

The protagonist was born in a small village,south Bulgaria.While his classmates want to become farmers,policemen or drivers,he has a different wish.His dream is bigger than anything,but also dangerous.He wants to meet Madonna.He began to write her letters and in every letter a poem for her.Those letter were intercepted by the police and he got arrested.

I am sure, this book will be a huge success and it is not only based on a simple hope. Analyzing the market,to this book will emotionally relate not only all Madonna's fans,but also millions of people who lived during an oppressive regime.Those are millions of readers and potential buyers.All I need to make it successful is a professional editing and marketing.The book contains about 140 pages and I am preparing also the second volume,which it will be another 200 pages.It is already self-published and available for purchase in Amazon,however I know the editing is not my best point.

What We Need & What You Get

Being a self published authors it's like to be one hand distance from the success.It looks close,however still difficult to reach.Marketing,promotions,advertising,it requires time,funds and support. I need your hand to make that step forward.

All the funds,I will collect are for:

1.Hiring a professional proof reader and editor.

2.Translating in different languages.

3.Paying for marketing strategies and promotion.

The Amazon algorithm is based on how many reviews your book receives and how many copies you are selling.

The Impact

Every time a reader that purchases the book and leaves a review,makes the book to climb higher in ranking and to get more visibility.

Risks & Challenges

Of course,the point that will make the book to sell continuously in the future, is that it must be interesting,emotionally involving and to contain 3 very important elements:Character,Conflict,Resolution.All of it is present in the story and you will have your confirmation, once you've read it

Other Ways You Can Help

One of the best alternative way to help is by purchasing the book on Amazon and leaving your review there.

Here is again the link:''Dear Madonna,Dear Myself:Hair Club for Men'' by Julien Angelov

Join me and take part of the success story!Million thanks!

Even if you don't want to back the project, sharing it on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram is hugely appreciated. (There are sharing buttons on the page!)

story:
The story that children and young adults are looking for! Enjoy the remarkable and marvelous journey in Cruise of Wonder.

 

What is ‘Cruise of Wonder’?

 

1. A Fantasy novel aimed at children and young adults.
2. With dynamic action and rich imagery, fun and excitement are guaranteed all the way through to the last page.
3. A plot twist and hidden ideas within the novel make you want to delve deeper into Daju’s story.

 

The reason for fund – Daju’s mission

 

If I was to explain the reason for the fund using only one word, it would be the word: ‘mission’.

I was born in Korea and found myself pursuing the goals of the current generation. Being accustomed to and shaped by the present working climate, I felt that my true dream was gradually vanishing before me. I have also realized, that dreams can be pursued in vain, seeing the challenges facing those who seek to make their dreams come true.

Despite the challenge, I feel that the value of my presence in this life shines when I write.

Writing novels has been my way of composing peaceful and pure prayer since I was young. The confidence in this prayer came from Jesus who I believe in. It is this conviction in the prayer that is giving me the sense of mission and heightening the value of my presence.

I do not know if what I have inside me is a vessel made of glass or of gold. To me, it does not matter even if it was made of soil. I now hold a shining story.

 

If you participate in the fund

 

Novel things always provide pleasure. In the same way, so does an original story. I believe that this tale can provide you with a fresh and inventive story to stir your imagination. Reading will leave you feeling moved and will provide a lasting positive memory in your mind. It is my hope that these positive memories from my writing will uplift and energize those who read.

Cruise of Wonder will offer a small, but warm gift for you to treasure in your memory.

 

The effect of the fund

 

Contributing will help cover the publication costs and give me the encouragement to keep writing and continue my dream in the publishing business.

 

 

Benefits

 

$18 – A hardcover copy of the book Cruise of Wonder, with your name printed on the page of                  thanks.

 

                                       


$28 –A hardcover copy of the book Cruise of Wonder, with your name printed on the page of                  thanks, and a ‘Babble’ notebook signed copy by the author and illustrator.

 

                                             
$44 –  Two hardcover copies of the book Cruise of Wonder, with your name printed on the page                 of  thanks, and a ‘Babble’ notebook signed copy by the author and illustrator.

 

                                 


$53 – Two hardcover copies of the book Cruise of Wonder, with your name printed on the page               of  thanks, and two ‘Babble’ notebooks signed copy by the author and illustrator

 

                                

 

Synopsis

 

When a mysterious ticket that appears in the town’s newspaper leads Jinho aboard the Mari, a magical, self-steering ship, he vows to piece together the clues to his father’s disappearance. Stuck with his orphaned family friend Juna, Jinho must brave the strange islands, and curious characters he meets in search of his father in what will turn out to be the cruise of wonder. But can Jinho find the power within himself to overcome the treacherous events that befall him and find his father, or will he succumb to the trials and lose even more than his father (By David)

              

            

            

 

Review

 

Cruise of Wonder is a whimsical, uplifting and mystifying journey, which immediately captivated me from the start with the cryptic clues to the disappearance of Jinho’s father, and kept me turning until the last page.

It is a rewarding voyage, traversing magical islands and perplexing puzzles to ultimately bring you to a conclusion that will leave you spellbound.

The characters are appealing, as not only their finest attributes are painted but also their faults, which makes them feel more human in their existence within the world.  With Daju’s characterisation, you truly feel that no one is perfect, and that everyone has flaws.

The description of the setting is well-balanced, leaving you with just the right amount of information to create your own unique image as to what the islands may look and feel like, and allow you to lose yourself in Daju’s world. The story is short, but well-paced and I found myself wanting more of the fantastical world that Daju creates.

The cleverly woven plot twist made me question everything that I had read previously in the story and look again through the pages to think about the deeper meanings within Daju’s writing.  Daju’s storytelling can be interpreted in many ways, with Cruise of Wonder at face value being a marvelous voyage through puzzles and peril, but also a look at human emotion. The characters are cleverly devised, and once you read the last page, you will look again at the characters in a completely different way.

I thought that Cruise of Wonder was a refreshing, original take on the genre, and left me feeling uplifted by the ideas that one conjures up after finishing the last page. (By David)

story:
I am Pietro, from Love with Italy. I live in Delft, NL, where I work as a researcher in a little startup called Circularise doing blockchain stuff around the circular economy.

I studied Philosophy, Logic, and did some research in Artificial Intelligence before taking an artsy break and working out the idea for this book in January 2018. I've been working on the paintings since 2013; the storyboards came into existence this January following a burst of inspiration. 

I've been painting, gardening, making furniture, writing poetry, sometimes even songs, hiking, reading, listening to music and writing books for a long time now. But this is the first time I paint a book.

The book explaining itself would say: "I'm convoluted". It's not the kind of book you read to your kids, it's not the kind of book you read to your mother, it's not the kind of book you read. It's the kind of book you admire, you look at, but if you want to go further, you can also stare at it in disbelief for a moment. If you're dedicated, it's the kind of book you could take to a lab and vivisect under an x-ray lamp, chalking notes down on a blackboard as you go. It's a book you can decode. (It is possible, I swear).

This project is the outcome of a realisation, namely that the paintings I made in these years, while not following an intentional storyline, follow the footprints of my personal evolution in a time of great difficulty and change. It's a diary of the unconscious. And a weird one at that.

 

What I Need & What You Get

If you haven't figured it out yet, the funding will go into making this book a reality. This essentially means paying myself a couple of months' worth of time (a week per month, more or less, until January 2019) to devote to this project, paying, when necessary, professionals to help me with it because let's be honest, I'm a jack of all trades but, really only almost all trades.
The final goal is a production line ready to churn out boxes of copies of the book (and a few hundred copies for those of you who choose one of them juicy perks).

If I only raise the minimum, I'm going to do just this. If I raise twice as much, I'm going to do so much more but it's a secret.

I'm the perfectionist & control freak kind of guy when it comes to stuff I make, so I'll want the best of the best: the real thick, feely nice paper, quality binding, and to sum it up: the kind of little book you can enjoy without even understanding all of it. Especially useful for those who won't even bother trying. Also for this reason, there is going to be no digital version.

For the lazy people, who, for whatever reason, are keen on reading the books they buy, there's a "lazy, boring version" perk, which includes a little ugly side booklet containing the translations of all code. Also keep in mind that if you know me personally, or live in the Delft or Turin areas, there might be secret perks (e.g. without shipping costs) in for you. Ask me!

Fun fact: I'm a fan of Easter eggs and little details nobody notices. I'm the kind of person who could write a little symbol on the inside of the endcap - where you might find it only if you hack the book apart. Please feel free to. But don't. Books are precious.

 

The Goal

If I'm successful, all of you will have your very own, unique hardcopy of the book, and, if we're lucky, some editor will notice it and offer to publish it via the old school channels. 

Depending on how much money I raise, I have the means to extend on the material I already have. I have painted so far 100+ paintings in the "Blue Hood" series, but the book covers (and storifies) only around 30 of them. 60 pages of code and fantasy seemed enough. But if I raise enough money, I may have the time to write the remaining two volumes and make a pretty triad. Or a big monad. Or something yet cooler, that's both one and three, but I don't want to infringe any copyright there.

The book that I aim to publish is not just a pretty, complex little object. It does have a bunch of deeper layers of meaning but you just have to discover these for yourself.

Risks & Challenges

The funds I gather with this round will take the book to as far as possible, the limit being Mars (#WaitingForElon). If, however, it won't suffice, I'll keep at it for the years to come, funding it myself or running another round, or who knows. Obviously, the funds can scale up (and a bit down) depending on how many copies I need to print: the more funds, the more copies I'll be able to print and ship and stuff.

I'll do my best to fulfill my promises, repaying trust with commitment, that by the way I already have. But, you know, get in sooner for a better price if that's what tickles your ticklers.

Other Ways You Can Help.


Can you proofread a code you can't understand?
Know a manufacturer-seller of some really smooth, really nice paper on which watercolour would feel silky to the touch and yet real to the corneas? I'm not quite settled yet on which paper to go for.
I don't know, be creative. If you want to help, you probably can.
Have that geeky friend fascinated by weirdness and codes and symbols?
Know of a blue hoodie with a llllllongggg, tail-like yellow pom-pom hood? Is it for sale? Can you make one? Can you make more?
Share this to your artsy friends.

Thanks.

story:
A prophet is among us! In every ERA God prepares and sends a messenger; a prophet to and for the nation. One who provides instruction and gives clarity to events. In addition, a prophet is sent by God to give WARNING! Amos 3:7 “Surely the Lord God does nothing without revealing His plan”.

 

I'm an author who gets glimpses of tomorrow. Nostradamus looks into a crystal ball; the Lord God shows me visions and dreams of things to come that are not always what we want to hear, but what is to be. I was shown September 11 in 1997 in a vision, and it came to pass approximately four years after with the greatest accuracy.

 

I was shown the election of President Obama as the 44th President and the Sandy Hook date of the killing of "The Little Ones on DECEMBER 14th in 2012. I was shown several other important events, including the Donald Trump election, even before he became the presumptive nominee. I wrote "The Rise of The Tribulation President" in 2015, speaking of things to come. America has yet to face her darkest moments.

 

I was shown in a vision the heavens open with the map of America. As I watched with fixated eyes as The Spirit of God beckoned me to do, and what I saw would make grown men cry. I saw the unseen hand of God making a gruesome path on the map of America in BLOOD.

 

This was in 2017, and 2021 is almost here, which I believe that September 11 that He had shown me in 1997, and it happened in 2001 was just a precursor of what is to come.

 

I was shown the Corona-virus in March of 2017 also as The Map of America again appeared in the middle of the street, and The Unseen hand of God made a BIG X on the State of Seattle, Washington, where the first case of the Corona-virus was found. In the same vision, I saw many bodies wrapped in white sheets with a BIG back X across their chests. The dead filled the hallways of the EMERGENCY ROOM and beyond.

 

What has me most concerned is a 3rd vision that was shown to me with the very same characters of September 11 with the very same number 7 at the end of the year. First 1997 and now 2017.

 

I know what The Lord God has shown to me is bound to happen - what we do in its preparation is what is most important. This is what is in this book that I must give to the WORLD before its ETERNALLY too late.

 

Only time will tell now if this prophecy will come true, although, I know it will. The Deadly Warning -Blood Across America will also come to pass. I beg you to help me to make this awareness known to everyone before it's eternally too late.

 

They say we cannot survive a Nuclear War, and for this reason, no government around the world has made preparation for us as citizens of the greatest country on earth. The Lord God has shown me what many of us will be able to do to escape this deadly onslaught.

 

I pray that you will listen before it's too late.

I NEED YOUR HELP!! Even if you don't believe it.

 

Mutti Lewis

I saw the unseen hand of God making a gruesome path on the map of America in BLOOD. This was in 2017, and 2021 is almost here, which I believe that September 11 that He had shown me in 1997, and it happened in 2001 was just a precursor of what is to come. I was shown the Corona-virus in March of 2017 also as The Map of America again appeared in the middle of the street, and The Unseen hand of God made a BIG X on the State of Seattle, Washington, where the first case of the Corona-virus was found. In the same vision, I saw many bodies wrapped in white sheets with a BIG back X across their chests. The dead filled the hallways of the EMERGENCY ROOM and beyond. What has me most concerned is a 3rd vision that was shown to me with the very same characters of September 11 with the very same number 7 at the end of the year. First 1997 and now 2017. I know what The Lord God has shown to me is bound to happen - what we do in its preparation is what is most important. This is what is in this book that I must give to the WORLD before its ETERNALLY too late. Only time will tell now if this prophecy will come true, although, I know it will. The Deadly Warning -Blood Across America will also come to pass. I beg you to help me to make this awareness known to everyone before it's eternally too late. They say we cannot survive a Nuclear War, and for this reason, no government around the world has made preparation for us as citizens of the greatest country on earth. The Lord God has shown me what many of us will be able to do to escape this deadly onslaught. I pray that you will listen before it's too late.I NEED YOUR HELP!! Even if you don't believe it. Mutti Lewis

story:
Short Summary

A Knight is sworn to valor. He is sworn to defend his King, his Lord, and most importantly, his people. What happens when those around him cower from the challenges ahead? Read the legend of Sir Edmound Stoneworth as he navigates the path from town Watchman to becoming one of the most powerful Lord's in all of the Kingdom of Dunderland. Read as he navigates these issues and gives chivalry a new horizon to follow.

What We Need & What You Get

This is my first book! Hello I am Alex Pace, I have served many years in the US Army at every level from Private to Company Commander and continue to serve in the reserve. I have been fascinated from childhood by the stories of King Arthur and his Knights as well as the historical stories of the real people they were modeled after. The series I am writing aims to create a world similar to our own that harnesses the characteristics of these tales but adds the humanity and struggle every modern warrior faces both on, off, and long after the battlefield has left them behind.

Like the Soldiers in any war the Politicians make the rules. These books will explore the complexity of these decisions through the eyes of warriors who fight the battles across each Kingdom as they struggle for position and dominance , some with morals and some without. More commonly, the area is gray.

I need your help to tell this story!

Editing and publishing will cost a heavy purse. I need to raise roughly $3000 to put this book onto shelves. This cost includes editing (Professional editing, I've already done 3 rounds from friends) Formatting, paper and Kindle, cover work, printing, and marketing help.

What do you get out of it?!

$300- Awarded only once. Includes a 3D printed model of the town of Southerland painted by me. A printed original manuscript (prior to editing) signed by the Author including original concept art along with Author notes on the manuscript. Copy of signed final printed book upon production. Chance to pre edit (friend edit) next book prior to release or Pro editing.

$150- A printed signed manuscript (prior to final editing), Copy of concept art signed by Author, Copy of signed final printed book upon production. Chance to pre edit (friend edit) next book prior to release or Pro editing.

$100- A printed signed manuscript (prior to final editing), Copy of signed final printed book upon production.   

$20+ Signed book upon publication. 

Anyone who donates- My personal thank you for getting this effort off the ground!

story:
Most people would like to believe that Man is not alone and that there is other life out there. What better way to prove the existence of life elsewhere than to reveal to you precisely how to see their crafts in Earth’s atmosphere, and tell you precisely why they are here. The aim of this campaign is to do precisely that.

The craft are part and parcel of a vast fleet of Radionic Ships from all over Creation in the form of Radionic Ships of Light. These are not the so-called UFOs you have speculatively popularized since the early fifties. UFOs are of a lesser frequency and not tied to First Cause. Rather, the Radionic Ships of Light are of a higher frequency, are tied directly to First Cause, and are called ‘The Radionic Ships of the Heavenly Host’.

Radionic Ships have been in Earth’s skies for many Millennia, hiding in plain sight bare-faced in the noon-day sun. These are the same Ships that accompanied Christ two thousand years ago, and the Prophets before that. A full  revelation about their existence is now been given in the form of an Official Disclosure prepared under the direction of the Heavenly Host themselves, and is being brought forward to you in the form of a website and Book rather than a landing in order to soft introduce themselves into your awareness rather than by disruptive shock. The website is at: http://www.radionicships.com and the Book is titled, 'The Radionic Ships of the Heavenly Host'.

The purpose of this campaign is to raise sufficient funds to the print and market the Book in a great enough volume that it can be afforded by everyone. 

What you see in the Figure above is ordinary looking clouds, the kind you might see on any day in any part of the world.  What you probably didn't see is that the background cloud has a particularly specific shape. Namely, verticle, like a cone, which meets at an apex at the bottom.  This is one of the many Radionic cloud signatures of the Radionic Ships of Light. This is what is meant by sitting bare-faced in the noon-day sun. Who would ever think there is something particularly important about it. In actuallity, a so-called Radionic Anchor Ship is sitting in the Fourth-Dimension at the bottom apex of the cloud. The magnetic field of the Ship is producing a Radionic reflection of itself in the water vapors of the atmosphere which is the particular Radionic cloud pattern you see.

What you also probably didn't see is that the assorted clouds are filled with little Mobile Radionnic Scout Ships.  The figure below is a blow-up of the left side of the Figure above.  As you can see, there are little spherical ships all through the cumulous clouds like little gumballs. This is how it works. You see a Radionic Cloud, when you blow it up you see little Mobile Scout ships all over the place. That's what is meant by sic, 'Hiding in plain sight'. It's been like this for thousands of years and no one has suspected. And now you have it. You know for a certainty the UFOs exist. You also now know more about off-world craft than professional UFologists around the world.  If you look back at the image above, you will see a couple of larger Radionic Scout Ships sitting in the right side arms of the Radionic Cloud itself.

To give you an idea of how the Radionic Clouds behave, the following very brief video is of a Radionic Cloud found on Youtube.com. You will notice in the video that it does not move while the other ordinary clouds pass right on by. This is their most dominant characteristic. They can sometimes remain in the same place for weeks. The large white cloud slanting to the upper left is a part of the Radionic Field in the middle.

 
For those of you who are not sure of what is actually going on, this is very, very, big news, unprecedented in the annals of Human History. Mankind has been observing the ships for thousands of years, just not understanding what they have been seeing. It is still the same today, most people look at clouds overhead and see nothing. The official Disclosure is now being given to reveal to Mankind at large what to look for and why. It is being given in an informational form rather than an announcement, showing you exactly where and how to see them. It is also being disseminated to you gradually as a soft revelation in the form of a website and book so as to not create a severe culture shock which would destabilize society forever.
 

The reason for this specific Indiegogo campaign is that the book is currently printed on demand in full color on a laser printer by Amazon.com. Consequently, the retail price is prohibitive, over $75.00. This puts it out of the reach of all but the most ardent UFO enthusiast.  The other disadvantage is that laser printing tends to darken the color blue. Since nearly all of the photographs in the Disclosure are of sky images, this somewhat spoils the effect. The only advantage to the print on demand form of production is that the books are not paid for in advance, only as they become ordered one by one.  The prohibitive cost is the main problem.

Because of its importance, this is a book everyone should be able to enjoy. The solution is to print it in large quantities by normal offset printing. But which has to be paid for in advance. This will both correct the sky color problem providing a brilliant breathtaking book for everyone's lifetime enjoyment, plus it will lower the retail list price down to a comfortable $29.95 which nearly anyone can afford.

The funds will also be used to cover the cost of marketing and promotion, including travel costs to book signings promotions and other venues. Any amount you can contribute, large or small will be greatly appreciated. If you are still not certain about the project, please view the whole Disclosure at website www.radionics.com.

The idea of a UFO based Crowdfunding campaign is not far-fetched. So-called UFOs have recently become a big Crowdfunding topic. Dr. Steven Greer ran a campaign last year to raise funds to market and promote a film and book pressuring authorities into admitting what they know about UFOs. The Campaign raised over $700,000. Similarly, the  American Rock Musician Tom Delong was recently involved with a Campaign which raised nearly a million and a half dollars to expand efforts to uncover the truth about UFOs. Given the amounts of monies involved, the subject of UFOs is obviously not a trivial matter in the minds of many. The ready to go Radionic Ship Disclosure of this campaign is far far ahead of the others in significance in that it is, in fact, the very uncovered truth they are urgently seeking.

For those of you who are still not sure, please see a review of the Book, 'The Radionic Ships of the Heavenly host' taken from Google Books, at:  http://www.radionicships.com/review.shtml.

Also, see a bio of this author/wordsmith at:  https://books.google.ca/books?id=tkPrtAEACAAJ&a...

Thank you and bless,

Delahnnovahh-Starr Livingstone

story:
MISSION

Join the Millennial Mogul Mindset in elevating the mentality of Millennials around the Globe! This Self-Help Guide was written to inspire the next generation to produce more successful businesses using the tools and resources available in this Millennia! 

Minding your Mindset is the first priority if one is to become a magnetic magnate! Study the mentality of the greatest Moguls of all time such as; Oprah, Elon Musk, Robert Kiyosaki, Beyonce, The Kardashians, & Grant Cardone with this book. We explore what habits Moguls have and how they became the best version of themselves. If they could achieve it so can you!

 BUDGET

  • Printing: To distribute and print The Millennial Mogul Mindset 
  • Marketing: Spreading awareness of this project is key. Social Media marketing will be the bulk of our budget 
  • Facebook Marketing, Instagram Videos, Youtube Ads
  • Tour: Sharing the Book with others as well as introducing readers to the Author Cerina Spence
  • Podcast: Expanding The MMM Podcast's reach and production to create high quality content for viewers

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Chapter 1: The Magnetic Mogul  

Chapter 2: The Magical Mogul    

Chapter 3: The Passionate Mogul

Chapter 4: The Giving Mogul   

Chapter 5: The Social Mogul  

Chapter 6: The Wealthy Mogul  

Chapter 7: The Enterprising Mogul  

Chapter 8: The Enlightened Mogul 

 

HOW WILL THIS PROJECT PROVIDE VALUE?

Launching The MMM Podcast was a complete success! Our First Episode: "What is a Mogul?" has acquired thousands of views. The topics covered in future podcasts will add value to the audience by sharing Wealth & Investing Tips, Describing the most Efficient Ways To Launch a Brand, Spreading Social Media Platform Marketing Styles & Teaching listeners to Scale their Production and Business!

Future Interviews of Brand Ambassadors, Online Influencers and Business Owners will add value by sharing the Mindset of other Moguls as well. Serving our guest on the Podcast will be the main prerogative in interviewing them. The platform will help new authors and upcoming artist reach viewers they would only dream of influencing. The mission is to help expand everyone involved through ATTRACTIVE marketing!

BONUS PRODUCTS

  • Apparel
  • Agenda
  • Workbooks

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The Book is nearly complete and on its way to print! The Podcast is a success and just needs new equipment to shoot better quality episodes.

In my experience, the greatest risk with campaigns is shipping. This can be a time-consuming process, though I'm proud to have shipped over 10,000 packages in my years as a project creator and entrepreur with an online shop. Because the US Postal Service is never perfect, I always budget for replacement decks and extra postage costs to make sure misplaced packages don't mean individual backers are left hanging.

As with any printing job, there's always a slight risk of production issues. I'll work to be as transparent as possible, keeping in contact via project updates if there are any delays in the process. The goal is that with my printer-ready book and previous sampling, we'll be good to go!

story:
Los fundadores de la organización Smart Help, Sebastián Piedra y Harold Garita, decidieron combatir la problemática del frío que sufren las personas sin hogar al darse cuenta de que el gobierno costarricense y las entidades de bien social no han logrado un cambio positivo tangible y duradero en las calles de San José, Costa Rica.

 

Con esto en mente, desde inicios del 2015, comenzaron a diseñar una cobija eléctrica eficiente, barata, fácil de producir y que utilice energía ilimitada para brindar calor. 

 

 

Costa Rica es un país tropical con un clima errático y frecuentes lluvias donde las personas sin hogar resultan ser las más afectadas. Smart Help es la primera organización sin fines de lucro en poner en uso tecnología para resolver problemas sociales reales que sufrimos en Costa Rica. El objetivo principal de esta campaña es brindarle abrigo y calor a 100 personas afectadas del centro de San José.

Para lograr nuestro objetivo, la organización requiere de $3000 que serán destinados a la compra de materiales necesarios para la confección de las cobijas. Entre ellos, se encuentran motores, baterías y filamento de plástico. Por cada $20 recaudados, una persona sin hogar recibirá su cobija eléctrica que la protegerá del frío y el viento.

 

La organización cuenta con un cuerpo de voluntarios, compuesto por estudiantes colegiales y universitarios, encargado de confeccionar, promocionar y entregar las cobijas eléctricas.

¡Vos podés ayudar a una persona sin hogar y

al mismo tiempo recibir una recompensa por tu solidaridad!

 

 

¡Si no podés contribuir con una donación económica,

ayúdanos al compartir y difundir nuestra campaña!

story:
Timothy Brewster, es un jóven con discapacidad intelectual que tiene el anhelo de nivelar sus estudios de nivel primario, para poder ingresar a capacitarse y llegar a ser Chef.

A través de esta campaña, los fondos recaudados serán para apoyar a jóvenes como Timothy a ser productivos, capacitarse para el empleo y autoempleo.

Con tu ayuda, podemos lograr que los jóvenes con discapacidad se integren a la vida productiva.

 

 Necesitamos recaudar $ 10,000 para atender a los jóvenes con discapacidad de escasos recursos económicos, identificados por nuestra Asociación, capacitarlos para el empleo, nivelar sus estudios de nivel primaria e incluirlos a la vida productiva del país.   Los fondos recaudados serán destinados íntegramente al apoyo de los jóvenes con discapacidad.

Ayúdanos!!!! podemos hacer que nuestros jóvenes se integren a la vida productiva y tengan la oportunidad que necesitan.    Haremos un historial de cada jóven sobre su evolución y la forma en que se utilizarán los fondos.

 Si no logramos la meta propuesta, atenderemos a los jóvenes para los que el fondo alcance.

Ayúdanos!!!! podemos hacer que nuestros jóvenes se integren a la vida productiva y tengan la oportunidad que necesitan.    Haremos un historial de cada jóven sobre su evolución y la forma en que se utilizarán los fondos.
 Si no logramos la meta propuesta, atenderemos a los jóvenes para los que el fondo alcance.

story:
Emotional Intelligence Magazine

Emotion Understood

#EQforLife

What is Emotional Intelligence (EQ)?

Simple Version: EQ is much like IQ, Just instead of Cognitive (IQ), It’s Emotional (EQ)

Definitions:

(IQ) Intelligence Quota- General ability to solve problems and understand concepts.

(EQ) Emotional Intelligence Quota (Aka. EI)- General Ability to understand and control emotions 

Spelled out:

“Emotional Intelligence…lies in…

(1) knowing how to recognize your own emotions, 

(2) knowing how to control those emotions, 

(3) knowing how to recognize emotions in other people, 

(4) and knowing how to handle those emotions” 

-Lee Nicole Salinis, Quoted from They Drive Me Nuts!

EQ in Action:

Recognize, Understand, Manage & Influence Emotions  

*See also info graph for more definitions on what Emotional Intelligence is.*

Who am I? And What do I know? 

     My name Lee Nicole Salinis, I am The Author of They Drive Me Nuts!, have B. A. in Psychology, and am teacher qualified through Hawai’i CANOES registry. I have worked in child care since the age of 12  and have educated over one hundred children in both Hawai’i and Pennsylvania. My mission is simply Emotion Understood. More complexly, to rise as many EQ’s as possible.

     As a Preschool teacher I noticed the importance of Emotional Intelligence, as well as the lack of education available for most parents on the subject. This Inspired Me to write my book: They Drive Me Nuts! 7 ways to build positive relationships with your children by getting to know yourself.

So Why a magazine?

     Realizing the need for Emotional Intelligence extended well beyond the home and classroom as well as beyond my own expertise, I created a Collaboration of Authorities to simplify Emotional Intelligence for Parents, Professionals and Students. So began Emotional Intelligence Magazine. 

What do we need?

     To be able to pay amazing people a decent salary to help Make Emotional Understanding Easy we need funds. Unfortunately I do not have enough funds or credit to borrow the funds needed to start the magazine. Which is why I am asking you for help…But YOU ARE more important so More on funds after we talk about what YOU want!

What do YOU get?

Well to answer that let’s look at where you NEED Emotional Intelligence (EQ):

 

Where is EQ needed in your everyday life?​

 

  • Kids making you angry?  
    • (Parent-Child Relationships)
  • Spouse got you sad?  
    • (Parent-Parent relationships)
  • Want to express how happy your friends make you?  
    • (Personal Friendships)  
  • Having trouble staying calm with your neighbors?  
    • (Neighbor & Community Relationships)

Where can you get advice on how to handle emotions like angry, sad, happy and calm in these situations?

Emotional Intelligence Magazine

 

Where is EQ needed in your business life? 

 

  • Need to negotiate with an anxious vender?  
    • (Business-Business relationships)    
  • Handle a frustrated customer?
    • (Client/Customer relationships)
  •  Put up with a jealous co-worker?  
    • (Co-worker friendships)                            
  • Build trust in a Cautious public?
    • (Public & Community relationships) 

Where can you get strategies on how to handle emotions like                                                            anxious, frustrated, jealous, and cautious in these situations?

Emotional Intelligence Magazine

 

Where is EQ needed in your Academic life? 

 

  • Have overwhelmed students or boring teachers?  
    • (Educator-Student relationships)                        
  • Talking to Confused Parents?  
    • (Educator-Parent relationships)  
  • Embarrassed by a peer?  
    • (Peer-Peer friendships)                     
  • Events cause School or Community to be frightened? 
    • (School & Community relationships)

Where can you get guidance on how to handle emotions like overwhelmed, boring, confused, ecstatic, embarrassed, and frightened in these situations?

Emotional Intelligence Magazine

 

     Just from Home, School and Work, with only a few scenarios emotions as simple as: angry, sad, happy and calm to as complex as: anxious, frustrated, jealous, cautious, overwhelmed, boring, confused, ecstatic, embarrassed, and frightened! Yikes that’s a lot to feel! 

But never fear Emotional Intelligence Magazine is here!

 

What does Emotional Intelligence Magazine need?

 

Campaign Goals:

Happy Minimum to Emotional recognition: $25,000+ 

Used for: (estimates Based on minimum cost averages of One edition, 32 page magazine @ 1,000 copies, see info graph*, +plus start up costs= about $18k-$36k presented below)

  • Licensing to office supplies $2,000-$4,000
  • LLC registration to legal fees $1,000-$5,000
  • TradeMark registration to legal fees $1,000-5,000
  • Marketing $3,000-$5,000
  • Purchase of articles for Magazine $800-$3,200
  • Editing and Design $3,152-$6,740
  • Publication and distribution $7,000-…in this budget no more than 1,000 copies :(

-Downside:

All work still on me, my home is the office ;( 

 

Ecstatic Target to launch Emotional Intelligence: $250,000+ 

(It is recommended that a new magazine has 1-3 years of full expenses funded to ensure survival)

Used for: (estimates Based on minimum cost averages of 12 editions, 32 page magazine @ 1,000 copies, see info graph*, +plus start up costs= about $192k-$378k presented below)

  • Licensing, office supplies $2,000-$4,000
  • LLC registration, legal fees $1,000-$5,000
  • TradeMark registration, legal fees $1,000-5,000
  • Marketing $6,000-$10,000
  • Purchase of articles for Magazine $9,600-$38,400
  • Editing and Design $37,824-$80,880
  • Publication and distribution $84,000…still only budget for 1,000 copies

+

  • Office space $800-$3,000/month or $9,600-$36,000/year
  • A Salaried employee (Help for me means higher Quality!) $40,000-$60,000 yearly salary
  • Work load divided so magazine becomes more productive  $Priceless

What if the campaign brings in more than enough for this levels goals?

  • Possible Purchase of news stand(s) for self-sustaining marketing (Cash Flow) $50,00-$150,000

-Downside:

Still some financial unknowns and not much added to job market

 

Euphoric Outrageously successful Emotional Intelligence Magazine: $2.5mil+ 

(It is recommended that a new magazine has 1-3 years of full expenses funded to ensure survival)

Used for (estimates Based on minimum cost averages of 3 years monthly  editions, 64 page magazine @ 10,000 copies, see info graph*, +plus start up costs= about $1,763,872mil-$3,929,840mil presented below)

  • Licensing, office supplies $2,000-$4,000
  • LLC registration, legal fees $1,000-$5,000
  • TradeMark registration, legal fees $1,000-5,000
  • Marketing $18,000-$30,000
  • Purchase of articles for Magazine $28,800-$115,200
  • Editing and Design $113,472-$242,640
  • Publication and distribution $840,000… 10,000 copies

+

  • Office space $800-$3,000/month or $9,600-$36,000/year
  • Salaried employeeS 2-5 (A TEAM!) $60k-$250k yearly salaries
  • Possible Purchase of news stand(s) for self-sustaining marketing (Cash Flow) $50,00-$150,000
  • Work load expertly delegated so magazine becomes more productive  $Priceless

++

  • Create 2-5+ Full Time Jobs in the market $60k-$250k yearly salaries 
  • Leave my 9-5 and focus solely on my passion! $40k-$60K yearly salary 

What if the campaign brings in more than enough for this levels goals?

  • Purchase of publishing house for self-sustaining office (the space pays for itself)
    • $200,000-$2,000,000 depending on location, size, and if the real estate comes with the purchase 
      • Ability to aid other magazines launch demos $Priceless

-Downside:

...hmmm I guess higher legal fees?

*See "How much does it cost to publish a magazine" Info-Graph for a more in-depth break down of costs*

What has been spent on the project out of your own pocket?

About 100+ hours of:

design, web-building, blogging, marketing, social media creation & out reach, writing, researching, and planning

Around  $600 in cash and about $5,000 in valued work

(probably an under estimate of about how much I would have paid marketers, writers, editors, web designers, bloggers, social media marketers, and virtual assistants to do what I did for free out of passion) 

So About=$5,600

Where will the funds go if you don’t reach your goals?

     The funds will be spent mostly on articles for the magazine and fiverr.com agents will be getting most if not all editing, formatting and design gigs. (That’s where all my money for this project goes now :)  ....Logo designs were created by fiverr agents!

However, I would much rather reach the goals so I can help more people.

     Your generous contribution will help Parents, Professionals and Students Just like YOU, live more emotionally successful and satisfying lives. Help me rise EQ all around the world through Emotional Intelligence Magazine so we can all be left with our Emotions Understood.

So Get Your Perk and start helping people today!

Perks!

     Just to start here are the first round of perks. Yes, I said the first round. There are many others in store, including secret perks that only those with the secret link can find! But they only become available if these sell out! 

$1-Foundational Dollar (Only 25!)

     The first dollars are the most important! Be the foundational dollars donated and you will receive a digital certificate of your foundational donation via email.

$25-SAD it's not ready yet (Only 100!)

     Are you Sad this magazine isn't ready yet? That's ok, you can push things along with this perk to get your digital copy sooner!

$250-Happy Someone Finally did it! (Only 15!)

     Are you happy someone finally did it? Someone finally put together a magazine for the everyday individuals to learn about Emotional Intelligence with out needing a PH.D. to understand it? Then this is the perk for you! You will receive a digital Copy of the first run Magazine, as well as a 1 year subscription, and your name printed in the magazine!

Can’t afford a perk but want to support? 

We feel you :) 

A simple share on social media is priceless to us!

 

What are the benefits beyond US?

 

√ Higher EQ leads to better grades in school

√ Higher work productivity

√More satisfying and positive relationships

 

√Less Bullying

√Less Violence

√Less Violence leads to less conflict

 

√Which leads to less WARs

√Which lead to a more peaceful planet 

√Which leads to you being awesome because you contributed to the original campaign!

 

-Risks & -Challenges:  +Qualifications to overcome

 

- My first magazine project

+NOT my first publication, I have already published a book

 

- All projects that attract money attract people who want to take it

+The higher the Campaign brings in the more funds for legal protection 

 

-Still building a team

+ I know wonderful, qualified people who would be interested if only I had the funds to pay them 

 

You tell me what you see

+ I will tell you how I shall overcome

 

Let’s rise EQ together and make the world a more Emotionally satisfying place to live!

 

Emotional Intelligence Magazine

Emotions Understood 

Lee Nicole Salinis

EmoIntelMag.com
