story:
WHO AM I AND WHAT IS THE IDEA?

My name is Daniel Lipscombe, I've been a writer for eight years and have written about videogames and literature over that time for many different outlets. My writing has been featured in The Telegraph, The Guardian and websites; Strategy Informer, Game Critics, We Love This Book and Book Trust.

This campaign exists because I want to produce a book about the grief of losing a child and how it can affect a persons mental health. Since my daughter passed away, I've wanted to find and read a book that depicts how I feel so that I know I'm not alone in my grief, but I also wanted to read an account of how someone could cope in that position. For the last ten years I've suffered with depression, anxiety and borderline personality disorder, which all stemmed from Amelia's death. This book will hopefully help others who struggle with mental health problems.

By pledging to this campaign, you are not only helping me to produce a book that can aid others, but you will also help to create a lasting tribute to Amelia and help me to hopefully close this chapter of my life.

You can find some of my writing about Amelia on my blog HERE, but I'm including a few quotes throughout this pitch to give you a sense of the style.

"Three years of hair growth reduced by 50% from the operation the night before. Her usual centre parting split her curling locks of hair and a barren stretch of stubble dotted with marker pen lines and stitches. My first remark to her was that she looked like mummy and daddy combined or like a comic book villain split down the middle. They’d shaved her head to remove half of her skull – this allowed her brain to swell without constriction. It was supposed to help her recover. Red, blue, green wires snaked out from incisions in her scalp and monitored the pressures in her still developing brain. Catheter, feeding tube, drip lines and canulas were dotted along her body for liquids and blood transfusions. My three year old daughter looked like a marionette with cut strings."

WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU WILL GET IF YOU PLEDGE

I aim to raise £1600 which will go towards various aspects of producing this book. The money raised will cover all printing and shipping costs, as well as hiring a designer for the cover and an editor to oversee the contents. Some funds will be used to pay fees for the release of medical and police records, in order for my details to be exact and correct.

There are a range of tiers that you can pledge towards. I want this to be something that is affordable for those who need it, but to also offer a product for those who want a book they can love. This is why I have a low price eBook version and varying levels to support the hardback.

"Over five days we watched the ICP monitor. We helped moisturise her skin and feed her. The feeding was done via a tube which connected to a syringe. Inside the syringe was a murky beige liquid. We’d have to stand by her bed holding it in the air while gravity did its job. But it was a connection to her and made us feel like we were caring and doing our bit. After all, we couldn’t do anything else. We’d play music and take turns reading stories in the hope that she could hear us. We’d talk to her and tell her jokes all while watching that bloody monitor for signs that we were getting through."

IMPACT AND POSSIBLE ISSUES

This book is the book I needed over the years and I hope that it finds others who are in need of support, whether they are in the early stages of grief or whether they suffer from mental health issues and just want to hear the story of someone else. Everything in the book will be honest and open in the hope that someone can feel supported.

As someone who suffers from mental health issues, there are of course times when it gets in the way of what I want to achieve. This is why I aim stating here that the goal is to deliver the book in October 2017. Much of the book is already written, but I want to write the best book I can, so it needs time.

This project is my sole goal and I will strive to create something that I can be proud of, but also that my supporters can be proud of. There may be days when my mood is low and it slows me down, but I WILL create this work. I have a great support group around me in friends, family and medical professionals who will help me to continue and push this project to its conclusion.

"Above everything I feel anger and hatred and frustration. It’s an anger I’ve never previously felt. The sensation of wanting to smash everything into tiny pieces is a constant presence and it’s something that everyone thinks they understand, but they don’t. It’s rage, it’s fire, it’s an incandescent urge to destroy until all that’s left is me and my grief. It’s not like wanting to punch or kick, it’s a want to break things – material, spiritual and mental – down to atoms that can be split open and pulverise all of creation. The animosity that sits in my core is something I fear because it’s slowly destroying everything I love and hold dear."

YOU CAN HELP!

I hope you feel that you can pledge something towards my goals. If you can't, that doesn't matter, all I ask of you is that you help spread the word. Post about the project on your social media channels and tell friends and family about it. Help me make some noise and get this book in the hands of people who need it or just want to read about a tough little girl who ultimately lost her fight.

story:
Synopsis: The Hummingbird who returned from his ashes

 
Hummingbird was a magical bird that descended from the legendary bird Phoenix, of which it is said that his tears possessed healing powers and that his body was immortal.

Hummingbird lived in the field with his friends feeding on beautiful flowers, until his life changed when he decided to go to the city.

Accompany Colibri on this long journey

 

Who I am? 

 

DANIEL CENTENO. El Palmar, Edo. Bolivar, 1993.
Student of Social Communication (Bicentenaria University of Aragua). Member of the Guayanés Cultural Group "Alejandro Vargas" that publishes the literary supplement "La Barca de Oro", included on Sundays in the newspaper El Progreso. President of the Cultural Civil Association "IS SPEAKING IN POETRY" that executes the homonymous program of training of the latest poets (school-age children)
 
 
He has participated in several literary contests, being awarded in the following:
 

    I Contest Telling Stories of the U.E.N. "José Eugenio Sánchez Afanador" (Venezuela, 2006) 1st Place;

 

    II Edition of the Children's Literature Contest Don Simón Rodríguez. 1st place, with the story El Colibrí that returned from the Ashes (Venezuela, 2006);

 

    III Edition of the Children's Literature Contest Don Simón Rodríguez. 3rd place, with the story A tree for life (Venezuela, 2006);

 

    I Hogwarts Mini Magical Story Contest, with the mini story: Between gnomes and pumpkins (Madrid, Spain, 2007)

 

    1st place; Letters of Love Competition, Lancöme Venezuela (Venezuela, 2012) 1st Place;

 

    Letters of Love Mont Blanc Competition (Venezuela, 2012) Finalist;

 

    Letters of Love contest of the Bicentenaria Aragua University (Venezuela, 2012)

 

    1st place; International Competition How would you defeat La Reina? (Miami - United States, 2012) 1st Place;

 

    Poetry Contest Contact Intimate (Venezuela, 2012) 1st Place;

 

    Letters of Love Contest Chinatown (Murcia, Spain, 2013) 3rd Place;

 

    Contest "Love in 140 characters" of the newspaper El Nacional. Finalist;

 

    Poetry Contest Revista DesdeAhora, (Venezuela, 2014) 1st Place;

 

    MicroFicción40 competition at the Buenos Aires International Book Fair
    (Argentina, 2014) Finalist;

 

    Poetry Contest Revista DesdeAhora, (Venezuela, 2014) 1st Place.

 
 
In 2012 he is awarded the Order Father Pedro Chien, in his Only Class. "For his contribution to Culture in El Palmar, Padre Pedro Chien municipality of Bolivar State" Awarded by the Municipal Legislative Council.
 
In 2013 participates in the Ibero-American Contest Cambia Tu Mundo, from Ashoka, being winner by Venezuela to implement the cultural entrepreneurship project "Se Habla en Poesía".
 
In February 2014 he represents Venezuela at the IV Encuentro of Young Writers of Latin America and the Caribbean, held in the framework of the Havana Book Fair.
 
In July 2014 he is recognized by the United Nations Population Fund, chapter Venezuela, as winner of the "Super Young" Contest as an example of progress and serve as a model for other young people to travel the route to excellence
 
In September 2016, he won the 2nd place of Banesco's Microfiction # C140 Competition.
 
In October 2016, he was awarded the 3rd place in the "Ellas para el futuro" letter contest, convened by the United Nations Population Fund.

 

 

Support me to publish the adventures of Colibri and help me get him out of the digital world!

story:
Für Spenden via PayPal, bitte hier klicken

Die Geschichte die wir uns ausgedacht haben:
Das Jahr 2150 ist geprägt von mächtigen, skrupellosen Soldaten und Angehörigen des Regimes. Während sich die Neu-Alliierten auf dem Kontinent Amerika in Sicherheit wiegen, kämpft in weiten Teilen von Europa die Fraktion der Antitechniker in alten Untergrundbasen und Bunkern gegen das Regime. Die Antitechniker waren einst die Hüter des technologischen Fortschrittes, nun müssen sie verzweifelt gegen ein Regime kämpfen welche ihre Technologien übernommen haben. Das Regime überwacht alles und jeden. Es gibt keine Privatsphäre mehr. 

Als im Jahre 2150 durch ein "galaktisches" Ereignis, ausgelöst durch eine fremde Macht, die sogenannten Reptoiden der Cluster (das bekannte Universum) in Erschütterung geraten, werden Joe und Vivianne Dexter aus ihrem Leben im Jahre 2016 in die Zukunft geschleudert.

Joe und Vivianne stranden in einer Zukunft, welches alles Bekannte in den Schatten stellt. Sie schliessen sich dem Widerstand an und kämpfen gegen das Regime. Die Zeit-reisenden müssen unweigerlich feststellen, dass die Menschheit nichts aus Ihren Fehlern gelernt hat.

Das Regime ist so mächtig, dass eine Aussicht auf Erfolg kaum denkbar ist. In den Untergrundbasen entwickelt der Widerstand Waffen, neue Strategien und entdecken ein uraltes Wissen wieder. Der Kampf beginnt. Doch was die Rebellen nicht wissen, ist der Umstand, dass die Neu-Germanier nur Lakaien einer Spezies sind, die bereits seit Jahrtausenden Krieg gegen das Licht führt. Die Erde ist das Zentrum eines uralten Krieges. Einige Menschen besitzen eine Essenz und wissen nichts davon, da diese sich erst noch offenbaren. Wenn die Offenbarung gewinnt dann wird sich das Weltgeschehen ändern.  

In unserem Artbook der Zukunft beleben wir die Welt rund um die in den Romanen "Gefangene der Zukunft" beschriebenen Handlungen. Wir hauchen dem neuen Science-Fiction Universum mehr Leben ein und bringen die Technologien, Gebäude, Fraktionen und Alltagsgegenstände auf Papier. Wir stellen die Welt der Zukunft in einem Buch dar.

Ich bin Steve Schild und Autor von Gefangene der Zukunft. Zusammen mit Leo Kopka, Grafiker und Designer bringen wir die Welt der Zukunft in ein schönes Hardcover Buch. Lassen Sie sich von tollen Bildern inspirieren und tauchen Sie mit uns in die Welt der Zukunft ein. 

  • Wer ist Steve Schild? Hier gehts zur privaten Seite von Steve Schild.
  • Wer ist Leo Kopka? Hier gehts zur privaten Seite und dem Portfolio von Leo Kopka.

 

Wir haben dir Gebäude, Untergrundbasen, Scanner, Kommunikationsgeräte und viele weitere Dinge aus der Zukunft gezeichnet. Wir geben Dir einen Einblick in die Welt von "Morgen" einer Welt in der die Menschheit nichts aus Ihren Fehlern gelernt hat und ein bösartiges Regime die Erde beherrscht. Wir zeigen Ideen und Konzepte von Fluggeräten, Fahrzeugen und Alltagsgegenständen. Wir erklären warum es im Jahre 2150 immer noch Cola gibt und Schokolade immer noch ein Teil der Ernährung bildet. Wir haben im Artbook QR-Codes versteckt. Mit diesen Codes gelangst Du zu interaktiven Medien die online aufrufen werden kann. Was das sein wird, halten wir geheim. Finde es heraus.

Auf vielen farbigen Seiten im Format 14.8x21cm als Hardcover bieten wir schöne hochauflösenden Grafiken, Konzepte und Bilder und lassen  in eine Welt der optischen Sinnesreizen eintauchen. Wie sieht die Natur nach einer nuklearen Katastrophe aus und wie leben die Menschen in der Zukunft? Visionen, Konzepte und Ideen auf vielen Seiten Hochglanzpapier. Selbst wenn Du die Romane nicht kennst, lassen wir Dich in eine Welt der Zukunft eintauchen und geben Inspiration und Visionen. Wir erklären, warum die Nahrung in 3D-Druckern hergestellt wird und das iPhone noch immer eine Rolle spielt. Was haben NanoBots für Aufgaben in der Zukunft und wie leben wir auf dem Mars und Mond? Das und viele weitere Bilder lassen Dich in eine futuristische Welt des Jahres 2150 reisen. Unsere Konzepte und Bilder beruhen auf Verschwörungstheorien, aktueller Technologie und Ideen von Zukunftsforschern. Eine Welt im Jahre 2150 in Bildern. 

Daten zum Buch und Lieferumfang: 

  • Format: DiNA5 (14.8x21.0 cm)
  • Hardcover Strukturgeprägt
  • Fotobrillant Papier
  • Sprache: Deutsch / Englisch
  • Spezielles:
    - NFC Chip für Zugriff auf Spezialinhalte, frei programmierbar nach Benutzung
    - QR-Codes für Zugriff auf Spezialinhalte
    - Versteckte Codes und Rätsel 
    - Der Lieferumfang beinhaltet ein Google-Card Board für eine VR-Erfahrung
     

Hier ein Vorgeschmack

Dass Bild zeigt eine Waffe der Neu-Alliierten welche im Kampf gegen die Neu-Germanier verwendet wird. Die Waffe ist modular und kann an die verschiedenen Verhältnisse angepasst werden. Die Munition besteht aus unterschiedlichen Energie-Kapseln die je nach Anwendungsgebiet unterschiedliche Strahlungen erzeugen kann. Die Waffe ist sehr leicht und besteht aus einer Karbon-Metallverbindung. Das Gewehr kann sowohl im Nahkampf, wie auch in der Flugzeug und Panzerabwehr sowie als Sniper-Gewehr verwendet werden. 

 

Wir haben die Perks nach militärischen Rängen sortiert, auf dieser Grafik siehst Du was Du für Deine Unterstützung bekommst. Jeder Rang steht für einen Perk. 

 

 Private

Du bekommst ein Dankeschön per Mail und ein zufälliges Artbook Bild. Der Kommandant persönlich wird sich bei Dir melden.

 

 Private first class

Du bekommst ein eBook von Gefangene der Zukunft in einem Format Deiner Wahl.

 

 Sergeant

Der Widerstand im Jahre 2150 hat schlechte Waffen, wenig Personal und sieht sich einem übermächtigem Feind gegenüber. Unterstütze den Widerstand mit einer Spende. Du bekommst einen Dankesbrief des Kommandanten als PDF per eMail. Vielleicht wirst Du sogar rekrutiert. Wir zählen auf Dich.

 

 Staff Sergeant

Nur bei dieser Kampagne, dass Taschenbuch Gefangene der Zukunft zu Sonderkonditionen mit 27% Rabatt. Sie haben die einmalige Gelegenheit das Buch hier vergünstigt zu erwerben.

 

 Master Sergeant

Du bekommst ein eArtbook der Zukunft

 

 First Lieutnant

Du bekommst ein eBook Gefangene der Zukunft in einem Format Deiner Wahl. Zusätzlich ein eArtbook.

 

 Major

Ein gedrucktes Artbook. Hardcover, Hochglanz.

 

 Lieutnant Colonel

Du bekommst ein Artbook der Zukunft und ein eBook Gefangene der Zukunft zum Vorteilspreis.

 

 Colonel

Du bekommst ein Hardcover Artwork Buch und ein eBook"Gefangene der Zukunft" sowie  Hintergrundinformationen zur Entstehung der Romanreihe. Spannende Hintergründe, die Entstehung und weitere interessante Fakten rund um das neue Science-Fiction Universum. Zudem bekommst Du eine Leseprobe Gefangene der Zukunft, Essenz als erster.

 

 Brigadier General

Unser Designer Leo Kopka erstellt Dir eine individuelle Grafik auf Wunsch aus dem Roman "Gefangene der Zukunft" oder nach Deinen Vorstellungen eines Objektes in der Zukunft. Die Grafik bekommst Du als Vektor-Datei oder als Datei Deines Wunsches. (PDF, JPG, etc.) Weitere Informationen bekommst Du per eMail nach Abschluss der Kampagne.

 

Major General

Ein Abendessen mit einem leckeren 3 Gang Menü für zwei Personen nach dem Motto, dass Essen der Zukunft. 
Lass Dich von einem Menü inspirieren das Du so noch nicht kennst. Eine Atmosphäre die der Welt im Jahre 2150 nahe kommt. Natürlich bekommst Du alle vorangehenden Perks ebenfalls.

 

General

Dein Name wird im dritten Teil der Buchreihe "Gefangene der Zukunft" als Hauptcharakter eine Rolle spielen. Natürlich bekommst Du alle vorangehenden Perks ebenfalls.

 

Wir haben hier eine Grafik die aufzeigt, wofür wir das Geld benötigen. Du bekommst das ArtBook und Deine bestellten Perks auf jedenfall, denn die Arbeit am Buch hat längst begonnen und wir sind im März 2018 fertig und können dann voraussichtlich das Buch ausliefern. 

 

Unser grösstes Risiko ist das euch unser Buch nicht gefällt. Wir arbeiten hart und investieren viel Zeit in das Buch, wir haben Feedbacks von euch geholt, mit Leuten gesprochen und sind auf viele Wünsche und Anregungen von euch eingegangen. Man kennt uns nicht und wir sind zwei unbekannte Personen. Hast Du Fragen? Dann kontaktiere uns unter steve.schild@bluewin.ch
Unser Risiko besteht darin, dass wir sehr viel Zeit und Geld in ein Produkt investieren, dass es so noch nicht gibt. Gefangene der Zukunft ist ein Science-Fiction Universum das noch völlig unbekannt ist.

Genau wie Du, haben wir uns die Frage gestellt, sollen wir das Projekt starten? 
Wir haben uns für ein JA entschieden. Wir sind überzeugt, dass unser Buch euch anregt Geanken über die Zukunft zu machen. 
 
Wir sind fast am Schluss, hier noch einmal kurz zusammengefasst die wichtigsten Fragen:

Die Geschichte die wir uns ausgedacht haben:Das Jahr 2150 ist geprägt von mächtigen, skrupellosen Soldaten und Angehörigen des Regimes. Während sich die Neu-Alliierten auf dem Kontinent Amerika in Sicherheit wiegen, kämpft in weiten Teilen von Europa die Fraktion der Antitechniker in alten Untergrundbasen und Bunkern gegen das Regime. Die Antitechniker waren einst die Hüter des technologischen Fortschrittes, nun müssen sie verzweifelt gegen ein Regime kämpfen welche ihre Technologien übernommen haben. Das Regime überwacht alles und jeden. Es gibt keine Privatsphäre mehr. 
Als im Jahre 2150 durch ein "galaktisches" Ereignis, ausgelöst durch eine fremde Macht, die sogenannten Reptoiden der Cluster (das bekannte Universum) in Erschütterung geraten, werden Joe und Vivianne Dexter aus ihrem Leben im Jahre 2016 in die Zukunft geschleudert.
Joe und Vivianne stranden in einer Zukunft, welches alles Bekannte in den Schatten stellt. Sie schliessen sich dem Widerstand an und kämpfen gegen das Regime. Die Zeit-reisenden müssen unweigerlich feststellen, dass die Menschheit nichts aus Ihren Fehlern gelernt hat.
Das Regime ist so mächtig, dass eine Aussicht auf Erfolg kaum denkbar ist. In den Untergrundbasen entwickelt der Widerstand Waffen, neue Strategien und entdecken ein uraltes Wissen wieder. Der Kampf beginnt. Doch was die Rebellen nicht wissen, ist der Umstand, dass die Neu-Germanier nur Lakaien einer Spezies sind, die bereits seit Jahrtausenden Krieg gegen das Licht führt. Die Erde ist das Zentrum eines uralten Krieges. Einige Menschen besitzen eine Essenz und wissen nichts davon, da diese sich erst noch offenbaren. Wenn die Offenbarung gewinnt dann wird sich das Weltgeschehen ändern.  
In unserem Artbook der Zukunft beleben wir die Welt rund um die in den Romanen "Gefangene der Zukunft" beschriebenen Handlungen. Wir hauchen dem neuen Science-Fiction Universum mehr Leben ein und bringen die Technologien, Gebäude, Fraktionen und Alltagsgegenstände auf Papier. Wir stellen die Welt der Zukunft in einem Buch dar.Ich bin Steve Schild und Autor von Gefangene der Zukunft. Zusammen mit Leo Kopka, Grafiker und Designer bringen wir die Welt der Zukunft in ein schönes Hardcover Buch. Lassen Sie sich von tollen Bildern inspirieren und tauchen Sie mit uns in die Welt der Zukunft ein. 

Wer ist Steve Schild? Hier gehts zur privaten Seite von Steve Schild.

Wer ist Leo Kopka? Hier gehts zur privaten Seite und dem Portfolio von Leo Kopka.


 

Wir haben dir Gebäude, Untergrundbasen, Scanner, Kommunikationsgeräte und viele weitere Dinge aus der Zukunft gezeichnet. Wir geben Dir einen Einblick in die Welt von "Morgen" einer Welt in der die Menschheit nichts aus Ihren Fehlern gelernt hat und ein bösartiges Regime die Erde beherrscht. Wir zeigen Ideen und Konzepte von Fluggeräten, Fahrzeugen und Alltagsgegenständen. Wir erklären warum es im Jahre 2150 immer noch Cola gibt und Schokolade immer noch ein Teil der Ernährung bildet. Wir haben im Artbook QR-Codes versteckt. Mit diesen Codes gelangst Du zu interaktiven Medien die online aufrufen werden kann. Was das sein wird, halten wir geheim. Finde es heraus.
Auf vielen farbigen Seiten im Format 14.8x21cm als Hardcover bieten wir schöne hochauflösenden Grafiken, Konzepte und Bilder und lassen  in eine Welt der optischen Sinnesreizen eintauchen. Wie sieht die Natur nach einer nuklearen Katastrophe aus und wie leben die Menschen in der Zukunft? Visionen, Konzepte und Ideen auf vielen Seiten Hochglanzpapier. Selbst wenn Du die Romane nicht kennst, lassen wir Dich in eine Welt der Zukunft eintauchen und geben Inspiration und Visionen. Wir erklären, warum die Nahrung in 3D-Druckern hergestellt wird und das iPhone noch immer eine Rolle spielt. Was haben NanoBots für Aufgaben in der Zukunft und wie leben wir auf dem Mars und Mond? Das und viele weitere Bilder lassen Dich in eine futuristische Welt des Jahres 2150 reisen. Unsere Konzepte und Bilder beruhen auf Verschwörungstheorien, aktueller Technologie und Ideen von Zukunftsforschern. Eine Welt im Jahre 2150 in Bildern. 
Daten zum Buch und Lieferumfang: 

Format: DiNA5 (14.8x21.0 cm)
Hardcover Strukturgeprägt
Fotobrillant Papier
Sprache: Deutsch / Englisch
Spezielles:- NFC Chip für Zugriff auf Spezialinhalte, frei programmierbar nach Benutzung- QR-Codes für Zugriff auf Spezialinhalte- Versteckte Codes und Rätsel - Der Lieferumfang beinhaltet ein Google-Card Board für eine VR-Erfahrung 

Hier ein Vorgeschmack
Dass Bild zeigt eine Waffe der Neu-Alliierten welche im Kampf gegen die Neu-Germanier verwendet wird. Die Waffe ist modular und kann an die verschiedenen Verhältnisse angepasst werden. Die Munition besteht aus unterschiedlichen Energie-Kapseln die je nach Anwendungsgebiet unterschiedliche Strahlungen erzeugen kann. Die Waffe ist sehr leicht und besteht aus einer Karbon-Metallverbindung. Das Gewehr kann sowohl im Nahkampf, wie auch in der Flugzeug und Panzerabwehr sowie als Sniper-Gewehr verwendet werden.

Exciting background, the creation and further interesting facts about the new science fiction universe. In addition, you will get a sample of prisoners of the future, essence as the first.

You can get the graphic as a vector file or as a file of your wish. (PDF, JPG, etc.) You will receive further information by e-mail after completion of the campaign. Major General A dinner with a delicious 3 course menu for two persons according to the motto that food of the future. Let yourself be inspired by a menu you do not yet know. An atmosphere close to the world in 2150. Of course you get all previous Perks as well. General Your name will play a role in the third part of the book series "Prisoners of the Future". Of course you get all previous Perks as well. We have a graphic showing you what we need the money for. You get the artbook and your ordered Perks in any case, because the work on the book began long ago and we are done in March 2018 and can deliver the book.   Our biggest risk is that you do not like our book, we work hard and invest a lot of time in the book, we've got feedback from you, talked to people and went into many requests and suggestions from you. We do not know each other and we are two unknown persons. How do we manage to convince you?   We have been working on the campaign for a long time and are convinced that you will like it. Do you have any questions? Then contact us at steve.schild@bluewin.ch Our risk is that we invest a lot of time and money into a product that does not exist yet. Prisoners of the future is a science fiction universe that is still completely unknown. Just like you, we asked ourselves the question, should we start the project?  We have opted for a YES. We are convinced that our book will please you, we are so convinced of the project that we have accepted a loan so that you get your perks in any case.  We are almost at the end, here again briefly summarized the most important questions:

Why do we want to make the project? Why is our project so important? Let us take you to the future and show you how we could live in the future. How we imagine the future and why it is important to learn from the past. And finally, because we should make us increasingly concerned about the future and not just in the here and now live because everything has what we decide today affect our children and their future. Since I am father this is also for me  much more important. The project is also intended to encourage reflection.  

What do we want to do? What happens in the project? We create an art book and try to answer the question of how we live in the year 2150. We create images, texts and visions. We make advertising, posters, turn banners and Facebook ads.  

How do we implement the project idea? We are a visionary and a graphic designer, we use the latest technologies to you to make an art book of the future. We publish a book.

What consequents result from this if the project takes place or does not take place? The project will start in any case. This means that the book will appear on the market in any case. If we have to cancel the project from an unknown reason, you gain back your money.

Speak in your blog about our campaign
Write us an email with ideas and suggestions of what you're missing? What would be In your opinion, a cool idea?  
Do you have email addresses we are allowed to use? Bring it on. We write Share your contacts and inform them about the campaign.
Do you have contacts in press and media? Bring it on. We will reward you for this too.
Quite generally speaking, tell your friends about the campaign. We reward you individually for your help, just write us an email. steve.schild@bluewin.ch  
That's it already. We would like to thank you for your support.

story:
Christmas special

Short Summary

Dreams in progress:

This project is to help Lonni Graham get her book out into the the market. It is a pre-order Christmas special so we can give you the opportunity to own a book, Santa and the Dragon. 

Few of us can fulfill the task of our dreams alone. So Lonni Graham friends are invited to help with this process by giving parties, or to support with this task. Give Lonni Graham your love and support and be one of the first to see this work come to life. Thank you, and best wishes this Holiday Season. 

Story times are those wide-eyed moments which make every day a holiday. Such occasions lend us the gift of child-like magical delight, filled with joy and hope and wonder. We build family love on such moments, whether it be bedtime, family holidays, or especially, Christmas.

Reflecting upon one’s fondest memories, Grandmother’s love, one-on-one time with Dad, we find that we all have our own abundant harvests.  At the end of every year, each in our own fashion tie the sheaves of heart-felt memories that reconnect us to the ones we love. 

For children, these memories are often bound-up with the stories of wonder and magic which they had been told throughout the year.  Who was your favorite storyteller?  Most likely it was someone who tucked you in, making sure you were snuggled down tight in your bed, before filling your head with wonder and adventures you could not have imagined on your own!  Three cheers for the storyteller, for they broaden our world, lead us to discover ourselves, and allow us to step outside of the boundaries of childhood to explore a larger world in the complete safety of imagination.    

So, fix a plate of cookies and some mugs of hot cocoa, put the wee ones into PJ’s with feet, and with giggles, hugs and kisses, snuggle them down while we present to you: Santa and the Dragon:

 

ABOUT OUR FEATURED AUTHOR: 

LaVonne Darlyn Graham or “Lonni,” as she prefers, at 87 is as quick and imaginative as she has ever been; a trait which caused her first book,

“Truth is a Banquet” to become a favorite world-wide.

Let Lonni Graham inspire and bring you through this mirror to the world of make believe where dragons, wizards, and Santa Live.

To a window where heart meets heart!

She is a loving mother and grandmother.

She has dedicated A Collection of Reflections  another of her works to the following:

The dedication of which states:

"I dedicate this book to families; to the precious and varied stories within each home; to the children who bring joy and chaos, love, humor and enlightenment; to struggling parents; and to the parents whose education would not be complete without all the valuable lessons our children teach us."

"Life, with its challenges, triumphs, disappointments, and disenchantmentes, which can be brought back into balance with the utter sweetness of a touch, a smile or a tender memory."   

Within each of us we have dreams too big to develop on our own.  Deep inside we all know how important this book is to Lonni. 

While this will be her first children's book, there are already five more in the works.

We would like to see Santa and the Dragon placed on the New York best seller list and the best way to reach this goal is to presale a thousand copies.        

The idea for Santa and the Dragon was formed;  

Book idea:

 

Dreams lift us to the possibilities:  

Each book she writes will become another chapter in her Collection of Reflections!!!

Love helps us shoot for the stars! 

To the Sweet People who will help light the way by referring others to our site:

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break down:

Love for “Story Time”:

The funding will bring together the talents and advice of people who would like to see this Exciting Venture succeed! 

We would love to see this wonderful book in print and in the hands of children.  We would love to see storytellers all over the world reading such inspiring tales to children of all circumstances. Please help us make this possible in any way that you can. Thank you!!!  

All funds received, up to and including the goal amount of $3,000, will be used to promote and cover printing costs (less crowd-funding fees for Indiegogo). Startup costs and the printing costs are by far the greatest expense necessary to release the book. Your support will help us print the book, which will be sold online and through selected book stores. 

For those purchasing this book for yourself or a loved one, we set the goals in such a way that each goal would pay for itself.

In demand

Indiegogo has introduced a new feature called 'In demand' which allows fully funded campaigns to accept contributions after the crowd-funding campaign ends. According to Indiegogo this “enables campaign owners to seamlessly transition into the next phase of operations, grow the community and reach new audiences and receive ongoing exposure on the Indiegogo platform.”

We think that this sounds like a smart move and have decided to opt in to 'In demand' which will allow us to continue with pre-sales beyond the campaign end date. This option will not be available if we do not fully fund the campaign. So, thank you and Please help us reach this goal to open this new door which will hopefully see copies of Santa and the Dragon in even more hands.

Don't forget when you back us you can unlock a Secret Perk!

If we reach $5,000 all backers will have the Option to upgrade to a hard cover copy of Santa and the Dragon.

The Impact

We all need that “Story Time” experience

“Story Time” creates a sanctuary, the feeling of a cozy inviting place where love is. We all Search for these moment. The wonders of a “Story time” may last for just a moment; but futures can be built on one perfect moment.

And a plus: when enough books are sold; this truly amazing person; Lonni Graham will have a full-time assistant to aid her in producing these wonderful books.  

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk or challenge that cannot be overcome when enough people stand together.

While this Book is a project that will be loved by many, we will need input and help to complete the tasks and in that there will be challenges.

You face no risk, in that you will receive the book you have paid for. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

For the ones that help, we will be giving away, (for every 100 that sales) (1 special interactive edition of Santa and the Dragon.) 

 Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

 

And Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools when using Facebook, Twitter or any other network resource!  You may even be doing a newsletter.  If so, please include a line encouraging others to purchase Santa and the Dragon.  Thanks!  That would be awesome, so thank you!!!

One of the Highest Value Perks will go to the Backer that Refers the Most People and or does the most to MAKE SOME NOISE! 

Remember to use the Indiegogo. Share Tools!                                                                                                                                                                                                              

Refer as many Friends as You can to add the Most Value to Your Pledge!

·  If 3 of Your Friends Make a Contribution, You Get a Digital Copy in PDF of our 12 page Coloring Book).

·  If 5 of Your Friends Make a Contribution, You Get the Coloring Book PDF + Plus a Digital Copy of the Art Work featured!

·  If 10 of Your Friends Make a Contribution, You Get All above Autographed Sketch Print of Your Choice of Artwork featured!

·  If 15 of Your Friends Make a Contribution, You Get All Of The Above and Book Mark + You will unlock the Secret Perk you can choose!

·  If 20 of Your Friends Make a Contribution, You Get All Of The Above X 2  Plus get a FREE Surprise Bonus Perk!

And the best of all, earn a trip to a Magical place, “Story Time,” where you can become part of a place where dragons dwell!

  PLEASE, REMEMBER! 

For You to count as a Referrer, you must Promote Santa and the Dragon, with Indiegogo’s Share Tools, while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any Resulting Contributions or visits.

[Eg.: When Funder A is logged into Their account and uses Indiegogo’s Share Tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes under A’s unique ID. Then, when Funder B reads the tweet and clicks through the link to contribute, Funder A is recognized as helping bring in the amount contributed by Funder B.]

One last request...

We’d be eternally grateful if you would share the crowd funding link  https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/e777ca51

Visit us at our website:      https://mdddot.wixsite.com/grandmaslove  

And information about Santa and the Dragon with your contacts. You never know how far your Facebook message, tweet or email may go.

So please like us on Facebook:     https://www.facebook.com/LoveGrandmaLove

https://twitter.com/LoveGrandmaLove

email: grandma_love@yahoo.com

Thank you so much for your generous support.

story:
Short Summary

Dudás Gergely vagyok, újságíró. Még az internetrobbanás előtt kezdtem, aztán 2004-től 13 éven át az Indexnél dolgoztam. Voltam gazdasági rovatvezető, főszerkesztő-helyettes, aztán 2013 elejétől idén nyárig, több mint négy éven át főszerkesztő. Egy sok ember távozását követő válsághelyzetben újraépítettem a szerkesztőséget, és sok kiváló kollegámmal szerintem a lehető legjobb újságot csináltuk meg az ingyenes tartalomra épített üzleti modell buktatói mellett.

Az Indexnél a pár hónappal ezelőtt bejelentett tulajdonosváltás után felmondtam. Azért is döntöttem így, mert úgy éreztem, hogy a mai magyar média képtelen betölteni alapvető feladatát: nem tud a közéleti hírekről több aspektusból, kellő mélységben és alapossággal beszámolni. Ez a hiányosság pedig túlmutat önmagán, az egyik oka közbeszédünk durvulásának, felületessé válásának, annak, hogy Magyarországon eltűnt a párbeszéd lehetősége.

Hiszem, hogy a demokrácia egyik alapja a jól működő nyilvánosság.

De az etikus, független és minőségi újságírásnak nemcsak a politikai, hanem a gazdasági függetlenség is fontos feltétele. A legtisztább alapot az előfizetéses megoldás jelenti: ha az újság fő bevételi forrása az olvasóktól érkezik, csak nekik kell megfelelnie, ez a minőség valódi záloga.

Az induláshoz azonban tőke kell. Ha azt akarjuk, hogy legyen valóban minőségi, tisztán közéleti online újság, aminek a függetlensége és a befolyásolhatatlansága biztosított, előre kell összeadni az előfizetési díjakat.

300 millió forint rengeteg pénz, ennyit szeretnék összegyűjteni, de az üzleti terv kisebb mennyiségű hirdetési bevétellel is számol. Ezzel a tőkével el lehet indítani egy több mint 30 fős, a legjobb magyar újságírókból álló szerkesztőséget. Ennyi embert közéleti vonalon a legnagyobb magyar szerkesztőségek sem tudnak felmutatni, de ennél kisebb erejüket is elaprózzák. A minőség egyik garanciája a Politis esetében a csapat létszáma és összetétele, és az, hogy a szenior stábnak kizárólag magas hozzáadott értékű anyagokat kell készítenie.

Tízezer forint az éves előfizetés – azoknak, akik most döntenek, ez közel 60 százalékos kedvezmény a tervezett havi díjhoz képest. Nem kis pénz ez sem. De ez a történet arról is szól, megteremtünk-e Magyarországon a rosszul működő médiapiacon egy valódi közéleti újságot.

Az előfizetőktől ezért megelőlegezett bizalomra van szükség.

De ez azt is jelenti, hogy annak az árát kell megfizetni, hogy az újság mögött nincs oligarcha, megkérdőjelezhető tisztességű vagy szándékú vállalkozó, aki letenné az induláshoz szükséges tőkét. Ez a lap tisztán és csak akkor indul, ha van elég ember, akinek hiányzik egy minőségi közéleti online portál.

Ha nem jön össze elég ember, mindenki visszakapja a pénzét az Indiegogótól: a kampány csak abban az esetben sikeres, ha eléri a kitűzött célt. Ha nem lesz jó az újság, ha az előfizető elégedetlen, akkor valóban veszített, de vele együtt bukik az újság is. Éppen attól tiszta a helyzet, hogy ez lenne Magyarországon hosszú ideje az első szerkesztőség, aminek valóban csak az olvasók elvárásainak kell megfelelnie.

A körülmények nehezek: a közösségi finanszírozást legtipikusabban kütyükre kérik, amikről egy gyönyörű videó megtekintése után a néző úgy érzi, azonnal kell neki egy olyan. A Politis nincs kész. A Politis csapata sincs még együtt, leendő tagjai ma különböző szerkesztőségekben vagy másutt dolgoznak, és nem vállalhatják a felmondás kockázatát egy több hónapos kampányra, szerződéseik érthetően tiltják, hogy konkurens termékek mögé sorakozzanak fel.

Én azt gondolom, hogy van, lennie kell Magyarországon bőven több mint 30 ezer olyan embernek, aki elégedetlen a média, a nyilvánosság állapotával, és hajlandó is elfogadni, hogy ha változást és minőségi sajtót akar, fizetnie kell. Segíts abban, hogy biztosan elegen legyünk: miután előfizettél, oszd meg az előfizetésed tényét a Facebookon, kövesd a kampányt, és segíts, hogy minél többekhez eljusson.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Dudás Gergely vagyok, újságíró. Még az internetrobbanás előtt kezdtem, aztán 2004-től 13 éven át az Indexnél dolgoztam. Voltam gazdasági rovatvezető, főszerkesztő-helyettes, aztán 2013 elejétől idén nyárig, több mint négy éven át főszerkesztő. Egy sok ember távozását követő válsághelyzetben újraépítettem a szerkesztőséget, és sok kiváló kollegámmal szerintem a lehető legjobb újságot csináltuk meg az ingyenes tartalomra épített üzleti modell buktatói mellett.
Az Indexnél a pár hónappal ezelőtt bejelentett tulajdonosváltás után felmondtam. Azért is döntöttem így, mert úgy éreztem, hogy a mai magyar média képtelen betölteni alapvető feladatát: nem tud a közéleti hírekről több aspektusból, kellő mélységben és alapossággal beszámolni. Ez a hiányosság pedig túlmutat önmagán, az egyik oka közbeszédünk durvulásának, felületessé válásának, annak, hogy Magyarországon eltűnt a párbeszéd lehetősége.
Hiszem, hogy a demokrácia egyik alapja a jól működő nyilvánosság.
De az etikus, független és minőségi újságírásnak nemcsak a politikai, hanem a gazdasági függetlenség is fontos feltétele. A legtisztább alapot az előfizetéses megoldás jelenti: ha az újság fő bevételi forrása az olvasóktól érkezik, csak nekik kell megfelelnie, ez a minőség valódi záloga.
Az induláshoz azonban tőke kell. Ha azt akarjuk, hogy legyen valóban minőségi, tisztán közéleti online újság, aminek a függetlensége és a befolyásolhatatlansága biztosított, előre kell összeadni az előfizetési díjakat.
300 millió forint rengeteg pénz, ennyit szeretnék összegyűjteni, de az üzleti terv kisebb mennyiségű hirdetési bevétellel is számol. Ezzel a tőkével el lehet indítani egy több mint 30 fős, a legjobb magyar újságírókból álló szerkesztőséget. Ennyi embert közéleti vonalon a legnagyobb magyar szerkesztőségek sem tudnak felmutatni, de ennél kisebb erejüket is elaprózzák. A minőség egyik garanciája a Politis esetében a csapat létszáma és összetétele, és az, hogy a szenior stábnak kizárólag magas hozzáadott értékű anyagokat kell készítenie.
Tízezer forint az éves előfizetés – azoknak, akik most döntenek, ez közel 60 százalékos kedvezmény a tervezett havi díjhoz képest. Nem kis pénz ez sem. De ez a történet arról is szól, megteremtünk-e Magyarországon a rosszul működő médiapiacon egy valódi közéleti újságot.
Az előfizetőktől ezért megelőlegezett bizalomra van szükség.
De ez azt is jelenti, hogy annak az árát kell megfizetni, hogy az újság mögött nincs oligarcha, megkérdőjelezhető tisztességű vagy szándékú vállalkozó, aki letenné az induláshoz szükséges tőkét. Ez a lap tisztán és csak akkor indul, ha van elég ember, akinek hiányzik egy minőségi közéleti online portál.
Ha nem jön össze elég ember, mindenki visszakapja a pénzét az Indiegogótól: a kampány csak abban az esetben sikeres, ha eléri a kitűzött célt. Ha nem lesz jó az újság, ha az előfizető elégedetlen, akkor valóban veszített, de vele együtt bukik az újság is. Éppen attól tiszta a helyzet, hogy ez lenne Magyarországon hosszú ideje az első szerkesztőség, aminek valóban csak az olvasók elvárásainak kell megfelelnie.
A körülmények nehezek: a közösségi finanszírozást legtipikusabban kütyükre kérik, amikről egy gyönyörű videó megtekintése után a néző úgy érzi, azonnal kell neki egy olyan. A Politis nincs kész. A Politis csapata sincs még együtt, leendő tagjai ma különböző szerkesztőségekben vagy másutt dolgoznak, és nem vállalhatják a felmondás kockázatát egy több hónapos kampányra, szerződéseik érthetően tiltják, hogy konkurens termékek mögé sorakozzanak fel.
Én azt gondolom, hogy van, lennie kell Magyarországon bőven több mint 30 ezer olyan embernek, aki elégedetlen a média, a nyilvánosság állapotával, és hajlandó is elfogadni, hogy ha változást és minőségi sajtót akar, fizetnie kell. Segíts abban, hogy biztosan elegen legyünk: miután előfizettél, oszd meg az előfizetésed tényét a Facebookon, kövesd a kampányt, és segíts, hogy minél többekhez eljusson.

story:
Designed for the trendy urbanite, GC Magazine seeks out the undiscovered essentials for living in the city as a gay man and/or woman. We decided to start GC because we couldn’t find a publication out there really spoke to us as Gay Chicagoans, let alone one we'd actually subscribe to.

We wanted a genuine magazine, one that uses models of all body types and sizes, one that the average gay can relate to and one you don’t feel ashamed of leaving out for someone else to find. 

We started in our proverbial garage: a spare bedroom converted into an office. We’ve grown to a modest staff and are currently working on our 19th digital issue focused in Chicago, with future plans to expand to New York, Atlanta and Los Angeles. All of the styling, design, editorial content and creative revision is done in-house and continues to mature as we redefine LGBT media one issue at a time.
We started in our proverbial garage: a spare bedroom converted into an office. We’ve grown to a modest staff and are currently working on our 19th digital issue focused in Chicago, with future plans to expand to New York, Atlanta and Los Angeles. All of the styling, design, editorial content and creative revision is done in-house and continues to mature as we redefine LGBT media one issue at a time.

www.gc-magazine.com

Check out our current issue:  

http://digital-gc.com

Find us on Social Media:

https://www.facebook.com/gaychicmagazine

http://twitter.com/gaychicmagazine


Who are we? 

We are the ground-breakers, the cloud-walkers, and we are just like you. We get stuck in traffic, drop food on our keyboards and drink enough coffee to be the narrator from Fight Club. Each member of the GC team holds an important role, and our chemistry and elasticity as a group allows us to evolve with and confront the challenges of an ever-changing media. We each carry distinct skillsets, diverse networks and peculiar quirks that make us unique and interesting. 


Why should you fund us? 

Because you believe in the quality of our publication and want to read something that’s been tailored to you. Thus far, GC has been produced on pennies and napkin ink. We’ve produced something from nothing, working many late nights to bring you a sophisticated end product. To keep issues moving forward, we need more than the loyal dedication of our team – we need your help! With a little financial backing, we can continue to bring you monthly issues of GC and reach an ever-broadening audience. 


What sets us apart? 

Novel concept: We are focusing on what gays do in the daytime – not just at night. We resolve to break gender norms and throw out the bias while promoting a healthy and realistic body image that doesn’t rely on Photoshop to define perfection. We’ve worked with non-profits (Chicago AIDS Foundation, Testicular Cancer Society, and Center on Halsted, to name a few) to promote awareness and we support gay-centric events like the Reeling Film Festival to strengthen the voice of gay media. 

To keep our content exciting and relevant, we juxtapose original illustrations, enticing recipes and spirited videos with creative short fiction, interviews with local celebrities and delightful games you didn’t see coming. We’re here to showcase tomorrow’s trends, seeking out the niche bloggers, start-ups, local boutiques and unique products and services that our readers didn’t even know they needed. 


What will we do with the $5,000? 

The funds from this Indiegogo Campaign will go to pay for overhead production, advertising focused on increasing readership, along with printing a 140-page special-edition issue that highlights "The Best of GC" thus far.  It'll have additional exclusive content as well as offer an opportunity for our top supporters to be recognized. 

We have no intentions of becoming a print magazine, but we understand that printing special issues is necessary for growing our readership and getting our name out there. We’d rather stay green and use the capital to improve content and support the community rather than buy paper and ink. 

Should I keep funding you after you meet your goal? 

Absolutely! Any money above our goal will go towards other much-needed areas of expansion. This includes marketing & advertising, expanding our magazine to other major metropolitan areas, increasing our editorial, design, and production staff and paying our contributors that are so very important. If you like what you’ve seen and you believe in us as much as we do, then please donate!


Risks and challenges

We originally began conceptual design of the magazine in May 2013, went through proof of concept through March 2014 and have been creating monthly issues ever since. That said, we know what we’re doing. We have all of our processes in place to continue producing original monthly content while steadily building readership each issue.

We’ve developed a great relationship with our selected printer for the limited edition issue and we look forward to making this project a success! We do not expect any delays, but there is always the unforeseen when it comes to print production and shipping distribution.

story:
The cure for aging has been discovered by Dr Edward. The government of the United States has taken over the patent after a legal battle with Ukraine ( the country of origin of Dr. Edward) and has decided to implement a pilot program to measure the effects of the drug, the program called 'Eternal", would last 20 years in which children between 10 and 12 years would take the new medicine for 20 years. They selected a total of 25 children but in the early stage, 4 of them developed an allergic effect that ushered in permanent coma.

A fifth child, Ben Mars also presented symptoms but left coma in 4 days inexplicably. After a year the parents of one child, a girl, Ariadne Freestone, won the lawsuit and get free their daughter from the Eternal program. Leaving only 20 children, they spend a long time living together, knowing, willing, hating and above all tolerated each other. For the children it is not strange not to grow old because that is how they understand their existence, though Ben Mars after 15 years has begin to age, leaving the children concerned and fearful of their lives. Many of the children process the fact that life is not really eternal for them.

story:
Welcome!


          To the Indiegogo Campaign for "Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln" The Book.

Hi, I'm Lou and together with your help we can create a fun educational children's STEM book about Fuel Cells.
Science / Technology / Engineering / Mathematics
~ Today most books on Fuel Cells and the electro-chemical processes involved are quite complex.
I figured this presented a need for a creative educational and entertaining book on the Clean Energy of Fuel Cells and Fuel Cell Vehicles for kids their parents and early adopters too.......So I wrote one.

The book explores the history and technology of Hydrogen Fuel Cells, there current use in powering a wide range of equipment, buildings, power plants and the vehicles many of today's students will be driving.....once they get their drivers license that is!


The  story follows a young Lou on a Journey to a Fuel Cell factory for (*updated)     National Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Day   to learn how Fuel Cells work, cleanly powering vehicles, buildings and equipment, reducing the demand of fossil fuel dependence and then putting that knowledge to work converting his Uncle Arthur's,
"Maximum Emission" Hot Rod Lincoln into The "Zero Emission" Fuel Cell Lincoln!

The written story (~60pgs.) is complete and my rough draft pictures will form the basis for the books Illustrations.


~Now I need an Illustrator and to bring this book to print.~

Together with your help, We can Power
"Lou and The Fuel Cell Lincoln" !

This story is one of the ways  you can support early adoption of a clean zero emission technology that can get us " Under 2 " .



Fuel Cell & Hydrogen Community
Sponsorship
If your not on the Hydrogen Highway, it's a long road to a Clean Energy Society!

I would like to urge the Fuel Cell and Hydrogen community, together with other Clean Energy Organizations & early adopters to show their support, it's absolutely essential to the success of this effort.

Go /No go:
Reaching the required "Fixed Funding Campaign Goal" Is the  "GO"  I Need.

I have elected to make this a Fixed Funding Campaign, to inspire confidence that my ability to complete the project is not restricted by finances
                                   I will only receive funds if the goal it met.
It assures the necessary resources to produce "Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln" as a  Quality product with a timely Earth Day delivery .

Not reaching the required goal?....just like a Charlie in the box from the Isle of misfit toys ....Lou and his story of Clean Energy and The Fuel Cell Lincoln will be sent to the Isle of Uncirculated Books and  All contributions will be returned!



My Story


My desire to take actions that offer solutions for a cleaner environment, a love of Classic old school cars and knowledge of Hydrogen Fuel Cells and Electric Vehicles has been the  significant inspiration of this entertaining and educational book that has been nearly two years in the making.

In the process of putting my study and passion for Fuel Cell Vehicles ( FCV's ) to work, I endeavored as an educational project to build my own Fuel Cell vehicle conversion, a work in progress.

Good fortune came my way in the form of a  Classic Lincoln Continental Mark V, an extravagant symbol of the power consuming (10 mpg), pollution emitting 70's.

Purchased from a distinguished family in Seattle, whose name is synonymous with big engine tugboats, makes this Lincoln an all the more perfect retrofit candidate.

This is just a great story that shares the enthusiasm, new technologies and momentum of the clean energy movement, that will additionally facilitate my project.

From my past experience as a children's ski & snowboard instructor, I know kids want to learn this kind of stuff.


 With Your help we can get "Lou and The Fuel Cell Lincoln" Illustrated and to Print!


What We Need
Funding Goal : $8,500

My first step will be to hire an Illustrator for the approximately ~60 depictions, estimated costs $2750.

We have an "amazingly skilled" animator in mind, you can view some of their work   Here @ Sleepy Otter.

Second will be the production formatting, approximate costs $1000.

The third step will be to acquire ISBN # numbers,copyright and bar-codes, costs about $750.

An estimate of approximately $1250 for Indiegogo , transaction and delivery fees.

Lastly will be to print a limited run of Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln for circulation and delivery as perks, about $2750.

Our book printer of choice is family owned Gorham Printing in Centralia, Washington.


Delivery :
Earth Day 2016



Stretch Goal: Additional $6,000

1 copy (535) sent to every member of Congress
Earth Day 2016!



The Impact!


Introducing new generations and early adopters to a technology that can have vast and substantial positive impacts for the environment and economy of the world we inhabit.

Inspiring generations with the knowledge that climate solutions can be as simple as the type of car you choose to drive or the fuel you use!

To teach readers that taking action is the first step, whether it be by writing a book, driving a ZEV/FCV / EV, or helping someone who is !


Risks and Challenges :                                                                                                               

Nay Sayers to the Clean Energy Economy, unforeseen delays or challenges.

Early Successful achievement of Under 2 prior to COP 21 Climate Conference .           


How you can Help!

                                      
Sponsorship!  Sponsorship!  Sponsorship!


I'd like to encourage you to support “Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln” by making a contribution to this great STEM book on Hydrogen Fuel Cells and clean energy technologies for kids.

If you are a
  • Fuel Cell and Hydrogen Proponent
  • Fuel Cell Component Manufacturer
  • Hydrogen Fuel Station Developer / Operator
  • Fuel Cell Vehicle Manufacturer
  • Fuel Cell Stack Manufacturer or a supplier to them...Help Support this Project!


                                                                  Be a Fan

A Fan-tastic way to help if you can't contribute is to tell someone about,                  “Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln”, tell your friends who love clean energy and the environment,  and especially tell those who don't.                                    

Tell your Co-workers, Fleet managers, School teachers and don't forget your Car Mechanic, they are going to need to know this stuff!

The only way for " Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln " to educate kids about Hydrogen Fuel Cells and Clean Energy is if someone shares it with them.


Please Spread the Word !


~Link Link Link ...The Fuel Cell Lincoln~
More links Means a Higher Indiegogo Rating!

Tweet #WorldScienceDay

Tweet #EarthToParis
Tweet #HydrogenNow
Tweet #COP21
Tweet #STEMBook
Tweet #FuelCell

You can find more about Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln on Twitter @FuelCellLincoln  and on Facebook  Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln .

Please be sure to share this on social media with the Indiegogo sharing Icons, or even just commenting, asking a question or telling a friend would be a huge help, or better yet send someone a copy.

Fuel Cell Vehicles and the Hydrogen Infrastructure are crossing the chasm!

As the CEO's of Toyota and Maserati have recognized, Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicles will be the cars we ultimately drive.... as a matter of choice!

Take a few moments to check back and find out what " Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln" are up to.


   Here at this end .....It's  time to begin

Thank you for your support !

-Lou and the Fuel Cell Lincoln

story:
Since I found out my wife was pregnant (back in 2013) I wanted to make sure I completed some sort of project so my child would see something that I created, something that would be tangible for his or her hands. That is what this poetry collection is, a completion of a time where I was writing poetry. It could have been in the back of college notebooks and staying up late chatting online and listening to music to somehow gain a muse for my writings. I went through all of my writings at that time and created something of that time frame for you to read.

 

“I am not an Artist” is the mindset I was in, the loneliness, the heart ache, the wishful thinking and of hope. The backdrop is of post 9/11 and a college career ending in Buffalo New York.

 

You would be helping out to create something. It would be official, I would be able to get an ISBN number and officially sell the collection at stores and Amazon. Also would be able to put it in Nook and Kindle for electronic reading.

 

I would be able to pay for the website and be able to officially self-publish the collection and move forward with a couple other projects that are almost completed.

 

It would also help to show both my son and daughter that anything is possible when you put your mind to create something.  

 

What you will be getting:

 

$1 Thank You, an Electronic Thank You

$5 A Thank you Note sent to you in the mail

$20 I am not an Artist T-Shirt

$25 I am not an Artist T-Shirt plus one random poem from the book.

$30 I am not an Artist Paperback

$40 I am not an Artist Signed Paperback

$50 I am not an Artist Signed Paperback with T-Shirt

 

There will be a stretch goal of $1,500 for when it is reached everyone who bought the Collection will be upgraded to a Hardcover copy of the book.

 

If we reach $2,000 stretch goal everyone who bought the Signed Copy will get an exclusive artwork for the next project I am working on, A children’s book.

 

Thank you so very much for supporting my dream. This is not possible without the help of friends and family members that encouraged my writings and art work.

story:
We are Captain Carrotpants da Gwumpy Bun & Apie.
We need your hewp.
 

We entewtain you on Facebook all da time. We have hesitated to tell our loyal fans what is weally going on. We are cwose to being homewess. First, we stopped to check in on Apie's ape Mom, and found out an evil welative stuck her in a dumpy nuwsing home and stole her house. She has dementia, and we found her wifout pwoper medical care or even a shawl.


We spent all kindsa cash twying to fix it. In da meantime, anofer cwooked ape didn't pay us for a big show. We are wiving in hotels, and need to go to a more affowdable city wif bun-fwiendly apawtments. We are staying in da few hotels dat allow buns.

Apie is doing da best she can to get me vet care, good food and wots of wuv. But we are stwessed beyond bewief, and we need a wittle hewp to move on and fund a bun-fwiendly apawtment. We are cwose to wiving on da stweet.

Some stinky apes have towd Apie to find me anofer home, cuz it would be much easier to get a wental. She won't do dat to me!

We came fwom BC, but can't wetuwn due to da lethal Wabbit Viwus and da fowest fires. In da monf before we weft, I had two emergency vet visits from stwess: my toe had to be amputated due to obsessive digging, and I had chwonic shneezies. Both are okay now, but da bills...

You've been asking us about a Captain Carrotpants book, but we can't even get stawted wifout a stable home. Pwease don't allow us to become homewess. We have had a year wike no other. Pwetty much six stwaight monfs of expensive cwisis.

We are witing a book about our expewiences. Hewp us out, fwiends!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Pwease SHARE dis campaign.

story:
Short Summary

Hello,

My name is Zachery McGivens and I've written an Inspirational Children's book. This campaign is important to me because I feel like this book is an instant classic. I truly believe that this book will still be a favorite of children and parents 30, 40, 50 years from now. This book will make a positive impact and your contributions will help inspire millions of children from all around the world for many, many years to come. 

What We Need & What You Get

The book titled "I WILL REACH THE TOP," will be published by Christian Faith Publishing. Every cent we raise will go toward the book. The total cost to have this book illustrated and published is $3,845. The remaining amount raised will be used for the marketing and promoting of this amazing book. Once the campaign is complete Christian Faith Publishing will publish this book within 6 - 8 months. 

Perks:

$50 contributions will receive a hand written personalized message and autographed copy of the book "I Will Reach The Top" and status updates.

$25 contributions will receive an autographed copy of the book "I Will Reach The Top" and status updates.

$1 contributions will receive our deepest gratitude and good karma.

 

The Impact

This is another opportunity to support an amazing cause that is sure to make history. We all know the children are our future and reading great works of literature will help propel them to greatness. When you make a contribution think about how good you're going to feel when you're in the library or visiting your child's class or at your favorite book store and you see this book "I Will Reach The Top." Let's do great things together.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by spreading the word about our campaign to publish "I Will Reach The Top." Please share this link with everyone you know that want to inspire children.

story:
Short Summary

 

Who I am

My name is David Medhurst.  

 

I am going to tell you a story, and when I am done I think you will be surprised, excited and happier. I am also hoping you will want to be part of this special story.

What I Do

 

I am an Artist. I write,  I draw,

I teach  I tell stories,    and when I am not

 

doing those things, I create in many other ways.

It's what I love to do.

Now, although I have been involved in art in many different forms throughout the years, I have the most fun and am happiest when I am writing and illustrating children’s books. I am also taking the knowledge I have gained, and the connections I have established, and I am making them available to other aspiring Authors under the StoryTime Books umbrella. 

What I have accomplished so far

I currently have two children’s story books self published and available through Amazon, Storytimebooks.ca, as well as other retail outlets and public libraries. There is a lot more.

I have fifteen (and counting) additional children’s books in various stages of completion. I also have so many more that are yet to be started!

I am also using StoryTime Books to bring people together and support anyone who wants to publish one of their own stories.

I am happy to say there are now two additional Authors that will be published under the StoryTime Books umbrella. I also intend to have my third book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog, published before the end of 2018.

That's where we are right now and this is where you come into the story!

What I am asking for

I need your help in making this a successful story. I want you to help in spreading happiness. I truly mean that. That's really what this is all about. I guarantee, I absolutely promise, that everyone who is involved, from Campaign Participants like you, at any level, all the way around to those enjoying the stories at bed time, I know, everyone will be happier because of what we do here! I want to make a lot of people happier! A good story makes you happy. Why, just the thought of one will bring a smile, and I bet if you just thought of one, you are smiling right now. Then there is also that very special feeling you will have when you know you were part of creating all of the happiness. It is really what makes it all worth while.

What I need 

Be warned, this is the dry business end of the story and although fact filled, it's not very adventurous. 

$20,000.00 Initial Participation

Here's why:
 Printing Services

Currently my books are produced on a print per order basis through an arm of Amazon which requires no initial outlay for stock, however the profit margins are minimal and do not provide for any of the additional administrative expenses incurred by this undertaking. In order to get a competitive price on printing, it is necessary to order in volume.  This requires a substantial initial outlay, however net profit increases by a significant amount. Buying stock in volume is what gets the proverbial ball rolling.

 Editorial Services

The last thing I want is to put out a children's book with spelling and grammar errors. I can catch most of these however a trained professional eye is well worth the expense.

 Layout Services

Although I do all of my own illustration and also provide the same service to everyone under the StoryTime umbrella, I am not a graphic specialist, and I do not have the equipment necessary to produce crisp full colour professional digital imagery. I have made connections in this field that have resulted in fantastic results (just look at my books) at a very discounted cost, however there is still a cost.

 

 Advertising Services

This is as important as any of the other factors. You can have the best product in the world, but if nobody knows about it, it won't be successful. In todays current electronic environment one of the most cost effective ways to reach the largest potential audience is through “pay per click” advertising. An effectively constructed advertising campaign will ensure that StoryTime Books will be seen by the right audience. There are also advertising costs incurred through giveaways to appropriate organizations and facilities, especially charitable ones. Yes, they can be written off, however it still requires initial cash flow. P.O.P. advertising is also very effective in a retail environment which again requires an initial outlay. Then there are all the regular expenses such as the cost of a web page, business cards, and once things really get rolling, accountants and lawyers, but let's just leave all that for the future. I am certain that we don't need to consider that yet, although I am also just a certain that this is going to be a very big thing!

 My Services

Writing, illustrating and all of the administrative functions required to publish and promote stories is a full time undertaking. Two of them actually. I have managed to write many stories and I have started to illustrate most them. I want to be able to apply myself full time to this undertaking, to create fun and exciting stories and help other Authors get their tales out there for everyone to enjoy as well, and I want to continue to create many new tales to be shared and enjoyed. I want to do everything I can to help spread happiness. Now, eventually the stories will take care of themselves, however I need a helping hand to get this whole adventure off the ground. I fully believe in my stories and I know when you read just one of them, you too will believe. Please help me make this story real.

OK, thank you for sticking around through that part. It's the hardest part of anything like this, but what I am doing really is something special, and worth the effort. 

Now let's get back to the fun stuff,  and this is where it gets really interesting!

You are going to love this part!

What I offer

I want to reward everyone who participates, and reward them in the best way I know. I want everyone to feel that they are part of what I believe is the beginning of something very special. I have tried to make your rewards both creative and fun.

I encourage you to read all of the Perks, or as I like to refer to them as , Participation Options. I think you will absolutely love every single option. You may be very surprised at a couple of them, entertained by all of them, and I am sure there is one that is right for you.

 

 So, here they are:

Participation Without Funds

No money but still want to help? Fantastic and thanks. Spread the word. Maybe you know someone that can help. Let people know what can be done. Use the IndieGoGo share tools to their fullest. Jump on your social media, your phone, the nearest street corner! Ask your local Library to get the book in stock. There is no downside to this campaign. The more it succeeds, the better the world is. Sounds maybe a bit silly but it's true. After all, where is the downside of a good story to be shared?

 Also, I will also be happy to send you a nice colouring page craft set at no charge!

$20.00 Participation

Thank you! I don’t expect charity and I am happy to work for every dime raised by this campaign. In thanks for your $20.00, I will be pleased to send you a signed copy of either of my first two books.

Take your choice of either Tommy’s House 

 

 or Andy’s Dandy Day.

Either way I know you will be happy with your choice. They are both wonderful stories. But wait, you already have these books? Thank you and no problem. You might have to wait a bit longer but I am happy to offer the same deal with my third book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog as your reward.

$30.00 Participation

Again thank you!

Not only will I send you a signed copy of either

Andy’s Dandy Day 

or

Tommy’s House        

I will also happily send you a set of six full colour Art Prints of illustrations from your chosen book. Again, if you already have these books, I am happy to substitute Arthur in as an option.

 

$50.00 Participation

Thank you very much and I am sure you will be very happy with your signed copy of both Andy’s Dandy Day and Tommy’s House.

I will also include two sets of six Art Prints from both of your books! This is where it gets a bit trickier and will take a bit longer. If you would prefer, you can option the next two books in the series. Arthur the Sleepy Dog is first up on the list and then a special story that I have written for just this occasion! 

 

100.00 Participation

I truly appreciate your support and I will happily send you a signed copy of Andy’s Dandy Day, Tommy’s House and my next book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog.

I will also include a full set of art prints from each of the books! Now, I know you haven't purchased Arthur The Sleepy Dog yet as it hasn't been published, so if you already have my first two books, and don't mind waiting, then I will be happy to substitute two additional, yet to be published titles as your reward. The next book after Arthur has already been decided, however I am not sure after that. I am leaning towards Edgar and the Dragon Wagon but we will see... Maybe Kenny Pickle and his Lucky Nickel? Regardless of which story, I know you will love it.

HERE COMES THE REALLY EXCITING PART!

So far the rewards have been great, and everyone gets to enjoy at least one good story, plus being part of the one we are writing here, and what's coming next is where it starts to get really special!

$500.00 Participation

I will be thrilled to include as a personal thank you, your name, in print, in the front of my next book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog.  I am really looking forward to publishing this story. I will also send you a signed copy of Andy’s Dandy Day, Tommy’s House and Arthur The Sleepy Dog, as well as numbered and signed Art Print Sets from each book. The story for Arthur The Sleepy Dog is complete and I am in the middle of the artwork. I am aiming to have this one out by the end of the year. Now, you have to admit, it would be pretty exciting to have your name printed in a book you helped publish!

EVEN MORE EXCITING!

$1,000.00 Participation

How would you like to have your character and likeness included in one of my forthcoming children’s stories? I will do this happily! As a matter of fact, I can't wait to do this! This will certainly be a lot of fun and your participation will go a long way towards helping in the publication of more books! You will of course get two signed copies of your book and two full sets of numbered and signed Art Prints, and of course you will also get signed copies of my first three books and accompanying Art Prints. I will need a recent picture and a bit of information about yourself such as what you do or maybe what you imagine might be fun to do! This participation level is going to be amazing! I am really looking forward to illustrating this one!

THE MOST EXCITING EVER!

$5000.00 Participation

WOW! AMAZING! THANK YOU! For this generous participation in my campaign I am offering the most fun and amazing thing I can think of. I will be happy to write, illustrate, publish and promote a children’s story coauthored by you. You and I! Yup, I would absolutely love to make a story that is special to you a reality. Plus, since you will be Co-Author, you will be entitled to 50% of the net royalties so hopefully, with some hard work on my part and a little luck, your participation will actually turn into an investment! The absolute best part though, if you haven't been already, you are now a published Author! How exciting is that!

 

Are there any risks?

Not really. I have tried to make this campaign so that everyone is fairly rewarded for their contribution, and I promise I will do everything in my power to make everyone happy, especially those listening to the stories. If everyone helps out there will be lots of new stories for lots of people to enjoy, and the world will be a much better place for as long as the stories keep being read and shared. It really is that simple, and if you want to come along, I promise it will be a great adventure!

 

The last bit

That's it, that's all and that's everything ...so far. This will be something to be involved in and proud of! Whether you are helping to make a story or telling everyone about a great story, you will be part of the story, and part of something special. Ask me questions, give me suggestions, or maybe tell me a story. Just make sure you join in and be part of StoryTime Books.

Thank you,

David
