The more it succeeds, the better the world is. Sounds maybe a bit silly but it's true. After all, where is the downside of a good story to be shared? Also, I will also be happy to send you a nice colouring page craft set at no charge!$20.00 ParticipationThank you! I don’t expect charity and I am happy to work for every dime raised by this campaign. In thanks for your $20.00, I will be pleased to send you a signed copy of either of my first two books.Take your choice of either Tommy’s House   or Andy’s Dandy Day.Either way I know you will be happy with your choice. They are both wonderful stories. But wait, you already have these books? Thank you and no problem. You might have to wait a bit longer but I am happy to offer the same deal with my third book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog as your reward.$30.00 ParticipationAgain thank you!Not only will I send you a signed copy of eitherAndy’s Dandy Day  orTommy’s House        I will also happily send you a set of six full colour Art Prints of illustrations from your chosen book. Again, if you already have these books, I am happy to substitute Arthur in as an option. $50.00 ParticipationThank you very much and I am sure you will be very happy with your signed copy of both Andy’s Dandy Day and Tommy’s House.I will also include two sets of six Art Prints from both of your books! This is where it gets a bit trickier and will take a bit longer. If you would prefer, you can option the next two books in the series. Arthur the Sleepy Dog is first up on the list and then a special story that I have written for just this occasion!  100.00 ParticipationI truly appreciate your support and I will happily send you a signed copy of Andy’s Dandy Day, Tommy’s House and my next book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog.I will also include a full set of art prints from each of the books! Now, I know you haven't purchased Arthur The Sleepy Dog yet as it hasn't been published, so if you already have my first two books, and don't mind waiting, then I will be happy to substitute two additional, yet to be published titles as your reward. The next book after Arthur has already been decided, however I am not sure after that. I am leaning towards Edgar and the Dragon Wagon but we will see... Maybe Kenny Pickle and his Lucky Nickel? Regardless of which story, I know you will love it.HERE COMES THE REALLY EXCITING PART!So far the rewards have been great, and everyone gets to enjoy at least one good story, plus being part of the one we are writing here, and what's coming next is where it starts to get really special!$500.00 ParticipationI will be thrilled to include as a personal thank you, your name, in print, in the front of my next book, Arthur The Sleepy Dog.  I am really looking forward to publishing this story. I will also send you a signed copy of Andy’s Dandy Day, Tommy’s House and Arthur The Sleepy Dog, as well as numbered and signed Art Print Sets from each book. The story for Arthur The Sleepy Dog is complete and I am in the middle of the artwork. I am aiming to have this one out by the end of the year. Now, you have to admit, it would be pretty exciting to have your name printed in a book you helped publish!EVEN MORE EXCITING!$1,000.00 ParticipationHow would you like to have your character and likeness included in one of my forthcoming children’s stories? I will do this happily! As a matter of fact, I can't wait to do this! This will certainly be a lot of fun and your participation will go a long way towards helping in the publication of more books! You will of course get two signed copies of your book and two full sets of numbered and signed Art Prints, and of course you will also get signed copies of my first three books and accompanying Art Prints. I will need a recent picture and a bit of information about yourself such as what you do or maybe what you imagine might be fun to do! This participation level is going to be amazing! I am really looking forward to illustrating this one!THE MOST EXCITING EVER!$5000.00 ParticipationWOW! AMAZING! THANK YOU! For this generous participation in my campaign I am offering the most fun and amazing thing I can think of. I will be happy to write, illustrate, publish and promote a children’s story coauthored by you. You and I! Yup, I would absolutely love to make a story that is special to you a reality. Plus, since you will be Co-Author, you will be entitled to 50% of the net royalties so hopefully, with some hard work on my part and a little luck, your participation will actually turn into an investment! The absolute best part though, if you haven't been already, you are now a published Author! How exciting is that! Are there any risks?Not really. I have tried to make this campaign so that everyone is fairly rewarded for their contribution, and I promise I will do everything in my power to make everyone happy, especially those listening to the stories. If everyone helps out there will be lots of new stories for lots of people to enjoy, and the world will be a much better place for as long as the stories keep being read and shared. It really is that simple, and if you want to come along, I promise it will be a great adventure! The last bitThat's it, that's all and that's everything ...so far. This will be something to be involved in and proud of! Whether you are helping to make a story or telling everyone about a great story, you will be part of the story, and part of something special. Ask me questions, give me suggestions, or maybe tell me a story. Just make sure you join in and be part of StoryTime Books.Thank you,David

story:
What is My Infinite Agenda? 

My Infinite Agenda is an elegant and dynamic vision-board planner designed for your busy lifestyle.  What you focus on – you attract – which is your goals and dreams are merely a pen-stroke away!

My Infinite Agenda will clearly guide you through section prompts to start turning your dreams and goals into realities. Using the expansive, functional writing spaces, you will organize your daily schedule – while simultaneously chronicling your highest ambitions. At the end of each month, My Infinite Agenda will inspire you to record your infinite winnings – so you can capture your goals and dreams that have come to fruition.

Are you ready to recognize all your greatness? My Infinite Agenda invites you to explore the world of infinite possibilities; imagine the life you want & build it!

 

 

PRODUCT WITH PURPOSE!

My Infinite Agenda is proud to be a product with purpose! My Infinite Agenda was born in 2016 when two best friends, coming from artistic performing backgrounds, felt a calling to have a greater impact on the communities around them, and to help as many people as they could globally. Their brainstorming and collaboration resulted in the creation of My Infinite Agenda; a product with purpose!

A portion of the sales from each color of agenda are given to support 4 powerful charities having an infinite impact around the globe. My Infinite Agenda aims to support clean and safe drinking water for people worldwide, access to the arts in under-served communities, ending the generational cycle of homelessness, and quality sustainable hygiene & health education for all women and girls. With My Infinite Agenda, when you champion your own life, you get to change the life of another.

 

MIDYEAR PLANNER COVER OPTIONS (AUGUST 2019-AUGUST 2020)

Light Blue with Silver Foil (Supports Sing for Hope)

 

Blush with Rose Gold Foil (Supports Days for Girls International)

Charcoal with Silver Foil (Supports charity: water)

Periwinkle with Silver Foil (Supports The Empowerment Plan)

Meet Founders, Raquel & Katie!

Meet Founders of My Infinite Agenda-- Katie Copland and Raquel Suarez Groen. My Infinite Agenda was born after a decade of friendship, with the purpose of making a difference in people’s lives…

Ten years ago we followed our hearts to New York City to pursue graduate education and careers in opera. Little did we know that fate would lead us to meet, become best friends, and realize our highest ambitions. 

We both had the mindset that anything was possible. Our secret weapon began with our belief in the power of positive thinking. We had always loved inspirational quotes, and discovered that for years we had both created annual vision boards. 

Fast-forward 10 years, we were both in the midst of performing careers, and feeling a call to have a greater impact on the world. Over a balmy NYC summer evening, the idea for My Infinite Agenda, our ‘product with a purpose’ was born. We set out to create a tangible offering—something that would emanate goodwill infinitely outward, and ultimately resonate long after any note we had sung had evaporated in to the air. It became clear our mission was to spread positivity, and to give people hope where it may have gotten lost.

Today Raquel can be seen on Broadway as Carlotta Giudicelli in Phantom of the Opera, and Katie is a professional singer on the voice faculty at Fordham University.

As artists, we have come to know the strong power of positive thinking, and finally we want to share this knowledge with the world. So we married the most effective parts of our personal agendas to our vision boards to help you channel the positive, focus on your goals, and realize all your dreams. The best part is your positive action ripples outward for a portion of the proceeds of each agenda purchased go to charities making a difference both locally and worldwide. With My Infinite Agenda, when you seek to champion your own life, you are also lifting up others, thus creating an infinite ripple effect of positivity.

We believe that what you ask for, focus on, and work toward, you will receive. So here’s our challenge for you today: If you could ask the universe for anything, small or big, what would it be? What if you had nothing to lose? There are infinite possibilities out there waiting to be invested in, explored, and realized.

We are thrilled to start this journey with you! The first step is to imagine the life you want... and then build it. Start writing your destiny today!

Xo,

Raquel & Katie

Pequeño resumen

Philos Sophia está constituido por un equipo de personas que pretende hacer de la filosofía una rama tan esencial en nuestro conocimiento como lo ha sido desde su nacimiento. Para ello creamos contenidos a través de Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, iVoox y iTunes, siendo en estas dos últimas plataformas donde vais a poder encontrar nuestros Podcasts semanales, así como Audiolibros y contenidos extra para suscriptores.

Igualmente, con el dinero obtenido de campañas como esta, pretendemos salir a la calle y poder enseñar en las calles y las aulas qué es y para qué sirve la filosofía. 

En definitiva, luchamos a diario para enseñar al mundo cuanto AMAMOS A LA FILOSOFÍA. 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Lo que pedimos en esta campaña es una aportación de 10€ para hacer que Philos Sophia pueda seguir creciendo y, a cambio, obtendrás una camiseta como las que presentamos en las imágenes para poder presumir de Amor por la Filosofía. 

Impacto y desafíos futuros

Con el dinero obtenido a través de esta campaña podremos seguir construyendo un mejor proyecto para el futuro, con mejores materiales para la grabación y difusión, así como herramientas para llegar más cerca de todas las personas en la misma calle.

story:
WHY WE ARE COMING

 

My name is Yasin Kakande. 'Why We Are Coming' is going to be my third book. I began work on this book in the winter of 2017, having arrived in the US and applied for asylum only a few months after the election that sent Donald Trump to the White House. The electorate – enough of it at least – had bought into his monochrome narrative of blunt jingoism and simple solutions and lifted him to office. His was a pantomime politics with a cast of American heroes and migrant villains; that framed any newcomer to the States as at worst a dangerous criminal and at best a societal parasite feeding on tax-funded public assistance programs. True to at least part of its word the Administration ratcheted up already rigorous and restrictive policies towards migrants. My timing could have not been less auspicious.

 

The US was not my first destination. For more than a decade I worked in the Middle East as a migrant journalist and my exit from both the countries to which I had migrated, was ugly1. Furthermore, I tried my best to stay in my homeland Uganda but the economic, social and political conditions made life as I envisaged it, impossible. The concept of economic inequality does not characterize adequately the circumstances in Uganda, where everyone struggles to earn a sustainable income and the country’s most valuable resources have been stripped by foreign interests.


I offer the concerned reader an explanation for the migrant crisis, one that is delivered in the first person singular because I have lived it. I am not a freeloader. Indeed I am just like you but come from a world that you can't imagine. I am going to help you to see and understand that world in order that you can empathize with those who leave it in order to come to your. I answer the question: why we are coming? First, I frame this as a moral question in an historical context. Migration is driven by the human desire to escape poverty, corruption and tyranny in the undeveloped and underdeveloped world. These circumstances are the legacy of the West's interaction with that world: colonialism, slavery, neo-colonialism, dictatorship by proxy, and corporate adventurism. That legacy is deeply enmeshed not only with the society of my homeland but also with that of nearly every country in Africa. So, this story elucidates a complex picture and traces a long, historical arc to explain why migrants flee their homelands rather than staying to resist, in the hopes of achieving true political and economic reform.

 

Into the fabric of my historical material is woven a moral thread. The single most important unifying strand of every major moral philosophical ideal in human civilization is the recognition that every human is of equal moral value. Many parts migrants see their homeland inundated with long-term seemingly insoluble problems. They see the West as a lifeboat transporting individuals to a harbor that opens up to a landscape of progress and development. Migrants will take on any risk to get aboard the lifeboat because the only alternative is to drown. The only sensible question is why are the people in treacherous water not as important as the people in the boat.

 

That moral question is central to both the issue and the experience of migration but, putting it aside, we can see both in purely material – economic and political – terms. The US in particular benefits enormously from the huge inflow of migrants – both documented and undocumented – who provide cheap labor in virtually every sector of the economy, and particularly in those in which Americans would prefer not to work: the 3Ds of dirty, dangerous and demeaning. However, few Americans understand still less acknowledge that significance. Migrants work in agriculture and hospitality but we will focus here on a sector that is as important as it is neglected: caregiving. As the American population continues to age, the demand for caregivers - mostly immigrants - will continue to rise.

 

Despite the inflammatory rhetoric of both the Nativist politicians, there are many Americans who do not see migrants as dangerous intruders. Likewise, the American media have investigated and reported stories that contradict and challenge the political rhetoric. As Americans prepare for the next presidential election, they understand that some politicians have projected disparaging portrayals of migrants to foment anger, resentment and fear that have led voters to cast ballots without stopping to think about the multidimensional moral, economic and political consequences of their decision.

 

The book’s overall objective is simple. Migrants are asking only that the truth is acknowledged and that they are allowed to live and work here legally. Like any American, they aspire to become productive and grateful contributors in a land where hard work and commitment are rewarded

 

 

About The Author

 

Yasin Kakande is a 2017-2018 TEDGlobal Fellow. As a migrant from Uganda, first in the Middle East and now in the U.S., Kakande strives to fill in a migrant’s voice in the ongoing global debate over refugees and migrants. His previous two books The Ambitious Struggle (2013) and Slave States (2015) chronicled the abuses and exploitation of migrants, who work in the Middle East. He works as a freelance international journalist, including assignments for Thomson Reuters Foundation and Al Jazeera, and is a frequent contributor to many digital publications and websites.

 

A native of Uganda, Yasin Kakande has been a Middle East journalist for more than a decade. He has worked for the Abu Dhabi-based The National newspaper as the correspondent for the Northern Emirates. He also has worked as a news producer for City 7 TV in Dubai, a features writer for the Khaleej Times, and as a reporter and assistant editor for the Bahrain Tribune. He also worked as a translator for The Peninsular newspaper in Doha, Qatar and has done several freelance assignments for international distribution.

 

He earned his bachelor’s degree in mass communication from Makerere University in Kampala, Uganda and a master of business administration degree in marketing from the United Arab Emirates branch of the U.S.-based Preston University. He is fluent in English, Arabic and Swahili.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Your support will help meet the publishing expenses like a professional editor, proof reading, cover and layout design, printing and distribution of the book.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-Publish Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Youtube, text message or Direct Message.

You can easily share my Pre-Publish Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

For questions, Visit my website https://yasinkakande.com/ or email yasikak@gmail.com. Twitter @yasikak

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

story:
Welcome to The Shoosh Report

The Shoosh Report that sprung from the mind of Twitter's very own Liberty Impostor. After gaining some notoriety within the libertarian world, the Impostor realized his time on Twitter would be cut short. Due to Twitter, Facebook, etc... banning anything right of the Authoritarian Left, Liberty Impostor decided to create a site to do what he does best.

Satire.

Welcome to The Shoosh Report, a place for hilarious articles, fake news, and real think pieces. The Shoosh Report is basically what happens when comedians become the world's leading intellectuals.  While it's likely that this publication will be known for it's satire, it will be done with the purpose of creating a thinktank that isn't beholden to special interests. So think, one part satire, one part non-Koch-funded thinktank.

What We Need

This project is going to be completely crowd-funded. The goal is to eventually monetize, and pay our writers, but in the meantime this website will be funded entirely by subscribers. So we figure, let's get our subscribers started right now! Many people on Twitter have come to love the Impostor account, and are likely sick of having to follow him every couple of weeks. So, we're going to give you a place that won't get deplatformed for infuriating everyone's favorite gun-grabbing republican. So, here's what we need:

  • Website costs.
  • Developer costs.
  • Incentive for writers.

The Purpose

While this project seems fun and goofy, the goal is to eventually dethrone the publications that are being funded by billionaires that don't care about you. We look at people like Joe Rogan, Dave Smith, Jimmy Kimmel, and all of the other comedians that are teaching people how to think, and start to realize that there exists a trend of comedians being our new thought leaders. This publication will draw people in with the most effective marketing strategy: humor. 

Over time, The Shoosh Report will also become known for having good ideas presented through the lens of comedy. We hope that this winning strategy will play out with the support of our subscribers!

So, we're going to give you a place that won't get deplatformed for infuriating everyone's favorite gun-grabbing republican. So, here's what we need:

Website costs.
Developer costs.
Incentive for writers.


The Purpose
While this project seems fun and goofy, the goal is to eventually dethrone the publications that are being funded by billionaires that don't care about you. We look at people like Joe Rogan, Dave Smith, Jimmy Kimmel, and all of the other comedians that are teaching people how to think, and start to realize that there exists a trend of comedians being our new thought leaders. This publication will draw people in with the most effective marketing strategy: humor. 
Over time, The Shoosh Report will also become known for having good ideas presented through the lens of comedy. We hope that this winning strategy will play out with the support of our subscribers!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is this about flowers?

I was originally drawn to writing poetry for its cathartic and soothing qualities, but I also came to appreciate poems as a medium to express truth, beauty, and the struggle to find where they meet, in a way that others could appreciate and relate to. Found with Flowers is a collection of poems that grew from that journey.

It represents my entry into that age-old human legacy of attempts to bring beauty, truth, and love together in a real and meaningful way, however small. In keeping with that spirit, I want to bring this collection into the world as a pocketbook. Like flowers, poetry, and small acts of everday kindness, it's a small, simple, and tangible expression of that ancient journey for truth, beauty, and love. Not to mention that there is just something magical about holding a physical book in your hands and feeling the pages as you turn them.

Additionally, a majority of the profits will be given away to fund efforts to cultivate poetry and reading in local communities, and 1 in every 10 books printed will be donated to Free Little Libraries. So this isn't just about my book.

What we need

The plan is to produce a small printing of high-quality pocketbooks that are easy to carry around and share wherever you go. In order to make this happen, we need to raise $1000.

Here's where the money will go:
  • 55% to manufacturing costs
  • 35% to perk fulfillment
  • 10% to fees
Anything over the minimum funding goal will go to making more copies, getting poetry out to the masses, and extra perks for you.

What you get

Not only will you get the satisfaction that you helped spread poetry to the people, but you can also get some pretty neat perks too.

Digital Tiers

  • $1 - Clover - mini preview ebook download
  • $5 $3 - Peony - early ebook download

Pocketbook Tiers
include everything in the Digital Tiers, plus

  • $15 $12 - Daisy - signed pocketbook + bookmark
  • $25 - Dandelion - 2 signed pocketbooks + 3 bookmarks
  • $25 - Rosebud - signed limited edition hard-cover + bookmark
  • $40 - Rosebush - signed & personalized limited edition hard-cover + poster bookmark + your name in the acknowledgements
Limited Tiers
include the perks from the Rosebush Tier, plus
  • $80 $65 - The Patron - 5 left - your hard-cover will be personalized with your name + a flower of your choice painted on the cover
  • $100 $75 - The Florist - only 1 - your hard-cover will be personalized with your name + I will write a poem about the flower of your choice, dedicate it to you, and include it in the book
  • $400 $200- The Financier - only 1 - your hard-cover will be personalized with your name + a flower of your choice painted on the cover + an added signed pocketbook + dinner with me, I'll buy (you are responsible for getting yourself there)
Those who give more, get more. And if we don't reach the full goal, don't worry! You keep the money you pledged, and you can still buy the ebook when it comes out.

The Impact

  • 90% of the profits from this printing will go to funding local poetry and creative writing projects in the Central Florida area, so you can be assured that Found with Flowers is making a real-world difference.
  • I will donate 1 in every 10 pocketbooks printed to Little Free Libraries, or other book exchanges.
  • As cool and convenient as ebooks are, it's also nice to be able to hold something in your hands.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money to this campaign, or if you already have and still want to do more, you can help out by sharing it with your friends, family, co-workers, family pet, or the nearest houseplant.

story:
SUMARIO 

 

Introducción 

Hola me llamo David Puerta, i desde que descubrí el LN2, mi ilusión siempre ha sido tener una heladería usando el nitrógeno liquido. Al ver que este tipo de negocio tiene un valor de inversión mucho mas elevado que la heladería tradicional, pensé que seria buena idea empezar por abajo, por eso cree una empresa de catering que se dedica a hacer postres , helados, piruletas con nitrógeno liquido, i así pasado un tiempo poder llegar a tener mi propia heladería.

Objetivo

El objetivo es poder finalizar el diseño de esta maquina y posteriormente comercializarla. Nuestro objetivo es vender exclusivamente la maquina junto a una franquicia de heladería nitro. Mediante esta formula queremos conseguir crear una marca así poder vincular la exclusividad de la maquina a la marca. Para la comercialización i expansión de la marca o franquicia ofreceremos a nuestros clientes todos los formatos posibles de negocio,  adaptándonos en cada momento a las inversiones económicas del cliente franquicia. Diseñamos Heladeria Pop up en (contenedores marítimos) hasta heladerías en grandes locales i pasando por stands, carritos de helados o Food tracks.

Soluciones

Hacemos el helado dentro de la tarrina esta el la solución que ofrece nuestro prototipo i el diseño de esta maquina, también reduce el tiempo i el coste del producto final en un 65% respecto a las otras maquinas que elaboran helado con LN2 i que hoy en día se encuentran en el mercado. Hay estudios que avalan que el consumidor busca cada vez mas productos sanos, hechos al momento i de calidad, esto es exactamente lo que ofrece una heladería nitro que elabora el producto delante del cliente.

Ventajas

Nos dimos cuenta que el problema del helado hecho con nitrógeno LN2 es el coste en si i el tiempo de elaboración, frente al helado tradicional, pero también es cierto que tiene ventajas como:

Crear y elaborar helados con sabores personalizados a gusto de cada cliente.

Mejora la calidad, creamos un helado con una textura mas suave y cremosa.

Reducción de las mermas al 0%, mediante este sistema no tienes perdidas por caducidad en los productos base o pre-elaborados.

El Mercado

El mercado es más competitivo que nunca y está muy fragmentado. Las empresas apuestan por el lanzamiento de helados artesanales. La innovación en el sector emula a otros mercados y se provee de las materias primas con productores locales. Las empresas apuestan por la diferenciación de marca y de los puntos de venta, utilizando para ello los envases como elementos diferenciales. Probablemente esto es debido a la preferencia que el consumidor ha mostrado en los últimos años por los helados en tarrina en detrimento del barquillo.

PUEDES DESCARGARTE NUESTRO PLAN DE PROYECTO EN ESTE LINK:  http://www94.zippyshare.com/v/2bokafgI/file.html

story:
What'n'Why

In all known human history from very beginning humans have been eating everything that they could managed to find/hunt/grow. Even after lot of wild animals were domesticated ,and being very useful in everyday life, like horses or dogs, they all were deemed to be consumed if hard times have to come or just for being delicious. And that's what humans are - the ultimate predators, to eat everything and even everyone. But in this race for food one small thing were missed out - there is lot of recipes how to make food starting from weal and pork ending with rats and insects, but almost none of recipes how to cook a cat. And this is unfair from our point of view.  That's why we have collected recipes from around a world just about this topic.  And now we want to make it available to you. For the joy of all the cows and chickens in farms we present to you :


Here you will find recipes for meals from all around the world. Including: 

Braised cat with mushroom sauce, Beer basted cat, Greek cat  recipe, Thai cat with olives and more.

We already have many moral supporters, mostly cows in farms and dogs around the world. But we need more intelligent support and not only from countries from east.

So now we want to bring this to you! We need some funds for designing, editing and releasing this book to the world.


What you will get

Depending on your support level you will get :
a book in electronic (.epub , .pdf .mobi) or physical format, 
branded ecological pencil,
branded postcard.


Other things (and disclaimer)

By supporting this project you are also morally supporting all the animals that are grown in farms and will be consumed by humans around the world.
We DO NOT support cruelty with animals. 
DO NOT eat your pets, pets are not meant to be eaten. They are your friends, mostly. Even if they are cats, they still can be your friends, probably. 
Know your local law before doing anything. Despite reading book in most countries is not prohibited, cooking cats in some might be.

story:
Dear friend,

Our family addresses to You as a person who is not indifferent to what is happening in our world. If you think that Putin and his regime are dangerous for the whole world – you are absolutely right. And you can help other people know the truth about him.

We wrote a book “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?”. We had to left Russia (Moscow) because of aggressive policy of Putin’s regime and became political refugees in Finland. The book was written by all three members of our family (my parents and me).

We left successful business, familiar environment, friends in order to keep the main freedom – freedom of speech, freedom to tell people the truth about what is really happening in Russia. My father was seriously and chronically ill, and we could not endanger him by participating in rallies, etc. You sometimes hear about well-known Russian opposition figures, like Navalny, and their actions, but you don’t hear anything about ordinary people who dared to speak out against Power and simply disappeared or went to prison for their views. Therefore, our family decided to leave Russia and become political refugees and fight against the criminal regime with words, helping people learn about what Putin is doing and what is hidden behind his actions.

My father died in 2019, he died far from his homeland, in obscurity, without waiting for the decision on political asylum. But he died happy, because his family was near him, and my father did what he considered the most important – he wrote for people to help them remain free, as he was free, no matter what. Dad also wrote books for children, making his dream come true, but that’s a completely different story.

My mother and me continue our joint work and invite you to become a part of our team – team of people who care about what will happen to the World next.

The book consists of separate chapters-articles (98 chapters), which were written in different years (2017-2020). They are focused on various subjects, political and social events, but they are all about Putin, the Kremlin, Russia and the World.

We ask your help in publication and marketing of printed book and marketing of ebook “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?”

The book is based on information obtained from open sources, including official statements by the Kremlin and its propagandists. “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” allows people to understand who Putin is, what he is doing, and most importantly, what his actions really mean and what is behind them.

The authors of the book deliberately chose the path of political refugees in order to be able to tell the world about the crimes of the Putin’s regime, knowing how little the West (most people) is really informed about what is happening inside Russia and how it threatens everyone in the world, not least due to very effective Kremlin propaganda. Three years of permanent work, which has a sole purpose – the fight against the criminal Putin’s regime.

“Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” is addressed to people from different countries, of different social status and with different interests. The book is written so that it is understandable for both those who are sophisticated in politics and those who are practically not interested in it. It touches on facts known to many (the occupation of the Crimea, the war in Ukraine, Malaysia Airlines Flight 17, etc.), as well as facts little known to people outside of Russia. “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” aims to give them a more detailed picture of the situation in Russia and the foreign policy of the Kremlin.

People must understand who Putin is, otherwise they will be defenseless against him. Therefore, in “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” various periods of Russian history are considered in combination with the Kremlin’s propaganda, which actively uses the past and present to influence the minds of people around the world.

You can really bring the book to a wide audience to compete against Putin at the level of people’s minds.

If you can’t help financially, you can help simply by telling your relatives, friends, colleagues about this campaign. Please share the link with them (Indiegogo has different tools for this) and ask them to do the same.

Any contribution you make is valuable to us.

Thank you very much,

Yours faithfully,

Denis Meshcherskiy

Therefore, our family decided to leave Russia and become political refugees and fight against the criminal regime with words, helping people learn about what Putin is doing and what is hidden behind his actions.My father died in 2019, he died far from his homeland, in obscurity, without waiting for the decision on political asylum. But he died happy, because his family was near him, and my father did what he considered the most important – he wrote for people to help them remain free, as he was free, no matter what. Dad also wrote books for children, making his dream come true, but that’s a completely different story.My mother and me continue our joint work and invite you to become a part of our team – team of people who care about what will happen to the World next.The book consists of separate chapters-articles (98 chapters), which were written in different years (2017-2020). They are focused on various subjects, political and social events, but they are all about Putin, the Kremlin, Russia and the World.We ask your help in publication and marketing of printed book and marketing of ebook “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?”The book is based on information obtained from open sources, including official statements by the Kremlin and its propagandists. “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” allows people to understand who Putin is, what he is doing, and most importantly, what his actions really mean and what is behind them.The authors of the book deliberately chose the path of political refugees in order to be able to tell the world about the crimes of the Putin’s regime, knowing how little the West (most people) is really informed about what is happening inside Russia and how it threatens everyone in the world, not least due to very effective Kremlin propaganda. Three years of permanent work, which has a sole purpose – the fight against the criminal Putin’s regime.“Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” is addressed to people from different countries, of different social status and with different interests. The book is written so that it is understandable for both those who are sophisticated in politics and those who are practically not interested in it. It touches on facts known to many (the occupation of the Crimea, the war in Ukraine, Malaysia Airlines Flight 17, etc.), as well as facts little known to people outside of Russia. “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” aims to give them a more detailed picture of the situation in Russia and the foreign policy of the Kremlin.People must understand who Putin is, otherwise they will be defenseless against him. Therefore, in “Putin. Visible and Invisible. Enemy or Friend?” various periods of Russian history are considered in combination with the Kremlin’s propaganda, which actively uses the past and present to influence the minds of people around the world.You can really bring the book to a wide audience to compete against Putin at the level of people’s minds.If you can’t help financially, you can help simply by telling your relatives, friends, colleagues about this campaign. Please share the link with them (Indiegogo has different tools for this) and ask them to do the same.Any contribution you make is valuable to us.Thank you very much,Yours faithfully,Denis Meshcherskiy

story:
The OSJ is an online private success network where all the members communicate with each other to maintain theirs and each other’s success.   It is the lovechild of Jz Zillart (Zen) and all her work on the way to success for others. A dynamic creator and founder she is at the very heart of the business never failing to keep it real in life and everyone’s success (of which all types of success are seen as ‘significant’).

We are presently running in beta and taking out the creases in the system before we launch it into full mode, offering safe private success network where members get done what they need to (less trolls, fear of unwanted critics and all the other things you detest when you need a productive networking place).

The platform contains everything you need to develop your networking (legally) whether that is a new career, new product, personal goals or professional development.  Our mission is to make you successful with our members and our platform by coming together, getting together (we just want to be together) to make it real.  Your ambition does not matter at all, what matters is that you came here to succeed with something and gave us our mission of making that happen with you.

The site is based on two development philosophies one is online and the other is in life.  Online we give you the communication tools to grow your thing, we work together with all members to bring it into life (making and keeping it real).  In life we use a powerful journaling technique which makes clear what you need and want to get done so when out and about in life, you get it done…

 

(Our current journal collection)

 

The site is the communication tool that helps make it all happen…

 

We are powered by freewill and so will you be...

 

What You Get

 

For your £1

Full OSJ Membership as described on our website for a year

Free upgrades regardless of how good they get at the OSJ Member Level

24/7 online support with as much as we can help you grow ideas, concepts, leads, promotions, general questions (and so much more), make contacts, maintain your stamina in success by using our members ticketing service.  We may experience some delays as we get busier and are training our staff to handle the volume of work – we will get there with your help.

33% discount off all our products, merchandise and OSJ events, meaning you can attend any of our events and engage live with relevant and live people to move you on with your success story. This discount applies to your second year a 33% discount for all your valuable input.

We will email you your access code to register and sign up to the service and before or on the 6th August

10 winners of the 5000 will win a copy each of one of our current paperback Original Success Journals

 

The Impact We Can Make Together

 

With your £1, participation by giving us feedback and engaging with our team, we can be sure that exercise all of our success strategies, develop better ones and make your success our success.  We have to find all the glitches, the design floors, the mistakes and demand we improve that of ourselves and of our team so that we can realise what we are imagining - OUR successes.  We are listening watching and learning.

We DO NOT use connections to other technology sites, we DO NOT use AI and we ONLY USE HUMAN PARTICIPATION AND INTUITION. This means that no one can get to you inside and you are alone with the people, the teams and the places you need to go before you take it out to the rest of the world in life or in tech.  It's our USP. This is a safe environment where you can learn, make mistakes, explore and extend yourself to a point of your own debut. It also means the peace and quiet you need free from distractions and an only support environment.

We want to be the UK’s go to private success network where people realise their potential and endlessly bound into opportunity and their ongoing success.

We want your products and services to be absolutely, successful and ensure our members are part of your success journey.

We want successful companies to use our platform, have articles promoted and support our members with their most excellent services and products.

We want the successful and the going to be successful to meet and to collaborate sharing that mutual journey of student and master where both grow to exceed what they were taught and in material reality anyone can say they have succeeded.

We want to develop your profile in our home ‘The OSJ’ and from with the safety of those surroundings which are not accessible by other networks, give you the thinking space and considerate people to become what you will showcase later.

We want to take your initiatives for our development and for you to see them on our road map of success. 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Clearly running and designing an online success network in life and in technology presents challenges such as minor down time where we must upgrade the site or are training our very new employees. We ask that you are considerate to them and in that process remember that they are also training in a world none of us has experienced.

We have somewhat erratic and unstable economic and political events going on around us presently in the world.  These we will have to be flexible towards and use our communications to be overcoming these difficulties together.  We will overcome them.   

 

Other Ways You Can Participate

 

  • Share our links to this site
  • Watch our video channel on YouTube (we are building that portfolio presence online and you can see some of the very first footage we ever filmed about OSJ’s).  Subscribe to the channel for updates.

 

With you all the way…

 

Powered by freewill…

 

Because we can with you make this happen…

story:
My name is Angelo. I am a screenwriter, director, producer and now an author. You can find my list of film credits on IMDB - http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1479226/.  

My book, 4 Years To A TV Deal, is a memoir and how-to book chronicling my experiences and efforts to break into television without an agent or manager. My book is compiled of four years of real life stories about conceiving, developing, writing and pitching TV series concepts to a top 5 television network.

 

 

 

 

In 2010 I gambled on the TV industry and focused my screenwriting and producing efforts on TV series development.  Four years later the gamble paid off!  It's still paying off: the TV industry is booming -- it's bigger than ever and the need for content has never been greater.

Television is expanding with a BIG BANG.  The world is binging on content, and with a hunger so voracious, now is the perfect time for ANY creative individual to make his or her mark in the TV biz. You don't have to be an insider to break through. You just have to know the right steps to take to be taken seriously.


That's ME directing my favorite actors in The Broken Hearts Club

What's INSIDE the book:

It took 4 years of trial and error, success and failure, to land my first TV pilot development deal with NBCUniversal. Thirty days later I landed a second deal with the network. I accomplished this starting with no knowledge of the business, no connections, no contacts, and no representation. In 4 Years To A TV Deal I tell you exactly what I did and how I did it, and most importantly, what worked and what didn't so you can do it too.

I went from being an obscure independent filmmaker to becoming a regular fixture at NBUniversal offices. I cannot tell you how cool it is to walk into a building on the Universal Studios Lot and the veteran Security Guard knows your name.  I met with the scripted and unscripted departments of NBC Drama, NBC Comedy, Bravo, Esquire, and many more.  It was always exciting, but it wasn't always fun, and it was never easy.

My book is a hybrid of my professional aspirations and personal endeavors including working with the Independent Film & Television Alliance (IFTA) and attending several Development Needs meetings with NBCUniversal and its affiliates. My book culminates four years later, with the scary challenges of collaboration and meeting deadline to present final draft pilot scripts to two television networks.

 


On set in LA for my romantic dramedy turned miniseries

Proceeds  from this Indiegogo campaign will help me complete, edit, publish, print and market my book, 4 Years To A TV Deal. In it I share my process, my ups and downs, successes, failures and learning lessons. I'll share the defining moment that transformed me from a trembling writer sitting in a boardroom into a confident storyteller who could pitch anyone at any time. 4 Years To A TV Deal chronicles every aspect of my journey so you can learn from and duplicate my results.

In 4 Years To A TV Deal I reflect in detail about how I went from sitting in a crowd of independent filmmakers to meeting one-on-one with network executives.   The rest, as they say, is history. It begins with my indie film

MY INDIE FILMS

Broken Hearts Club which had its premiere at the Hollywood Black Film Festival. See the trailer below:

 

Resurrection of Serious Rogers. was released electronically and reached 32,000+ downloads all over the world:

 


Marcus and I at the E! Entertainment offices to pitch...again!

I've never worked for a studio. I am just an artist -- like you -- who loves film, television, writing and creating. However, I was able to help ten (10) men and women, writers and authors from Los Angeles to Ohio, Arizona to Georgia, San Francisco to North Carolina, refine their ideas and get pitch meetings with network TV executives.

In four years of pitching to NBCUniversal  I also learned how to write one-sheets, proposals and pitch documents. Writing a series pitch proposal is nothing like writing a screenplay.  Crafting such documents is definitely an acquired skill and I'll show you how to so it simply and effectively.


On the road to Filmart in Hong Kong. 

You'll learn:

  • When to craft a one-sheet or a five-page proposal or a series bible.
  • How to fully familiarize a TV executive with an unfamiliar subject in one sentence.
  • The truth about Releases and Indemnity.
  • 5 buzzkill words to avoid saying during a pitch meeting.
  • What really happens during a pilot development deal?
  • How to avoid the two biggest mistakes I ever made as an executive producer.
  • Three sure ways to get past the executive's assistant.
  • Why the assistant is your #1 best contact at the network.
  • How to be memorable in the room and after.
  • How to get more money out of your Contract/Agreement.
  • Who's $%#$*@ meeting is it anyway, yours or theirs?
  • Why you should be nervous?
  • What's the #1 purpose/goal of your first pitch meeting, and why people blow it
  • Pitching in pairs? What to do when your partner goes off the rails
  • Why your idea sucks...until you do this one thing
  • How to craft a logline/elevator pitch that blows minds
  • Who should speak more during the pitch, you or the executive?
  • The ugly downside of collaboration and executive producing
  • How to vet your story/idea/concept to see if it truly works
  • The one thing you absolutely must do to pitch unscripted/reality

All copyrights of the aforementioned books and intellectual properties (IP) are owned solely and exclusively by Angelo Bell.  There are no middle men required for approval or authorization. Proceeds from this Indiegogo campaign will go towards hiring an established editor, book design, original photography, layout, printing, publishing, marketing, perks and Indiegogo fees. TV writing and production is Angelo's career and he is constantly working to develop new material, concepts and stories to pitch and produce. Work in this area may, at times, delay the forward progress of editing, book design, marketing etc.


My partner in crime, Ramona, and me on the lot at a NBCUniversal Development Needs Meeting

I'M GOING ALL-OUT WITH THIS AUTHOR THING!

I love everything about writing and every form of writing. But I wanted to earn the title of "author." So, I haven't merely written my how-to book, 4 Years To A TV Deal.  I've written an action-packed mystery-thriller as well.  When you support this campaign you can ore-order an advance copy of my first fiction novel, A PERFECT WEAPON. 

A PERFECT WEAPON is my gritty  and sexy psychological action thriller about a disgraced U.S. Marshal who is given a final chance at redemption when he's reinstated to track down an escaped female prisoner suspected of international terrorism. His pursuit of the woman becomes complicated by his sexual obsession and  a deadly conspiracy that threatens his every move. Ultimately he must decide if uncovering the truth is more dangerous than capturing this seductive assassin. The story is an adaptation of my action thriller screenplay of the title that a producer compared to No Country For Old Men, by the Coen brothers.  I imagined what the trailer would look like if one of my favorite directors, Tony Scott, was directing the movie, so I created a interesting proof-of-concept trailer...https://vimeo.com/77215926

Note: the individuals in the trailer are no longer associated with the movie. This is for reference only. But trust me, the book is more sexy, more provocative, and more badass than the trailer!

 


Met Dionna at the GAPF and got her meetings with Oxygen, BET and TLC

IN CLOSING...

I'd be grateful if you support my efforts in yet another important and upward transition in my career as a writer. In return I hope that sharing my ideas, experiences, successes and failures in pitching to TV execs helps you hold onto your dream of writing for television.  If you have ever felt like you have the perfect idea for a TV series you should never give up on that dream.  It took me four years to get a paid TV deal -- but it happened!  It can happen for you too, and much quicker!

 

*images used here are for reference only and do not necessarily depict the design of the final item or book available as a perk.

*images, video and likenesses used herein does not constitute personal endorsement of the book or its contents.

*shipping outside of the US to Canada only because its development process most closely resembles that of the USA.

story:
I am Stephen Odam.O Paul, website developer i have participated in over 30 completed web projects for use across Africa and now set to use my wealth knowledge to influence the continent of Africa positively while making sure the entire world benefit from it.

Born and raised in Africa, I understand and believe that this continent is a sleeping giant. There is so much potential that is untapped and with a great platform, the sky will just be the runway because Africa will soar. Base on this understanding and my small team of 12 is developing the #1 Social Business Network. This social networking platform; created for both for businesses and individuals is developed to open up Africa to the world and the world to Africa. The platform will create an opportunity for the over one billion people in the African continent to connect and socialize with the rest of the world as users are propelled by various categories of incentives to patronize and engage with those showcasing their businesses and talents this business social network will open doors of opportunity to. Statistics and history has shown that businesses and individuals who venture into the huge African market to do business never fails though the environment can be quite hostile in some areas within Africa. 

BRING YOUR PRODUCTS AND

SERVICES TO THE AFRICAN MARKET. 

Are you a business owner?  Where would your business be, if today you were given access to over 1.2 billion potential customers and business partners and experts in the business world? In addition to all the amazing benefits you can think about, success would be limitless. Nowadays, in the world full of fake news, you never know who really said what. What is true and what is a lie? The only certainty is death.

And the fact, that none of the quotes about death mentioned in this book have ever been said. But could have been. Sentences never written or said by Jim Morrison, Andy Warhol, Salvador Dalí, Albert Einstein and many others are combined whit my hand crafted illustrations of death. Actually, skulls. Black and white. And not many shades of grey.

If you like (fake) quotes of famous people, BW pictures of skulls, you might like my book as well. Because why not?

story:
Ghosts of the Living: Fallen Angels

As a young(ish) christian who loves fantasy, netflix and playing computer games i know to reach a new generation with a message of faith, we need to embrace new techniques and ideas. I've been a writer for five years, and a christian for only two, i want to use my combined passions to get good stories and ideas out there. I need your help so my book, which is awesome, gets the attention it deserves and the christian voice can be heard in the world of publishing and entertainment.

The first four chapters can be found, ready to read, right here: https://www.inkitt.com/stories/177792/chapters/1?preview=true

 

What we need and why.

I'm good at social media and promo, but to really get to people, sometimes you have to spend.

  • $0-1,000 : social media manger hired, twitter, facebook and google plus groups
  • $1000 - 1500: Paid, social ads on facebook and amazon.
  • $1,500 -2,000: Printed book sent to newspaper for review.
  • $2000+: Paid billboard ads.

The Impact

The difference if we do or don't get the funds

Don't

  • I release and promote books myself. Sell between  5-10,000 ebook copies over few years (based on previous books) , never break out of "christian" categories.

Do

  • Sell 15,000+ e-books, Stock print books in many christian books stores, obtain best seller status on non-christian categories, spread the word via social media, start to build a vaild voice for other christian authors.

Risks & Challenges

 

  • The books have been written and are getting edited now, their is no risk they won't get done or created in print and e-book formats..
  • Risk, that while we push hard, the book proves unpopular and doesn't do well.
  • Best thing to do is read it first, and see if you like it ! or at least think it will sell.

Other Ways You Can Help

The mission here is to get the christian voice in the global e-book market, as such you can help, even if you can't pledge In fact the greatest help will be people sharing this campaign.

  • Post on you're own social media, facebook and email lists
  • Mention to church groups or home groups
  • Pray for our success
  • Help promote other books and review them no amazon!

If you made it this far i thank you, with the rewards i hope you want to read the book yourself, but i also know, for some people, they support the idea, but they know they aren't the "target market". If this is you, i would still hope you see value in getting a book like this into peoples hands and can help me do so.

Julius Schenk

story:
For those looking to help us in Japanese, please use the link below.

日本語での支援をご希望の方は、以下のリンクから応援をお願い致します。

　　https://motion-gallery.net/projects/kyoseihunin　

 

What if newspaper articles about pharmaceuticals – products that can potentially take someone's life – had been controlled by money?

Through our reporting, we discovered Kyodo News, Japan's largest news wire agency, received payment from Dentsu Inc, one of the world's largest advertisement agencies, to market pharmaceutical products through stealth marketing content under the guise of news articles. In our inaugural series, “Journalism for Sale”, we exposed these deals through numerous interviews, internal documents, and on-camera confessions.

The stealth marketing content paid by Dentsu and published by Kyodo marketed blood-thinners designed to prevent strokes. These drugs, including Xarelto which is sold in the United States, are potentially life-threatening. Although the causal relationship remains unclear, reports of hundreds of deaths by those who used the drugs have been made to the Japanese government.

In early 2017, Waseda Chronicle published five Japanese articles for our inaugural series, “Journalism for Sale”. As we prepare to publish more, we want to begin making this series available to the international audience by translating them into English. We also hope to work together with journalists and journalism organizations overseas in order to investigate whether a similar situation is present in the U.S. and other countries.

 

■ “Sold articles” involving Kyodo News and Dentsu Group

It took a ten-month investigation by Waseda Chronicle to reveal that articles dispatched to newspapers across Japan by Kyodo News had actually been paid for by Dentsu.

Kyodo News is Japan’s biggest news agency. It provides news articles to more than 170 newspapers, TV stations, and other media outlets nationwide.

Our investigation revealed that, for at least twenty years, Dentsu paid Kyodo News to publish stealth marketing content promoting pharmaceutical products produced by Dentsu's clients. The articles that Dentsu paid for portrayed the drugs in a positive light, failing to tell readers about possible side effects and other negative aspects. An article that advertises Xarelto, a blood thinner produced by Germany’s Bayer AG, made no mention of the risk of brain hemorrhaging associated with the drug.

■ About Waseda Chronicle

Waseda Chronicle is a non-profit investigative journalism organization. We are an official member of the Global Investigative Journalism Network (GIJN), and in 2017 received the Foreign Correspondents' Club of Japan's Freedom of Press Award 2017.
Waseda Chronicle began its journey as an investigative journalism project under the direction of Waseda University Institute of Journalism's professor Tatsuro Hanada in February 2017. The journalism institute is largely run by volunteers, most of whom are Japanese journalists, while non-Japanese journalists include former New York Times Tokyo bureau chief Martin Fackler, and Alessia Cerantola, an Italian journalist who previously reported on the Panama Papers. In addition to the professional journalists, the Institute gives Waseda University students real-life experience and training in investigative journalism, with the hope that they will pursue a career in media.
One year on, we are now an independent non-profit organization. We receive no funding from political parties, corporations, or any entities that may jeopardize our neutral and unbiased reporting. We maintain our journalistic integrity and operations by relying solely on donations and member contributions.

Journalists in Japan are currently in a tough situation. Japan ranked 72nd place in the Press Freedom Index published by the Reports Without Borders, after the government passed the Protection of Specially Designated Secrets bill. We are alarmed at how this bill, along with an atmosphere of passivity by mainstream journalists, have made Japanese media toothless watchdogs of authority and power. We believe a new type of news organization is necessary, and we at Waseda Chronicle is striving to do exactly that.

　　　　　

■ Social issue of “stealth marketing” pervades even newspapers

Over the past several years, “stealth marketing” in the media has become a social issue in Japan.

Stealth marketing refers to a method of deceiving readers by the use of so-called native ads, which are written to look like genuine news articles, and published without telling readers that they are actually paid ads. Until recently, such stealth marketing was usually seen as limited to online media. However, the Waseda Chronicle has revealed that newspapers all over Japan have been publishing the same sort of native ads.

Data show that people in Japan trust the mass media, and newspapers, in particular, more than news consumers in other developed countries. According to a World Values Survey conducted from 2010 to 2015, roughly 74% of Japanese respondents said they trust newspapers, television, magazines and other major media. By contrast, the figure in the United States was just 23%. (Source: http://www.worldvaluessurvey.org/wvs.jsp)

We discovered that Japan’s biggest news agency, Kyodo News, worked together with Dentsu Group to betray that trust.

■ Japan’s mass media ignores the problem

In response to the Waseda Chronicle’s questions, Kyodo News admitted that its subsidiary received payment from Dentsu Group after publishing the articles in question. But other Japanese media outlets made no attempt to follow our lead, or report on this issue. Even the regional papers that published the Kyodo articles have taken no action.

The Waseda Chronicle is still a small journalism organization that has barely gotten off the ground. By translating our articles into English and having them read in the English-speaking world, we want to inform more readers about the truth of “journalism for sale.” We also want to prevent more people from falling victim to these schemes.

■ This problem is not limited to Japan

Pharmaceutical companies operate globally. Their marketing aims to sell as many drugs as possible wherever they can.

They use the media as a tool to achieve that goal. Media outlets are suffering an economic crunch in Japan, as they are in the United States and other nations. The allure of the pharmaceutical industry’s vast profits may be drawing media companies to practices that are less than scrupulous.

In a world where we are bombarded from all sides by fake news, all faith in journalism will fail if we betray sick patients and their families, who rely on us for the truth in their time of need.

Most importantly, if we spread information distorted to profit pharmaceutical companies, patients will suffer. Journalists worldwide must come together to prevent such suffering. Waseda Chronicle is prepared to take the initiative and engage in investigative reporting about this problem.

■Amount of money & Returns:

The following returns will be presented to your support.
【$10】
A thank-you letter from Editor-in-Chief.
【$100】
A thank-you letter from Editor-in-Chief.
The report of Global Investigative Journalism Conference 2017 (Nov.11~Nov. 18)
【$1000】
A thank-you letter from Editor-in-Chief.

The report of Global Investigative Journalism Conference 2017 (Nov.11~Nov. 18)

In order to appreciate your contribution, we will mention your name on our website.

■Assumed risks and challenges: We have carried out a series of "Journalism for Sale" 10 times up to now, but the ending has not been seen yet. Having said that, there is a possibility that the crowdfunding money may not be able to cover all the articles to be translated if it is too short.

■A comment from Martin Fackler, former New York Times Tokyo bureau chief. 

　　　　　

When the Waseda Chronicle’s appeared in Japanese earlier this year, it got huge attention in magazines, websites, blogs — everywhere but the big national newspapers and television networks that dominate Japan’s media landscape. The reason for this mixed reception was clear: the Waseda Chronicle was doing the rock-the-boat investigative journalism that is so rare in Japan, and so disliked by the establishment elites that control the national narrative.

For its first project, the Waseda Chronicle took on unsavory practices within one of the mainstream media themselves. It exposed an arrangement in which Kyodo News — Japan’s answer to AP or Reuters — ran articles about medical drugs while receiving payments from Dentsu, the huge advertising firm that is usually invisible in Japanese press coverage. While Kyodo initially pushed back, it had to backpedal, and eventually issue an apology to the Waseda Chronicle.

This brand of reporting — one that exposes facts in an effort to hold the powerful to account — is badly needed by Japan and the world. While Japan saw a brief renaissance of investigative journalism after the 2011 Fukushima nuclear disaster, the pro-nuclear establishment has largely succeeded in bringing the mainstream press back to heel. In fact, the Waseda Chronicle’s main members are former and current reporters at major Japanese media companies who felt so frustrated by the grim conformity that they broke away to start a new type of media outlet.

While university and NGO-based investigative journalism has begun to take off in the West — look at the Panama Papers — it is largely untried in Japan. The Waseda Chronicle thus marks an important effort to foster a new and more independent brand of journalism in Japan. Not one based on ideology, but in unearthing the facts that the powerful would rather keep hidden. And one that uses those exposed facts to construct more truthful counter-narratives that challenge the official versions of reality. 

This sort of journalism is more important than ever, as Japan’s big media have largely fallen silent on Fukushima and other important issues. However, the not-for-profit model only works with readers’ support. Crowdfunding is a relatively new notion in Japan, and the support of overseas readers is critical for the Waseda Chronicle's success. 

So please check out their articles, and consider giving to help restore investigative journalism in Japan. This is important not just for Japan, but for all of us. Thank you.

While Kyodo initially pushed back, it had to backpedal, and eventually issue an apology to the Waseda Chronicle.This brand of reporting — one that exposes facts in an effort to hold the powerful to account — is badly needed by Japan and the world. While Japan saw a brief renaissance of investigative journalism after the 2011 Fukushima nuclear disaster, the pro-nuclear establishment has largely succeeded in bringing the mainstream press back to heel. In fact, the Waseda Chronicle’s main members are former and current reporters at major Japanese media companies who felt so frustrated by the grim conformity that they broke away to start a new type of media outlet.While university and NGO-based investigative journalism has begun to take off in the West — look at the Panama Papers — it is largely untried in Japan. The Waseda Chronicle thus marks an important effort to foster a new and more independent brand of journalism in Japan. Not one based on ideology, but in unearthing the facts that the powerful would rather keep hidden. And one that uses those exposed facts to construct more truthful counter-narratives that challenge the official versions of reality. This sort of journalism is more important than ever, as Japan’s big media have largely fallen silent on Fukushima and other important issues. However, the not-for-profit model only works with readers’ support. Crowdfunding is a relatively new notion in Japan, and the support of overseas readers is critical for the Waseda Chronicle's success. So please check out their articles, and consider giving to help restore investigative journalism in Japan. This is important not just for Japan, but for all of us. Thank you.

story:
Summary

Our online magazine was created on 30 September 2016, just a few weeks after the British EU Referendum and a couple of months before the election of Donald Trump at the White House.

What's in the name: Our magazine's name, PoliticsMeansPolitics.com, comes from the days when the then-newly appointed British Prime Minister Theresa May kept repeating in the media "Brexit means Brexit", after the EU Referendum.

Why PoliticsMeansPolitics.com exists: We are a weekly politics and current affairs magazine with one clear objective: Fighting the fake stories out there with real ones!

Our slogan: "Debunking the usual untruth about politics and getting the facts right."

Our mission: To inform and educate to make a social impact. After Brexit and Trump, it is now time to fight back and stand up for truth and facts, or our ability to make informed decisions will be forever compromised.

We have created PREMIUM, a new platform for citizen response, because, unlike other media who focus on superficial news, irrelevant stories, fake news and alternative facts, we believe that some stories out there MUST be told.

We believe that PREMIUM should not provide its readers with stories they 'want' to read, but with stories they 'need' to read to understand the world they live in.

Where our magazine politically stands: We are a British pro-EU weekly online magazine. We also believe in social equality, equal opportunity, the promotion of individual abilities and talents, social responsibility, universal healthcare, workers rights, entrepreneurship, fair market competition, access to education and culture for all, consumer rights, the prohibition of child labour, the fight against racism and antisemitism, and in the fight against global warming.

Our audience: We have a growing number of followers and, on average, tens of thousands of readers choose to read our articles every day. Our magazine has received over 574k views in the last quarter all pages combined. We also currently have over 5k registered readers to our weekly Newsletter. Although our target audience is English speaking readers mainly located in the United States, Britain, Canada and Australia, we also have readers in many other countries in the world, simply because the issues raised in our magazine are global and affect people everywhere on the planet.

There are two ways to read the magazine:

Read the magazine (light): PoliticsMeansPolitics.com 

Read the magazine (full version - with Premium stories): PoliticsMeansPolitics.com

 

 

Why becoming a supporter now?

More and more readers follow our magazine every day because they like the content we offer and believe in our quality, independent and fair journalism.

We want to keep this trend growing.

For that reason, we want to keep having a magazine based on trust (with our readers and with our authors) and the knowledge that no story we publish can be dropped because of censorship or political pressure.

To remain independent though is difficult and expensive, as our advertising revenues are too small to help us maintain our growth and we don’t have billionaire owners, nor shareholders who could add capitals in a snap of fingers.

 

 

What we have is the understanding of the connections between good, independent, ethical journalism and democracy in a post-Brexit / post-Trump world. Our independent journalism considers the news from a different angle you may feel you can relate to.

So, if you like our work, please show your support. A one-off contribution to the work of our magazine will be greatly appreciated. Your contribution will guaranty we can continue to bring you great quality and independent articles to fight the fake stories out there… with real ones!

 

How will the money be spent?

- Most of our articles are made freely available to our readers on our online magazine (our Top Stories from our Top Writers are available on our PREMIUM area to our subscribers, via paywall). However, it takes a lot of time to set them up, edit them, get all comments and facts right. Some of the money will go towards cost-effective admin techniques and apps that will help us run the website in a more proficient manner.


- A lot of people asked if there could be a print edition and we would love to produce one, that would remain free, of course. We will work towards producing a high-quality A4 size monthly or bi-monthly print edition of our magazine in the months to come. Distribution would be through our website as an e-magazine to start with.


- Finally, we love our contributors. We want to help all our contributors to continue feeding our magazine with great quality content. Therefore, some of the money will be used to fund our writers for the articles they produce.

 

What will the magazine look like with the money?

We will:
- Open our columns to journalists, writers, bloggers, politicians, business leaders, economists, lawyers, thinkers and anyone who wants to discuss political decisions, social issues, innovative ideas, original projects and complex schemes.
- Open our columns to anyone who wants to tell their story, share their experience, explain their views, describe their pain, show their enthusiasm, demonstrate their joy, talk about their life.
- Open our columns to all writers with progressive opinions, whether they are Left-wing or Right-wing, as long as they support democracy, human rights, diversity and selflessness.
- Fight fake news published by right-wing outlets and tabloids and social media bots by publishing real, honest and positive news and opinions.
- Fight politicians' alternative facts that threaten the democratic debate by fact-checking their speeches and comments to maintain transparency, honesty and democracy in politics.
- Go to the source of the reflections that influence politics and geopolitics in the changing world of today.
- Feed our readers with the most trustworthy, accurate and fact-checked information.

 

 

The future of independent journalism is at stake. PoliticsMeansPolitics.com will fight for it!

 

 

Even if you can't help us financially, you can always read our magazine and spread the word on social media. Tell your friends, colleagues and family about our magazine.

Your help is precious to us.

Thank you.

 

The Team at PoliticsMeansPolitics.com
