In a flash i received many messages from illustrators, but none of them felt right. But then I got the message from Zohreh, a new and upcoming artist who was seeking her first illustration opportunity. After receiving tons of messages earlier I was not hopeful, but something told me to just see and ask her for a quick sketch of what she could do. When i asked for this sketch I only expected a pencil sketch, Zohreh went above and beyond that! TWICE! I said no to the first one just because I was nervous, and she then asked if she could try again. I let her try again, and I did not regret it! She went above and beyond again and completely amazed myself and my wife. I didn't wait a second more, I asked her to be the illustrator of which I am happy to say she said yes to. Zohreh has been amazing to work with through out this project and I can't wait to get her illustrations out into the world. Because of her I know this book will draw children and adults into its pages and story. I would suggest paying attention to her, she is going to go far.First Sketch Sent Second Chance SketchWhat is the schedule? On January 25, 2019 Zohreh began work on the Cover for Sunshine. This has been completed and work has progressed to individual illustrations of each page. These should be completed by the end of March 2019. April will be dedicated to assembly of the book, including but not limited to: text layout, author and illustrator biographies, final editing, etc. Upon completion the book will be printed through KDP on Amazon. We will start by printing 300 copies at the size of 8.5 x 11.5 and looking into possible hardcover copies. The books will be ready to distribute by June 2019. We are committed to self-publishing currently and are proud of what we have done so far. Zohreh and I are new in the industry and taking it one  step at a time. So far everything has been smooth sailing. What is our budget?We are asking for $6,000.00, to fund the book. Approximately $5,000.00, is for the book design, printing, and shipping 300 copies. The left over $1000.00, will be used towards the 5-8% Indiegogo fee and printing costs for rewards. If we should exceed our target, please continue donating!!! Extra funds will be used towards taxes, packaging for shipping, travel and expenses for our next book. Page 2 of BookWhat are our long term-goals? Before I even wrote this book I decided It should have more books with Sunshine as the lead character learning how to understand others, being friends with those who are different from us and overcoming failure...each would bring more friends from the funny farm into the story and teach children the value in being kind to others and overcoming obstacles. With the success of this book we hope to find an agent and partner with a reputable publishing company. Query's will be sent out this summer. Risks & Challenges...The process and industry of self publishing are new to us. But so far we have worked well together and know with the help of our editor we will find success. We are committed to overcoming any obstacle and challenges that may arise through the process. We are 110% committed to the success of this book. Thank you again for all your support in helping us accomplish the success of this book!In closing...Thank you for taking time to read and learn more about our book campaign! We hope you'll either back us, wish us luck and or share our campaign with your family and friends. I hope you will share the excitement we have for teaching children to shine and be who they are to help make a difference in this world. Without the support of family and friends this wouldn't be possible. THANK YOU!

story:
Greetings everyone!  My name is Justin Guyton but many know me as Rubbercity J the freelance music producer, live sound and studio engineer.  With your help I will be able to add self-published author to that list.  I was asked by a few friends to share why everyone should support this campaign they've launched on my behalf.

Felon: The New Slur Word is a must read for anyone that is serious about prison reform or who wants to know the uncut truth about the system.  Due to the mistakes that I made in my past, I've been incarcerated 10 years on a 25 year sentence for aggravated robbery.  My life experiences have made me the perfect candidate to provide the world the proper insight of what getting ensnared in the web of the criminal justice system entails.

The term felon in today's society is used to degrade and discriminate against regular people that have simply made mistakes.  Although some people's mistakes may not lead to incarceration, nobody is perfect.  We all know someone that has been in prison, but there hasn’t been many prisoners willing to shed light on what really occurs in the system.  I decided to take a leap of faith and share my truth through writing Felon: The New Slur Word.

Through sharing my story I believe that many lives will be impacted in a variety of ways.  My book has the ability to make individuals reflect on their lives and give them the needed insight to change.  This book also gives any reader that's an advocate for prison reform all of the knowledge that's needed to properly address the flaws within the criminal justice system.

This is important to me because everyday I see first hand many of the injustices that are never brought to light.  There are numerous stories that need to be told and your support of this campaign will allow me to bring those stories to the forefront of the public's eyes.  During 2019 we all heard the stories about the unjust tribulations that Alice Marie Johnson and Meek Mill faced through their experiences with the criminal justice system.  Sadly, there are countless prisoners with similar stories whose voices haven't been heard.

I have encountered prisoners that are serving 228 to 528 years for non-homicidal offenses.  I've met juvenile offenders that have been sentenced to thousands of years along with nonviolent drug offenders that have been sentenced to more time in prison than offenders of some heinous crimes.  There are even a few individuals that have been proven factually innocent of their crimes but still are incarcerated.  Regrettably, I have even witnessed prisoners die behind inadequate medical treatment.  At a time when mass incarceration and prison reform initiatives are being widely discussed, prisoner's with stories like these need to be heard.  If you know someone that is incarcerated you need to read this book.

By you supporting this campaign we will be able to self-publish Felon: The New Slur Word.  Through publishing this nonfiction book we will be granted with the opportunity to establish a platform that will allow for us to bring forth the stories that need to be told.  This will be accomplished through publishing future titles, establishing a website, not to mention a podcast which will be utilized to shed light on the injustices of the system.

To be able to sustain and grow our platform we're setting a goal of of 2,020 preorders of Felon: The New Slur Word for 2020.  Preorders are available for $15.  Achieving 2,020 preorder sales will allow us to publish 25 books written by incarcerated writers who have stories that need to be communicated.  In order to reach our 2,020 preorder goal for 2020, we will need approximately 34 preorders of Felon: The New Slur Word everyday until the end of our campaign.  Right now we need 40 people from every state in the U.S. to contribute to this campaign by preordering a copy of Felon: The New Slur Word.

Some of our future book titles will include links to soundtracks that will feature songs, spoken word poetry, and other commentary that will shed light on the travesties that occur behind state and federal penitentiary walls.  By letting the voices of those who are subjected to these conditions be heard.

We will also be releasing a series of books and albums whose proceeds will be used to aid the philanthropic mission of making mammograms accessible to women in underserved communities.  This is something that my late mother and I were working on prior to her passing.  In the same fashion, these projects will give prisoners the opportunity to participate in community service projects.  Such strategies will foster the mentality of uplifting the communities that these individuals once defiled.

To solely self-publish Felon: The New Slur Word $2,795 is needed.  This is an itemized list of how these funds will be spent.  $250 for a block of 10 ISBN's (International Standard Book Number).  When you have different formats of your book (i.e paperback, ebook, etc.) you will need a separate ISBN for each format.  An average book will need five ISBN’s since there are four formats of ebooks.  A single ISBN costs $125.  So, a block of 10 is the cheapest option.

$600 for the digital formatting of a 125-page manuscript and editing by Freebird Publishers.

$250 to have the edited manuscript indexed by a professional book indexer.

$450 to have a professional book cover designed by Freebird Publishers.

$25 to purchase a Bar Code for the rear of book cover.

$275 to purchase the Gold Book Promotion Package from Freebird Publishers.  This package will get Felon: The New Slur Word listed on their website, in their catalog, and advertised on their web platforms for a period of one year.

$100 to establish the publishing company as a Limited Liability Company (LLC).

$125 to purchase a P.O. Box for one year.

$150 to have a custom website designed by Designed Conviction on the Wix platform.

$570 to purchase our web domain name and web hosting fees for Wix for two years.

To be able to establish the platform that we discussed which consists of publishing future titles, creating a podcast, together with producing soundtracks that will be employed to shed light on the injustices of the system, we will need to purchase the following:

$625 for a block of 100 ISBN's (International Standard Book Number).  When you have different formats of your book (i.e paperback, ebook, etc.) you will need a separate ISBN for each format.  An average book will need five ISBN’s since there are four formats of ebooks.  These ISBN's will be used for the authors titles that we will publish under our platform.

The next series of items are needed to produce our podcast and soundtracks.  With the exception of the laptop, all pieces of equipment will be purchased from Sweetwater ProGear.

$330 Acer Aspire 15.6in Laptop
$600 Rode Rodecaster Pro
$200 Rode PodMic with Boom Arm
$200 PreSonus Audio Box 96 Studio
$350 Zoom Q8 Handheld Video/Audio Recorder
$750 Korg Kross 61-Key Keyboard Workstation
$400 Korg Electribe

The total expense for the above needed items is $3,455 plus the $2,795 to publish Felon: The New Slur Word.  The price puts us at our campaign goal of $6,250.

The fulfillment of our 2,020 preorders of Felon: The New Slur Word goal will allow us to publish the stories of twenty-five incarcerated authors.  With doing most of the work in-house, we will be able to publish these authors works for an average of $1,200 per title.  For twenty-five books it will take $30K to be able to publish these authors.  With your help of reaching our goal of 2,020 preorders, this will provide us with the sufficient funding to do everything we have discussed in this campaign.  We have some great incentives that will allow us to achieve all of our goals and more.

*Incentives*
$20 USD Preorder Felon: The New Slur Word Paperback and get your name listed in the Acknowledgment's combo package.

Not only do you get a copy of Felon: The New Slur Word you also get your name listed in the Acknowledgement section of the paperback and ebook formats. (500) Available.

$25 USD Book Review/Blurb

Are you an author? Send me a copy of your book "paperback version only" I will write a book review then post it on the platform of your choice or I can write a blurb for your book.

$30 USD Unjustly Convicted Person Blog

Do you know someone that has been wrongfully convicted or has an excessive sentence?  We will conduct an interview with your loved one that is incarcerated.  Afterwards, we will write a blog that will be featured on our forthcoming website, YouTube channel, coupled with our social media platforms to bring attention to their unjust legal situation.

$50 USD Unjustly Convicted Person Video Interview

We will shoot a video interview with your loved one that is incarcerated via JPay or similar platform.  This video interview will be featured on our forthcoming website, YouTube channel, coupled with our social media platforms to bring attention to their unjust legal situation.

$75 USD Unjustly Convicted Person Book Feature

Do you know someone that has been wrongfully convicted or has an excessive sentence?  We will conduct an interview with your loved one that is incarcerated.  At the conclusion, we will write a story about your loved one that will be featured in one of our forthcoming books.  These books will be promoted on our website, YouTube channel, in addition to our social media platforms.  A video book trailer will also be generated to promote each of these books and the injustices of the individuals which are highlighted in these stories.

$100 USD Preorder Felon: The New Slur Word Paperback "Book Club Package"

Attention all Book Clubs: Preorder a package of (10) copies of Felon: The New Slur Word and prepare yourself to be enlightened.

$200 USD Book Promotion Package

Do you have a book that you need help promoting?  We will list your book in the bibliography section of one of our future books.  Your book will also be promoted on our forthcoming website and all of our social media platforms.

$500 USD Co-Write A Book with Felon: The New Slur Word author

Do you have an idea for a book or a manuscript that you have been unable to complete?  Let me aid you in reaching your goal of completing your book.  (4) Available.

$1,500 USD Ghostwritten Book by Felon: The New Slur Word author

Do you have an idea for a book but don't have the time to write it?  Let me ghostwrite it for you.  If you provide me with your idea for your book I will bring your idea to life.  (2) Available.

If we are not able to reach our funding goals we will use the funds that are raised to solely publish Felon: The New Slur Word in paperback and ebook formats.  We will reinvest all of the books proceeds into purchasing all of the equipment and services that we listed above.  We are committed to bringing awareness to the need for prison reform and will continue to work hard to secure our much needed platform.

This campaign will allow us to contribute to the push for prison reform.  Our goal is to reach 2,020 preorders of Felon: The New Slur World which will not only grant us with the opportunity to publish this book, but form a multifaceted platform.  The overwhelmingly majority of the incarcerated lacks the proper support system or celebrity backers to bring their stories of injustice to the limelight.  Your support of this campaign will allow us to highlight these stories.  We will produce and promote the stories of those who are unjustly buried alive in the criminal justice system.  Our forthcoming website, podcast, along with the YouTube channel will allow us to distribute these stories around the world.  We truly need your contributions in order for us to launch this platform.

One of the main challenges for us will be deciding what stories of prisoners to highlight first.  There are so many cases that deserve attention.  Our plan is through doing our due diligence we will decide which medium would be the best vehicle to bring each individual story to the forefront of the public's eyes.  This can be achieved through future books, our podcast, as well as promotion through our website.

We understand that everyone may not be in the financial position to contribute to our campaign.  You still have the power to help us reach our target goal through doing the following:
*Help us promote this campaign by using the Indiegogo share tool. 
*Create and post blog stories on social media to bring awareness and drive traffic to our campaign.  Making this campaign go viral will help us reach the goals for this project. 
*Tell all of your friends and family members to preorder a copy of Felon: The New Slur Word. 
*Refer stories to us that we should highlight through our platform and our future books.  This can be done through emailing us at teamblowboi@gmail.com.  We truly appreciate all levels of support.  Without your help, none of this could be accomplished.

story:
I'm Lena Gilmour, university student and aspiring author.  I've always been an avid reader and loved the process of writing and I am now finally ready to make my dreams a reality and pursue my passion of writing. The idea for "The Heroine Standard" had its beginnings in my high school days. I wrote an essay for my English class defending the character of Daisy Buchanan (we were reading "The Great Gatsby" at the time). The novel was my favourite, and Daisy one of the characters I loved reading about. When I started university, I began thinking about other characters who were widely hated despite often being the protagonists of their stories. That's when I decided to start penning "The Heroine Standard," a novel that would defend these despised women against the stereotypes.

I'm asking for contributions to help make this dream into a reality. I am asking for your support to put "The Heroine Standard" on bookshelves around the world.  

 

Here's Where This Campaign Comes In

I am looking for YOUR help to cover the costs of hiring an editor and marketing this book. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $1,000 to help cover living expenses while I work on my novel, as well as the costs of hiring an editor and marketing The Heroine Standard. I am a diligent, hardworking individual who goes above and beyond in everything I do. This project will not only be finished within the year, but will be accepted by an agent, I am sure, if only by sheer will alone! I am incredibly determined and have the drive needed to complete this project. 

If I surpass my $1,000 goal, I will donate 10% of all profits to the Indigo Love of Reading (http://www.loveofreading.org/en)

Here's How It's Going to Work

Right now I am still in the midst of writing "The Heroine Standard". Once it is finished, it will be sent out to a list of beta readers who will review and critique. Once it has been edited to near-death, it will be prepped for send-off to literary agents.

This is when you will receive your FREE PDF copy of The Heroine Standard! 

Every single person who contributes to this cause, no matter how big or small, will receive a free PDF copy of The Heroine Standard. 

The manuscript will then be sent out to agents in the hopes of becoming accepted. If accepted, it will go through the process of publishing, and hit the bookshelves! 

What Each Essay is Comprised Of:

  • A discussion and defense of some of literature's most hated female characters, including, but not limited to Daisy Buchanan, Bella Swan, and Lady Macbeth
  • A discussion of the reasoning for readers' hatred for the character
  • Talking about their story and my idea of their reasoning for acting the way they do
  • Talking about the lovable attributes of the character 
  • A discussion of whether they are redeemed by the end of the story
  • Conclusions about what the character teaches us through their faults 

Risks & Challenges

I understand that you may have some qualms about contributing to something that will fund an unpublished, young author. But you have my word I will do NONE of the following:

  • Spend the money donated on a wild shopping spree to Sephora (though the pretty signs may tempt me)
  • Waste my time watching Keeping up with the Kardashians rather than writing because a) I am too damn stubborn about finishing this novel and b) I can't freaking stand those girls
  • Go on a spur-of-the-moment trip to Guam because it's a cool-sounding name for a place 
  • Not finish this amazing book

 

If you're strapped for cash but still want to help make "The Heroine Standard" a reality, here's how you can help.

Just because you can't financially support the cause doesn't mean you can't help out!

  • Remember that $1 CAN make a HUGE difference. No matter how small the donations are, they add up. I promise you that $1 means so much more than you could ever know.
  • Post about my book on your social media! Get talking about this work and get the word out!
  • If you know someone who might be able to lend a hand in any way, please direct them to me! I could use all the support I can get!

And last but absolutely not least,

  • If you want my book but genuinely cannot afford a donation, shoot an email to inquiriesforlena@gmail.com and I will put you on a list to receive a copy funded by contributions of $20 or more 

I want this book to reach everyone it can and hopefully, it can reach you.

Thank you SO MUCH for all your help and contributions. Without you, this would not be possible. 

Please, share this campaign.

That's when I decided to start penning "The Heroine Standard," a novel that would defend these despised women against the stereotypes.
I'm asking for contributions to help make this dream into a reality. I am asking for your support to put "The Heroine Standard" on bookshelves around the world.  
 
Here's Where This Campaign Comes In
I am looking for YOUR help to cover the costs of hiring an editor and marketing this book. 
What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $1,000 to help cover living expenses while I work on my novel, as well as the costs of hiring an editor and marketing The Heroine Standard. I am a diligent, hardworking individual who goes above and beyond in everything I do. This project will not only be finished within the year, but will be accepted by an agent, I am sure, if only by sheer will alone! I am incredibly determined and have the drive needed to complete this project. 
If I surpass my $1,000 goal, I will donate 10% of all profits to the Indigo Love of Reading (http://www.loveofreading.org/en)

Here's How It's Going to Work
Right now I am still in the midst of writing "The Heroine Standard". Once it is finished, it will be sent out to a list of beta readers who will review and critique. Once it has been edited to near-death, it will be prepped for send-off to literary agents.
This is when you will receive your FREE PDF copy of The Heroine Standard! 
Every single person who contributes to this cause, no matter how big or small, will receive a free PDF copy of The Heroine Standard. 
The manuscript will then be sent out to agents in the hopes of becoming accepted. If accepted, it will go through the process of publishing, and hit the bookshelves! 
What Each Essay is Comprised Of:

A discussion and defense of some of literature's most hated female characters, including, but not limited to Daisy Buchanan, Bella Swan, and Lady Macbeth
A discussion of the reasoning for readers' hatred for the character
Talking about their story and my idea of their reasoning for acting the way they do
Talking about the lovable attributes of the character 
A discussion of whether they are redeemed by the end of the story
Conclusions about what the character teaches us through their faults 


Risks & Challenges
I understand that you may have some qualms about contributing to something that will fund an unpublished, young author. But you have my word I will do NONE of the following:

Spend the money donated on a wild shopping spree to Sephora (though the pretty signs may tempt me)
Waste my time watching Keeping up with the Kardashians rather than writing because a) I am too damn stubborn about finishing this novel and b) I can't freaking stand those girls
Go on a spur-of-the-moment trip to Guam because it's a cool-sounding name for a place 
Not finish this amazing book

 
If you're strapped for cash but still want to help make "The Heroine Standard" a reality, here's how you can help.

Just because you can't financially support the cause doesn't mean you can't help out!


Remember that $1 CAN make a HUGE difference. No matter how small the donations are, they add up. I promise you that $1 means so much more than you could ever know.
Post about my book on your social media! Get talking about this work and get the word out!
If you know someone who might be able to lend a hand in any way, please direct them to me! I could use all the support I can get!

And last but absolutely not least,
If you want my book but genuinely cannot afford a donation, shoot an email to inquiriesforlena@gmail.com and I will put you on a list to receive a copy funded by contributions of $20 or more 
I want this book to reach everyone it can and hopefully, it can reach you.
Thank you SO MUCH for all your help and contributions. Without you, this would not be possible. 
Please, share this campaign.

story:
Contraband is Charleston, West Virginia’s new alternative magazine highlighting the opinions and interests of people in this area. We do our best to create an unbiased, wide reaching showcase of the things that should be reported and aren’t. We try to give news on what’s happening, give people a voice to express how they feel or what they’re proud of, and show people things about their city that they otherwise wouldn’t know.

Everything in our magazine is specifically local, small business related, progressive, healthy, or positive. We want someone to pick up an issue of Contraband and be reminded why this area is great. From local events to new music and ideas, we want to be the place you go to find out what you should be paying attention to.

Our content is created by locals. No article will be ignored. If you have something you want to say, chances are there is someone who either agrees with you, or would love to talk about it. We want to help spark that conversation. And have hella fun while doing it.

The magazine is always, and will always be, free. We want EVERYONE to be able to read our magazine. This means, however, that the way we pay for printing and merchandise is through subscriptions, advertising, and now this fundraiser. We need the support of our community to help get this project off the ground and become everything it can be!

story:
Who we are!

Hello and welcome to our crowdfunding campaign!

We are a new small publishing group that specializes in light novels. Specifically, creating original English light novels for readers to enjoy!

Having 3 successfully published OELN(original English light novel) ‘s under our belt which have each held 4.5 to 5 star ratings on both Amazon and goodreads, we are looking to grow and publish works from other authors to bring readers more quality stories!

Under the Novel Horizon's name we aim to bring great stories and the highest quality physical print into your hands.

You can support us knowing that excellent is always our top priority.

Our successful released titles include:

  • One-Two-Five Volume 1 Action/Fantasy/Isekai
  • One-Two-Five Volume 2  Action/Fantasy/Isekai
  • Rise of the Hunters Volume 1 Sci-fi/Supernatural 

Some reviews:

Website

Twitter

Facebook

About this Campaign 

This campaign is designed to help us release our Fall Line-up of Light novels. This is a total of 5 books that we plan to release by December of 2020 with our latest projection being for January of 2021. Which would take roughly 20,000$ USD at the bare minimum for all 5 titles. We optimally want to raise about 32,000 USD though.

Because of the vast variety of rewards though, instead of creating a bunch of rewards and clogging up the page with all the possible combinations, we are offering a "A la cart" menu where backers can fully customize their reward packages. 

Making full use of Indiegogo's system, the "featured" perk is the menu with all our items available as add-on's. 

Limited Edition Merchandise Changes: 

We've received alot of interest regarding our Limited Edition hardcover books in the past. 

Previously, we printed a set amount of these, which left other backers unable to purchase them once they "sold out". 

For this campaign, we want to experiment with instead making these Limited Edition hardcovers a crowdfunding exclusive item. Where we will print the exact amount backers ordered and no more after, effectively leaving them OOP once this campaign ends.

We hope this way, everyone can get the rewards they want while not taking away the value or charm of owning a Limited Edition item. 

Novel Formats

Our Standard Edition novels will be printed in a 5x7 inch book format, featuring multiple black and white illustrations with a full color cover. Back will include some minor art and synopsis information. 

Limited Edition novels will be printed in a 5x8 inch book format, featuring alternate cover art for the front and back in full color. These are also printed as Hardcover copies among a few other fun changes. These will not be reprinted after this campaign.

 

E-books will be in the standard PDF and EPUB formats. 

Novel Lineup

Note: In-development alternate cover/two-page insert

Note: Redesign in progress

 

Other Merchandise

One-Two-Five: Daphne 1/7 Scale figure

Note: Alpha prototype - Unpainted - In Progress

For other merchandise from our past volumes.

Please visit our site's marketplace! 

As the campaign continues, there is a chance we will release new items like posters or postcards! 

The Impact

By helping us raise the amount we need, you not only get 1st edition high quality books, but also let us work toward becoming bigger and better publishers. That way we can continue spreading quality stories and bringing new authors whose stories would otherwise could unnoticed, into public light!

OELN's are often viewed with alot of scrutiny with a stigma of lacking both quality artwise and story wise, riddled with errors and being more "fanwork" than true pieces of literature. We want your help to shatter that perception. Starting here from step one. 

Risks & Challenges

We've done this three times before. 

The first time was rough. The second was tedious, by the third we've gotten our work almost down pat. We don't see any troubles for these five titles except the possibility of delays of final manuscripts from the Authors but we have all our team ready to quickly and efficiently deliver with the highest quality. 

Other Ways You Can Help

The great things about books is that they last forever! 

If you can't support now, feel free to share our campaign! Every little bit helps and if we reach our goal, in the future you'll be able to order the book you missed now! Nothing lost!

story:
Brief Summary

I am a Nigerian Self-help writer and social activist. He is the founder of Initiative for African Citizens (IAC), a nongovernmental organization that advocates for youth participation in governance and decision making processes in Africa.

I want to use this medium to receive financial aid for the advancement of my writing career. With an advanced and accurate career pursuit, the world can benefit from ones input to the development of world economy; just from the little start.

The Project's Budget

  • I am raising $50,000 to enable me reach some financial decisions for the advancement of my career.
  • I am someone from a humble background; a background such that people hardly believe we would survive! I'm glad for who I am and becoming today. I am in love with writing, social activisting, grassroots leadership and everything that supports unity and humanitarian services. I founded a novel organization known as Initiative for African Citizens (IAC), and it needs support to grow.
  • My aim is to establish centers where young aspiring writers can be trained, and nurtured, and as well, help them publish their works. I will use the fund to support lives in my very capacity especially, by providing some of the needed COVID-19 relief materials for people in my locality.

The Impact

This champaign aims at achieving the following:

  • Encourage entrepreneurship and creates avenue for skills development.
  • In my little capacity, I was able to nurture some number of youths through my NGO and trained them to be self-employed, by proven to them the importance of their unutilized skills and talents. Good number of them come to me for advice, mentorship and other assistance. I believe that this fund will help in a very long to expanding what I love doing.
  • I cannot achieve all that I had mentioned above without you. You're the reason why my vision and career will affect thousands of people in the future. You're my support in this journey of career expansion and value creation. Thank you.

Risks & Challenges

There would be Rick's and challenges during this period of career expansion and value creation, but I will always overcome them.

  • I am ever learning to overcome anything that may come my ways. I'm patient and listens to advice. I have young ones that look up to me for mentorship and guidance, I will not fail them. If I give up on my vision and career because of challenges, it didn't show that I can lead. I'm expecting challenges and as well, preparing to overcome them.
  • I have mentors who I will always run to for advice, I have books that strengthen fable minds, I will read them. I believe in my own ways of handling issues and I can make the right decisions to apply the exit strategy. More importantly, I have a God who always strengthens my spirit.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help me spread this campaign to reach everyone. Tell them to support and donate for this project.
  • Please, tell them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Introduction 

We love the idea of free little libraries and are working to bring the magic of 24/7 free books to downtown Pullman.    We are currently in the process of getting approval from the City of Pullman to place a little free library on public grounds.  
This Little Free Library will offer a way to share good things to read—favorite books from your childhood or books you would recommend to friends; books that teach, intrigue and engage you. All of us can help by keeping this collection stocked with good reading material. 
Whose library is this? It belongs to everybody -- neighbors, friends, and people we don’t even know yet. Anyone can use it. That’s why we want to take care of it. 
Take a book. If you see something you would like to read, take it. Look inside and see who gave it; who else has read it. 
Share it. Return it to any Little Library or pass it on to a friend. 
Give books. Leave notes in them. Be a friend of all libraries by helping any way you can. Pay it Forward! 

What We Need

Funding will go towards the following items for each little free library (number of libraries dependent on level of funding): 
  • $34.95 registration fee through the Little Free Library National Organization.
  • Materials to construct the Little Free Library (we will try to use as many reusable materials as possible)
  • Small solar panel and battery to support a light for dusk/night use and to power the Library Box. 
  • $50 to support materials for a Library Box, http://librarybox.us/.  Library box will support eBooks at the free little library.  Ebooks will be available through any WiFi capable device. 

The Impact

The Little Free Libraries in Pullman will be place along the Pullman Loop Trail (with approval of the City) for the the maximum foot/bicycle traffic (and use).  Physical and electronic books will be freely available for the community.  

Based on reports from stewards, the average Little Library rotates through 300 books per year (some go through thousands)!

Are people actually stopping by Little Libraries and meeting their neighbors? Judge for yourself. This amazing 5-minute video, taken over the span of several months in 2014, showcases the funny and surprising visitors to one Little Library in British Columbia, Canada.


Risks & Challenges

 “Won’t someone vandalize our Little Library?” you ask. 

The answer is…maybe, but probably not. With thousands of Libraries around the world, here is what we have learned. In the beginning, we were testing the limits. Millions of people were exposed to Little Libraries. The total number of Little Libraries damaged per year? Lower than .01%. But you can lower the odds even more. 

For more information on vandalism and little libraries:  http://littlefreelibrary.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/VandalismLFL.pdf

To address this risk the little free library will be placed in a very public location, to minimize vandalism.   Also the stewards frequent the area and will be able check up on the little library.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Use the little free library! 
  • Spread the word that a little free library will be coming to Pullman. 
  • Donate books to the organizers,  https://pullmanfreelittlelibrary.wordpress.com

story:
English Version | French Version  | Spanish Version 

"Morti di CIE - storie di ordinaria detenzione amministrativa" è un progetto autonomo e indipendente. 

Siamo studiosi ed esperti delle tematiche del diritto dell'immigrazione, antropologi,  sociologi, associazioni, fotografi, videomakers, giornalisti, grafici e fumettisti, tutti impegnati nell'attività per la tutela dei diritti umani che hanno deciso di mettere a disposizione di questo progetto le loro conoscenze ed esperienze per raccontare, attraverso le immagini e le parole, verità dimenticate o nascoste.   

Ci siamo uniti per riuscire a realizzare insieme questo progetto d'inchiesta, investendo liberamente le nostre risorse personali, perché siamo convinti che soltanto grazie al lavoro di cooperazione tra diverse identità si possa arrivare a raggiungere il nostro obiettivo: diffondere la verità semplicemente raccontando i fatti affinché si realizzi un contributo di informazioni veritiero ed indipendente. 

Il progetto è interamente autofinanziato, riteniamo abbia un valore sociale e desideriamo condividere con chi vedrà il nostro lavoro tutto ciò che impareremo, analizzeremo, scopriremo, conosceremo. Abbiamo quindi deciso di cercare persone che abbiano voglia di sostenerci attraverso il crowdfunding. Per questo anche voi che sosterrete economicamente la campagna sarete parte dell'inchiesta. 

Nel momento in cui "Morti di CIE- storie di ordinaria detenzione amministrativa" vedrà la luce sarà merito di tutti noi e di tutti voi produttori dal basso! 

Dall’approvazione della Legge 40/1998, meglio conosciuta come Legge Turco-Napolitano passando per la Bossi-Fini del 2002, abbiamo imparato a conoscere il fenomeno dell’internamento dei migranti in strutture di detenzione per "clandestini", appositi centri di identificazione ed espulsione.

La detenzione amministrativa è una vera e propria privazione della libertà personale alla quale i migranti irregolari in attesa di allontanamento ed espulsione vengono sottoposti a seguito di una violazione amministrativa come, ad esempio, la mancanza del permesso di soggiorno. 

Da allora, migliaia sono state le persone rinchiuse dentro questi centri, e molti hanno visto la fine della loro esistenza proprio lì dentro. Molti sono stati dimenticati, e molti altri non hanno nemmeno fatto notizia. Crediamo quindi sia necessario ridare un nome e un volto a queste persone pensando che dietro ogni caso ci sia una dignità negata e storia di vita umana da raccontare.

                                          Il progetto finale si compone di:

  1. Un documento cartaceo (libro)
  2. Un documento elettronico (eBook)
  3. Materiale video
  4. Materiale fotografico 
  5. Cofanetto dvd
  6. Un fumetto
  7. Un sito internet 
  8. Materiale promozionale

Nella speranza di non continuare a contare altri morti, la nostra intenzione è far luce sui decessi avvenuti, parlare di queste morti e entrare nel dettaglio dei fatti, studiando i documenti per raccontarli, cercando di capire i perché è le cause dei decessi, ma soprattutto, raccontando come lo Stato, attraverso i giudici e i Pubblici Ministeri, si è pronunciato a seguito di questi fatti. 

Non sentendoci ispirati da quanti cercano di dare consiglio alla Magistratura nel giudizio di questi episodi, non reclamiamo il desiderio di sostituirci alle Procure della Repubblica o a quanti invocano altre finalità giustizialiste. Preferiamo esprimerci, secondo le modalità libere che qualificano ognuno, per fornire e condividere le nostre competenze invece che rimanere spettatori passivi e testimoni omertosi di una storia in corso. 

Dovrebbe interessare chiunque non abbia voglia di girare la testa per non guardare.

  • Costi generali di realizzazione dell’inchiesta (acquisto dominio, campagna crowdfunding, studio, spostamenti e realizzazione del cartaceo, del documento elettronico, traduzioni, produzione video e post-produzione)
  • Costi di comunicazione 
  • Costi di distribuzione
  • Pecks e premi

COME POSSO FARE A DARE IL MIO CONTRIBUTO?

Questo coraggioso atto di solidarietà e testimonianza ha bisogno del tuo aiuto e del tuo sostegno per non essere vanificato dalla mancanza di risorse economiche. Non importa quanto tu possa contribuire, fai una donazione. Siamo certi che lo farai in base ad una scelta ed alle tue possibilità.

NON PUOI DARE UN AIUTO ECONOMICO?

Non preoccuparti, se vorrai potrai condividere questa campagna per aiutarci a trovare un donatore, organizzare una raccolta fondi o un'iniziativa di diffusione dell'inchiesta. Non esitare a contattarci a mortidicie@gmail.org

A daring inquiry about migrants' deaths in Italian administrative detention centers. 

"Cause of Death: CIE (Centers for Identification and Expulsion) –Stories of ordinary administrative detention" is an autonomous and independent project. 
Our team is composed by human rights activists with a range of different competences ranging from Immigration Law experts and researchers, anthropologists, sociologits, members of civil society associations, photographers, videomakers, journalists, graphic designers and cartoonists. We have decided to put together our knowledge and expertise to report, through images and words, forgotten and hidden truths. We have teamed up to realize this inquiry -investing our strengths and resources – because we believe that only through cooperation between individuals with different backgrounds it is possible to make independent information. 
The inquiry - which we believe to have an important social value - is entirely self-financed, and thus necessarily relies on the support of the public. This is why we are calling out to all of you to join our project by supporting us through crowdfunding. 
When "Cause of Death: CIE – Stories of ordinary administrative detention" will come into being it will be thanks to all of us and all of you, crowdfunders!

Since the approval of Law n. 40/1998 (better known as “Turco-Napolitano” Law) and the subsequent Bossi-Fini Law of 2002, migrant detention has become a reality. With special centers intended for the identification and expulsion of “irregular migrants” being established all over the country. Those centers, initially known as Centers for Temporary Permanence (1998-2008), are now called CIE.

Administrative detention is a form of personal liberty deprivation to which irregular migrants waiting for expulsion are subjected, following an administrative violation (e.g., the non-possession of a residence permit).

Since 1998, thousands of people have been detained inside these centers and many of them have lost their lives there. Many of those deaths have been entirely forgotten, not even making news headlines. For this reason, it is crucially important for us to give a name and a face to these forgotten people, because behind each case there lies a story of denied dignity and a human life to be narrated.


                                         The final project will consist of:

1. A book

2. An e-book

3. Visual production

4. Photos

5.  Dvd box set

6. Comic book

7. Web site

8. Promotional material.


Our intention is to shed light on every single case of death inside the Italian detention centers for irregular migrants. The investigation is aimed at analyzing how the Italian courts appraised and judged each legal case, and if anybody has been found guilty for these deaths.Our intent is not to pursue justice in courtrooms nor to replace public prosecutors, but rather to get a detailed knowledge of the facts, through the study of the court proceedings and the direct testimonies of those who have lived those moments firsthand in order to inform the public.

Above all, we want to account if and how the State, through its judges and public prosecutors’ Offices, took a stand on these episodes. We believe it is necessary to act instead of remaining passive spectators or accomplice witnesses of these stories.

We can no longer look away, pretending this is not happening.

Une enquête courageuse sur les décès de migrants détenus dans les centres de détention administrative italiens.

À Propos de nous

 « Cause de décès : CIE (Centres d'Identification et d'Expulsion) – Histories d'ordinaire détention administrative » c'est un projet autonome et indépendant. 

Notre équipe est composée de militants des droits humains avec une gamme de compétences différentes allant d'experts en droit des migrations, à chercheurs, anthropologues, membres d'associations de la société civile, en passant par photographes, vidéastes, journalistes, graphistes et dessinateurs. Nous avons décidé de rassembler notre expertise et nos connaissances pour raconter en mots et en images des vérités oubliées et cachées. Nous nous sommes associés pour réaliser la présente enquête – en investissant nos forces et nos ressources – parce que nous croyons que c'est seulement par la coopération entre des individus d'horizon différents qu'il est possible d'offrir une information libre et indépendante. L'enquête – laquelle nous croyons avoir une valeur sociale importante – est entièrement autofinancée, et, donc, compte sur le soutien du public. Voilà pourquoi nous vous demandons de nous aider à rendre ce projet possible, en nous soutenant à travers le crowdfunding. 

Lorsque « Cause de décès : CIE – Histories d'ordinaire détention administrative » verra le jour ce sera grâce à nous tous et à vous tous, crowdfunders !

Pourquoi cette enquête ?

Depuis l'approbation de la Loi n. 40/1998 (mieux connu sous le nom de « Turco-Napolitano » Loi) et de la Loi n. 189/2002 (Loi Bossi-Fini), la détention des migrants est devenu une réalité. Des centres spéciaux destinés à l'identification et l'expulsion des « migrants irréguliers « ont été établis dans tout le pays. Les centres, initialement connus sous le nom de Centres de Permanence Temporaire (1998-2008), sont maintenant appelés CIE. 

La détention administrative est une forme de privation de liberté à laquelle sont soumis les migrants irréguliers en attente d'expulsion, suite à une infraction administrative (par exemple, l'absence de possession d'un permis de résidence). Depuis 1998, des milliers de personnes ont été détenues dans ces centres, et beaucoup d'entre elles y ont perdu la vie. Beaucoup de ces décès ont été complètement oubliés. 

C'est pour cette raison qu'il est crucial pour nous de redonner un nom et un visage à ces personnes oubliées, parce que derrière chaque cas se cache une histoire de dignité refusée et une vie humaine qui mérite d'être racontée.

                Qu'est ce que nous voulons faire?

 Le projet final sera composé de :

 - Un livre ;

- Un e-Book ;

- Production visuelle ;

- Photos ;

 - Coffret DVD ;

- Bande dessinée ;

- Site web ;

 - Matériel promotionnel ;

De quoi s'agit-il et pourquoi devrais-je m'en soucier ?

 Notre intention est de faire la lumière sur tous les cas de décès dans les centres de détention pour migrants irréguliers en Italie. L'enquête vise à analyser la façon dont les tribunaux italiens ont évalué et jugé chaque cas juridique, et si quelqu'un a été jugé coupable de ces décès. Notre intention n'est pas de rétablir la justice dans les salles d'audience, ni de remplacer les procureurs, mais plutôt d'obtenir une connaissance détaillée des faits, à travers l'étude des poursuites judiciaires et les témoignages directs de ceux qui ont vécu les événements de première main afin d'informer le public. Surtout, nous voulons expliquer si et comment l' 'État, à travers ses juges et les bureaux des procureurs, a pris une position sur ces épisodes. Nous croyons qu'il est nécessaire d'agir au lieu de rester des spectateurs passifs ou témoins complices de ces histoires. Nous ne pouvons plus détourner le regard et prétendre qu'il ne se passe rien.

QUIÉNES SOMOS?

MUERTOS DE CIE- "Historias de ordinario arresto administrativo" es un proyecto autònomo e independiente.

Somos un grupo de estudiantes y profesionales,expertos en el tema del Derecho de la Inmigraciòn, Antropòlogos, asociaciones, fotògrafos, videomakers, periodistas, gàficos y dibujantes, todos volcados en el activismo por la Tutela de los Derechos Humanos que hemos decidido poner a disposiciòn de este proyecto nuestro conocimiento y experiencia para poder contar, a travès de imàgenes y palabras, verdades olvidadas o escondidas.

Nos hemos reunido para juntos dar vida a este proyecto de investigaciòn, aportando libremente nuestros recursos personales.Porque es nuestra convicciòn que solo gracias a un trabajo de cooperaciòn entre diversas identidades sea posible alcanzar nuestro objetivo: difundir la verdad de los hechos narràndolos, para contribuir asì a la difusiòn de una informaciòn veraz e independiente.

El Proyecto es autofinanciado en su totalidad. Creemos en su alto valor social y quisièramos compartir con todos aquellos que nos seguiràn todo lo que aprehenderemos, analizaremos, descubriremos, conoceremos.

Hemos decidido hacer apelo a aquellos que tengan ganas de sostenernos a travès del crowdfonding.Por ello aquellos de vosotros que sostendràn econòmicamente nuestra campana entrarèis a formar parte del Proyecto.

El dìa en que Muertos de CEI-"Historia de ordinario arresto administrativo" verà la luz,serà mèrito de todos .

    POR QUÉ ESTE TRABAJO INVESTIGATIVO?

Desde la aparicòn de la ley 40/1998, màs conocida como ley Turco-Napolitano, pasando por la Bossi-Fini del 2002,hemos constatado la difusiòn del fenòmeno de la reclusiòn de los inmigrantes en estructuras creadas aposta para detener a los "clandestinos"en espera de su identificaciòn y posterior expulsiòn.

El Arresto Administrativo es una absoluta privaciòn de la libertad individual a la cual son sometidos los inmigrantes irregulares a la espera de ser expulsados ,consecuencia de una violaciòn administrativa como es la falta del permiso de residencia.

Desde entonces miles de personas han sido recluìdas en estos centros y muchos han visto dentro de estos muros el final de sus vidas.Muchos han sido olvidados y otros tantos siquiera han sido noticia.

Creemos que sea necesario darle un nombre y un rostro a estas personas, porque estamos seguros de que tras cada uno de estos casos se esconde una dignidad negada y una historia humana que va contada.

No nos sentimos impulsados por aquellos que intentan dar consejos al Cuerpo de Abogados del Estado a la luz de estos episodios, no deseamos ni pedimos sustituirnos a los Tribunales de La Repùblica ni somos eco de quiènes invocan una finalidad justiciera.Preferimos expresarnos segùn la modalidad profesional que nos caracteriza para asì aportar y compartir nuestros conocimientos en vez de ser espectadores pasivos y testigos mudos.

Tendrìa que interesar a todos los que no desean girar la cabeza para no ver.

"Morti di CIE - storie di ordinaria detenzione amministrativa" è un progetto autonomo e indipendente. 
Siamo studiosi ed esperti delle tematiche del diritto dell'immigrazione, antropologi,  sociologi, associazioni, fotografi, videomakers, giornalisti, grafici e fumettisti, tutti impegnati nell'attività per la tutela dei diritti umani che hanno deciso di mettere a disposizione di questo progetto le loro conoscenze ed esperienze per raccontare, attraverso le immagini e le parole, verità dimenticate o nascoste.   
Ci siamo uniti per riuscire a realizzare insieme questo progetto d'inchiesta, investendo liberamente le nostre risorse personali, perché siamo convinti che soltanto grazie al lavoro di cooperazione tra diverse identità si possa arrivare a raggiungere il nostro obiettivo: diffondere la verità semplicemente raccontando i fatti affinché si realizzi un contributo di informazioni veritiero ed indipendente. 
Il progetto è interamente autofinanziato, riteniamo abbia un valore sociale e desideriamo condividere con chi vedrà il nostro lavoro tutto ciò che impareremo, analizzeremo, scopriremo, conosceremo. Abbiamo quindi deciso di cercare persone che abbiano voglia di sostenerci attraverso il crowdfunding. Per questo anche voi che sosterrete economicamente la campagna sarete parte dell'inchiesta. 
Nel momento in cui "Morti di CIE- storie di ordinaria detenzione amministrativa" vedrà la luce sarà merito di tutti noi e di tutti voi produttori dal basso! 


Dall’approvazione della Legge 40/1998, meglio conosciuta come Legge Turco-Napolitano passando per la Bossi-Fini del 2002, abbiamo imparato a conoscere il fenomeno dell’internamento dei migranti in strutture di detenzione per "clandestini", appositi centri di identificazione ed espulsione.
La detenzione amministrativa è una vera e propria privazione della libertà personale alla quale i migranti irregolari in attesa di allontanamento ed espulsione vengono sottoposti a seguito di una violazione amministrativa come, ad esempio, la mancanza del permesso di soggiorno. 
Da allora, migliaia sono state le persone rinchiuse dentro questi centri, e molti hanno visto la fine della loro esistenza proprio lì dentro. Molti sono stati dimenticati, e molti altri non hanno nemmeno fatto notizia. Crediamo quindi sia necessario ridare un nome e un volto a queste persone pensando che dietro ogni caso ci sia una dignità negata e storia di vita umana da raccontare.


                                          Il progetto finale si compone di:

Un documento cartaceo (libro)
Un documento elettronico (eBook)
Materiale video
Materiale fotografico 
Cofanetto dvd
Un fumetto

Un sito internet 
Materiale promozionale






Nella speranza di non continuare a contare altri morti, la nostra intenzione è far luce sui decessi avvenuti, parlare di queste morti e entrare nel dettaglio dei fatti, studiando i documenti per raccontarli, cercando di capire i perché è le cause dei decessi, ma soprattutto, raccontando come lo Stato, attraverso i giudici e i Pubblici Ministeri, si è pronunciato a seguito di questi fatti. 
Non sentendoci ispirati da quanti cercano di dare consiglio alla Magistratura nel giudizio di questi episodi, non reclamiamo il desiderio di sostituirci alle Procure della Repubblica o a quanti invocano altre finalità giustizialiste. Preferiamo esprimerci, secondo le modalità libere che qualificano ognuno, per fornire e condividere le nostre competenze invece che rimanere spettatori passivi e testimoni omertosi di una storia in corso. 
Dovrebbe interessare chiunque non abbia voglia di girare la testa per non guardare.

Une enquête courageuse sur les décès de migrants détenus dans les centres de détention administrative italiens.
À Propos de nous
 « Cause de décès : CIE (Centres d'Identification et d'Expulsion) – Histories d'ordinaire détention administrative » c'est un projet autonome et indépendant. 
Notre équipe est composée de militants des droits humains avec une gamme de compétences différentes allant d'experts en droit des migrations, à chercheurs, anthropologues, membres d'associations de la société civile, en passant par photographes, vidéastes, journalistes, graphistes et dessinateurs. Nous avons décidé de rassembler notre expertise et nos connaissances pour raconter en mots et en images des vérités oubliées et cachées. Nous nous sommes associés pour réaliser la présente enquête – en investissant nos forces et nos ressources – parce que nous croyons que c'est seulement par la coopération entre des individus d'horizon différents qu'il est possible d'offrir une information libre et indépendante. L'enquête – laquelle nous croyons avoir une valeur sociale importante – est entièrement autofinancée, et, donc, compte sur le soutien du public. Voilà pourquoi nous vous demandons de nous aider à rendre ce projet possible, en nous soutenant à travers le crowdfunding. 
Lorsque « Cause de décès : CIE – Histories d'ordinaire détention administrative » verra le jour ce sera grâce à nous tous et à vous tous, crowdfunders !
Pourquoi cette enquête ?
Depuis l'approbation de la Loi n. 40/1998 (mieux connu sous le nom de « Turco-Napolitano » Loi) et de la Loi n. 189/2002 (Loi Bossi-Fini), la détention des migrants est devenu une réalité. Des centres spéciaux destinés à l'identification et l'expulsion des « migrants irréguliers « ont été établis dans tout le pays. Les centres, initialement connus sous le nom de Centres de Permanence Temporaire (1998-2008), sont maintenant appelés CIE. 
La détention administrative est une forme de privation de liberté à laquelle sont soumis les migrants irréguliers en attente d'expulsion, suite à une infraction administrative (par exemple, l'absence de possession d'un permis de résidence). Depuis 1998, des milliers de personnes ont été détenues dans ces centres, et beaucoup d'entre elles y ont perdu la vie. Beaucoup de ces décès ont été complètement oubliés. 
C'est pour cette raison qu'il est crucial pour nous de redonner un nom et un visage à ces personnes oubliées, parce que derrière chaque cas se cache une histoire de dignité refusée et une vie humaine qui mérite d'être racontée.
                Qu'est ce que nous voulons faire?
 Le projet final sera composé de :
 - Un livre ;
- Un e-Book ;
- Production visuelle ;
- Photos ;
 - Coffret DVD ;
- Bande dessinée ;
- Site web ;
 - Matériel promotionnel ;

De quoi s'agit-il et pourquoi devrais-je m'en soucier ?
 Notre intention est de faire la lumière sur tous les cas de décès dans les centres de détention pour migrants irréguliers en Italie. L'enquête vise à analyser la façon dont les tribunaux italiens ont évalué et jugé chaque cas juridique, et si quelqu'un a été jugé coupable de ces décès. Notre intention n'est pas de rétablir la justice dans les salles d'audience, ni de remplacer les procureurs, mais plutôt d'obtenir une connaissance détaillée des faits, à travers l'étude des poursuites judiciaires et les témoignages directs de ceux qui ont vécu les événements de première main afin d'informer le public. Surtout, nous voulons expliquer si et comment l' 'État, à travers ses juges et les bureaux des procureurs, a pris une position sur ces épisodes. Nous croyons qu'il est nécessaire d'agir au lieu de rester des spectateurs passifs ou témoins complices de ces histoires. Nous ne pouvons plus détourner le regard et prétendre qu'il ne se passe rien.
Coûts du projet
Cette étude est à but non lucratif, et tous les membres de notre équipe travaillent sur une base volontaire. Malgré ça, il y a des coûts restant à couvrir, c'est pourquoi nous sollicitons votre aide et votre soutien. Ces coûts sont dus à :
- Dépenses de l'enquête (achat d'un domain; campagne de crowdfunding ; recherche ; voyages ; production du livre ; production ebook ; traductions ; vidéos ; post-production) ;
- Les coûts des activités de communication ;
- Les coûts de distribution ;
- Pecks et récompenses ;
Comment pouvez-vous contribuer ?
Pour réaliser cet ambitieux travail, nous avons besoin de votre aide et de votre soutien de sorte qu'il ne se transforme pas en un effort vain. Tout ce que vous pouvez faire est vraiment apprécié.
Que faire si vous ne pouvez pas faire de don ?
Ne vous inquiétez pas, si vous voulez, vous pouvez partager cette campagne pour nous aider à trouver des donateurs, organiser un événement destiné à la collecte de fonds ou une initiative pour promouvoir le projet. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter à mortidicie@gmail.com
Comment pouvez-vous rester à l'écoute de ce que nous faisons et où va l'argent ?
Vous pouvez nous suivre sur : http://www.mortidicie.org
Nous posterons des vidéos, des bandes dessinées, des photos et des nouvelles tous les mois pour vous raconter les étapes spéciales de ce voyage. Et maintenant, jetez un coup d'œil à: http://www.mortidicie.org.

QUIÉNES SOMOS?
MUERTOS DE CIE- "Historias de ordinario arresto administrativo" es un proyecto autònomo e independiente.
Somos un grupo de estudiantes y profesionales,expertos en el tema del Derecho de la Inmigraciòn, Antropòlogos, asociaciones, fotògrafos, videomakers, periodistas, gàficos y dibujantes, todos volcados en el activismo por la Tutela de los Derechos Humanos que hemos decidido poner a disposiciòn de este proyecto nuestro conocimiento y experiencia para poder contar, a travès de imàgenes y palabras, verdades olvidadas o escondidas.


Nos hemos reunido para juntos dar vida a este proyecto de investigaciòn, aportando libremente nuestros recursos personales.Porque es nuestra convicciòn que solo gracias a un trabajo de cooperaciòn entre diversas identidades sea posible alcanzar nuestro objetivo: difundir la verdad de los hechos narràndolos, para contribuir asì a la difusiòn de una informaciòn veraz e independiente.


El Proyecto es autofinanciado en su totalidad. Creemos en su alto valor social y quisièramos compartir con todos aquellos que nos seguiràn todo lo que aprehenderemos, analizaremos, descubriremos, conoceremos.
Hemos decidido hacer apelo a aquellos que tengan ganas de sostenernos a travès del crowdfonding.Por ello aquellos de vosotros que sostendràn econòmicamente nuestra campana entrarèis a formar parte del Proyecto.
El dìa en que Muertos de CEI-"Historia de ordinario arresto administrativo" verà la luz,serà mèrito de todos .
    POR QUÉ ESTE TRABAJO INVESTIGATIVO?
Desde la aparicòn de la ley 40/1998, màs conocida como ley Turco-Napolitano, pasando por la Bossi-Fini del 2002,hemos constatado la difusiòn del fenòmeno de la reclusiòn de los inmigrantes en estructuras creadas aposta para detener a los "clandestinos"en espera de su identificaciòn y posterior expulsiòn.
El Arresto Administrativo es una absoluta privaciòn de la libertad individual a la cual son sometidos los inmigrantes irregulares a la espera de ser expulsados ,consecuencia de una violaciòn administrativa como es la falta del permiso de residencia.
Desde entonces miles de personas han sido recluìdas en estos centros y muchos han visto dentro de estos muros el final de sus vidas.Muchos han sido olvidados y otros tantos siquiera han sido noticia.
Creemos que sea necesario darle un nombre y un rostro a estas personas, porque estamos seguros de que tras cada uno de estos casos se esconde una dignidad negada y una historia humana que va contada. 




               EN QUÉ CONSISTE NUESTRO PROYECTO?
Documento impreso-libro.
Documento electrònico-ebook
Material videogràfico
Material fotogràfico
Baùl dvd
Un comik
Un sito internet
Material de promociòn.




    DE QUÉ SE TRATA Y POR QUÉ DEBERìA INTERESARME?


Con la esperanza de no tener que seguir contando màs muertes, nuestro deseo es centrar la atenciòn sobre las defunciones registradas.Hablar de estas muertes y centrarnos en el debate de los hechos,estudiando los documentos existentes para referirlos, intentando entender el còmo y el por què de estas muertes, pero sobre todo, refiriendo còmo el Estado, a travès de sus Jueces y Fiscales se ha pronunciado sobre tales hechos.
No nos sentimos impulsados por aquellos que intentan dar consejos al Cuerpo de Abogados del Estado a la luz de estos episodios, no deseamos ni pedimos sustituirnos a los Tribunales de La Repùblica ni somos eco de quiènes invocan una finalidad justiciera.Preferimos expresarnos segùn la modalidad profesional que nos caracteriza para asì aportar y compartir nuestros conocimientos en vez de ser espectadores pasivos y testigos mudos.
Tendrìa que interesar a todos los que no desean girar la cabeza para no ver.




    CUàNTO CUESTA NUESTRO PROYECTO


Los gastos generales derivan del material usado para la realizaciòn del trabajo investigativo( campana crowdfunding,estudio,desplazamientos y realizaciòn de los documentos impresos,traducciones,producciòn de videos y post-producciòn).
Gastos de comunicacòn y difusiòn.Pecks y premios.




  CòMO PUEDO CONTRIBUIR

No te preocupes,si lo deseas podràs condividir esta
iniciativa para ayudar a encontrar un financiador,organizar recogida de fondos o una campana para la difusiòn del proyecto.No dudes en ponerte en contacto con nostros tramite:
mortidicie@gmail.org




  CòMO PUEDO MANTENERME INFORMADO SOBRE LO QUE ESTàIS HACIENDO Y ADòNDE VAN DESTINADOS LOS FONDOS RECOGIDOS


Podràs seguirnos a travès de nuestros canales de difusiòn.Visita nuestro sito web  http://www.mortidicie.org
Cada mes publicamos nuevos videos,comiks o fotografìas a travès de los cuales contamos paso a paso este viaje especial. Empieza por mirar enseguida online: Storie

story:
About

Hi everybody, my name is Chris and I’m a Bible believing, spiritual foodie with a passion for children’s stories, books or film.  By way of education, I am trained in the way of the financial samurai (I have a degree in finance) but my pen keeps telling me I’m a wordsmith.  If you want to know about me, first things first, I have a relationship with Jesus and He directs my steps.  I’ve written several children’s books and each one is inspired by God.  My hope is that these books help you and your children think about God in an entertaining fashion.  Other than that, I’m a master of ideation.  Seriously, I have more ideas than I know what to do with…most of them are viable.  Lastly, if we ever cross paths, let me warn you, I am a quiet man.  A very, very quiet man; introvert is an understatement.  I do in fact speak, but it’s a struggle.  All in all, I just want to write stories that captivate the mind and transport you to your own personal dreamspace.

  • My campaign is to raise $2,500 to illustrate and publish one of my first children’s books, Wings for a Day.  This is a product of my early penmanship, so its near and dear to my heart.
  • The contributors of this campaign are helping me to officially enter the ring as a children’s author.  Publishing Wings for a Day will help me gain credibility as a writer and establish my style.

What I Need

I’m seeking $2,500, and here’s where it will go:

  1. $1,500 for an Illustrator
  2. $750 to print 50-100 hard cover books
  3. $250 for platform/selling fees: ISBN number, Amazon, IndieGoGo, etc

Unfortunately, it’s a sad truth that I may not be able to raise the total funding amount.  Because this is a fixed campaign, if I fall short of my funding goal, all donations will be refunded to the contributors.

The Impact

  • Wings for a Day isn’t just children’s content slapped on a page.  It’s a story injected with truth and overlaid with prayer in an honest voice.  In my humble opinion, the world could really use some of that right about now.

Risks & Challenges

  • Every project has an assortment of challenges and constraints.  My most critical and, therefore, most risky assumption is that I can find a talented illustrator who can deliver illustrations in a format that’s consistent with my vision.  All that to say, I need a Rockstar.  Regardless of how challenging it may seem, I am confident that I will connect with the right person and he/she will illustrate the stuff of legend.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Let’s keep it real.  You may not be able to contribute financially, but you can help me in other ways.  Share my cause with your family and friends.  I already mentioned I’m a shy guy, so I could use all the help getting the word out that I can get.

story:
The Canadian Icons Project commemorates Canada’s Sesquicentennial year in 2017, chronicling our nations diversity, creativity, and achievements.

This enterprise is a photographic/multi media archive showcasing 150 of Canada’s most accomplished citizens in correspondence with Canada Day 2017.

When complete, this project will be a legacy for generations to come and an essential teaching tool for people of all ages who want to learn about the greatness of Canadians and Canada.

   I was born and raised in Canada, but my wife is an American – so I definitely spend a lot of time in both countries. Six years ago, my wife and I were visiting my sister-in-law at her home in the States. We started talking about one of our favorite shows, Star Trek and my sister-in-law insisted that Captain Kirk - William Shatner - was born in New York City. I told her, “No, William Shatner is Canadian, he was born in Montreal”. And she didn’t believe me! So I asked her, “What about Christopher Plummer?” To which my sister-in-law replied, “Oh well, he’s English”.

When I came back to Canada I started telling my friends about this story, thinking it would be funny. But, the majority of them didn’t know that these actors were Canadian either! I thought, if Canadians didn’t know that two of the most famous actors out there are Canadian - then I wonder how many Canadians are out there changing the world, that we just don’t know about either!

I was inspired to celebrate Canada and Canadians for our 150th Anniversary in 2017, by doing what I do best -  by taking their pictures, and filming interviews with these iconic Canadians- allowing them to tell their stories in their own words, and to share those stories with Canada and the rest of the world. 

· A hardcover portrait art book of the 150 Canadian Icons

· An interactive website with all of our photographs, interviews, and bios that will act as an archive of Canada

· 150 Interviews with 150 Canadian Icons that will be played on airline seat back monitors, and in Cinemas across the country

· Our website will also house the local Icons Project, a place where people can celebrate people that are Iconic in their own communities.

· A gallery exhibition launch party!

· For all of this to come together as one great celebration of Canada

Over the last 6 years we have photographed and interviewed over 100 notable Canadians in a variety of fields.

This has been with no outside funding at all.

Everyone working on the project has been donating their time to help us bring the project to where it stands today.

With your help we will be able to focus all of our efforts on getting this project done for the sesquicentennial in 2017. We are so close to reaching our goal of 150 Icons for 2017 - and your support can get us there! 


 A glossy hardcover art book, containing all of the photographs and stories of these Iconic Canadians. The book will be available in English & en Français. This book is our first goal because we want to give it as a gift to our generous contributors!

Either keep the book for yourself to enjoy or donate it to a school in your community for kids to learn all about the Canadians that are making a difference. Here's what we need to make that happen: 

· Design & print the book

· Retouch the Photos

· Writing/Translation

· Public Relations and Promotion



         If we exceed our initial goal, we can expand the Canadian Icons Project to be even more! 


At $500 000 - The website will house all 150 of the Icons photos, bios and video interviews, acting as an archive for all Canadians to use. You'll be able to learn more about the Icons by reading their bios, watching their video interviews and viewing galleries full of beautiful photos!



The Local Icons Project - We also want to inspire Canadians to get out there and celebrate the great people in their own communities, and share that with the rest of Canada. We’re creating an interactive, responsive website that will have all the tools that you would need to start your own “Canadian Icons Project” – right in your own community.




This Local Icons Project will give all Canadians the resources to share their local Icons on our website. Participants will be able to submit photographs, brief interviews and tell stories about people in their communities who are doing iconic deeds. If you have a community leader in your neighbourhood that's really changed things for the better, we'd like to be able to help you highlight them! Share their story with the rest of Canada on our website! Think of it as a national grassroots mentorship program - where Canadians from coast to coast can support and learn from each other's iconic contributions!



At $900 000 - We already have over 100 videos filmed and ready to be edited! The Icons in these videos explore Canada through their own perspective, as they talk about their careers, social issues, the past, present, and future of Canada. We need your support to get those first 100 videos ready for the big screen!



At $1 000 000 - Many of the Canadians we want to include in this project can’t come to our Toronto studio, so we have to go to them! We really want to get more French Canadians in our project, and that can only happen if we travel to Montreal! 



At $1  200 000 - Once we photograph and film interviews with the final 50 Icons, we will need to get those photos edited and videos cut and ready for the big screen too! Help us complete all of the videos for our project!



At $1 450 000 -  We already have all of the resources ready to do all of the editing, now we just need the stars! There are some Iconic Canadians who are extremely well-known on the big screen! The only way we'll get these Iconic Canadians into our project is if we travel to where they are - Los Angeles! Help us to get our crew and equipment over to L.A., so that we can photograph and interview some of Canada's most recognizable faces!



At $1 550 000 - We want to kick off this project with a bang! The launch party will be an exhibition of all the Icon portraits where you can meet the entire Canadian Icons team and even some of the icons. You can win a ticket to the launch party by winning our referral contest, or by purchasing the perk once the stretch goal is unlocked!

      This project will act as an educational archive of 150 Canadian Icons

· Help bring Canadians together to celebrate our Sesquicentennial

· Help define our Canadian Identity

· Create an educational resource for everyone to learn about Canada

· Show Canada for the land of opportunity that it is

· To help create a thread that will run through communities and tie them              together

· To inspire pride and understanding in all Canadians

 Our challenge is the logistics - we have one year to meet our deadline of July 1st 2017. In that year, we will be arranging Icon interviews, which includes traveling to Icons who are out of our reach. After that, it's producing all materials - including video editing, photo retouching and writing and translation for the book. That's a lot of work for a year - but with your help, we can do it! 

We appreciate any kind of support! Here are some more ways that you can help!

· Send us a video of yourself saying Happy Anniversary Canada! Or Happy Sesquicentennial Canada! Or just talk about what you love about Canada!

· Tell us who you think should be a Canadian Icon on our facebook page! We value your opinion!

· Share our project with your friends and family!
